While the crew that consisted of many different species did their part to make sure everything ran smoothly, one particular member was dealing with a personal issue of her own. That person was Commander Shepard, the leader of the ship and a decorated soldier of many years, a regular Alliance hero. She herself had been instrumental in taking down the Reaper vanguard Sovereign years earlier and now she had made it her life's mission to make sure the universe survived the coming war.

Currently however she was facing a different battle: the battle of the bulge. As the commander ran her right hand through her fiery red hair, her green eyes peered down at the button of her pants as the smallest amount of tummy flab was preventing it from being closed.

"Okay I'm just going to suck it in and button it. I haven't gotten that big! Not yet at least!" Shepard rationalized to herself as she felt the soft chub that had replaced her hard abs. It was embarrassing to admit she had packed on a few extra pounds (too many nights of stress eating as she attempted to piece together plans and ideas to stop the Reapers) and it was even more embarrassing that it had been enough to make her pants not fit.

She had struggled to get them to cover her slightly larger rear end when she pulled them up, her panties pinching her cheeks just the tiniest bit, and now she was facing her second worst nemesis in the form of her pants button. Once again sucking in with all her might, Shepard attempted to close the gap and get the button through the hole.

Shepard refuses, but accepts when the deal is sweetened

Subject Zero and Justicar Samara may prove difficult targets, so I'll be sending an agent to assist you. Additionally, the Salarian tranquilizers have been delivered, in liquid form, as you requested.

Not to mention the actual meals Liara cooked for her. “I’m always hungry for your cooking.” Shepard said, and in truth, the more of Liara’s cooking Eileen ate, the more literal that was becoming.

It was then that Shepard first realize how much more…affectionate Liara had been since she had start plumping up. The tummy rubs, the extravagant meals, the long hours of cuddling, the mad love making sessions—they had all started when her belly had first started to grow.

Instead of immediately digging into the cake like she had so many times before, she set it aside. “Hey, Liara, have you noticed that I’ve been putting on weight?” Shepard asked with a serious tone she hadn’t used for quite some time.

Liara chuckled. “It isn’t exactly something that’s hard to miss, dear.” She said kindly, still maintaining the same kind smile.

Liara tensed up a bit at that. “Yes, about that…” She began,

Liara took a moment to ponder the ethical implications of what she was doing. She was no stranger to lies and secrets in her field of work, but what she planned for her beloved was pushing the boundaries of what was acceptable. ‘It should at least keep her out of trouble’ she rationalized to herself, ignoring her own buried perversions.

Eileen knew she wasn’t as thin as she used to be, but Liara’s constant pampering combined with the mind-altering serum kept her from caring. Gone was the daring commander Liara once looked up to, now reprogrammed to be her fat and happy lover.

Liara chuckled at the irony of her predicament and retreated back into the kitchen. The clattering of dishes told Shepard to get ready for seconds. And thirds.

------

Like a bear in hibernation, the light from the bathroom door did nothing to disturb Shepard’s deep slumber. Liara watched her partner’s breathing from the doorway and smiled. It was slow, peaceful... the rise... and the fall... There was something calming about it, even mesmerizing. She closed the door behind her, careful not to make a sound.

After doing her business, washing her hands, and brushing her teeth, Liara took a closer look at the layer of pudge that’d formed. Her face was certainly much softer, but not yet cherubic. The more she looked, the more of her there was at every angle, especially in her lower half. Out of curiosity she stepped up on the scale, confirming her previous estimation within a pound. It read ‘153 lbs.’ Eileen was still twice her weight, but it still alarmed her..

Watching Shepard grow was one thing, but she didn’t know how to feel about herself getting larger.

“How did this happen?” she thought to herself. “Perhaps I should remember to watch my own eating as well as hers…”

With a reluctant sigh, Liara turned to leave the bathroom and returned to bed. She wrapped her arms around Shepard’s doughy body and drifted off to sleep.
1121132.title: "Have you put on some weight recently?"

choices: ...felt relief. At least Eileen was still much bigger than her.
...felt worried. Eileen was still bigger, but the gap was closing.
11211322.content:
Liara awoke the next morning in the same position she fell asleep in, wrapped around the enormity of Shepard's belly as it rose and fell with each breath. Quietly slipping out from around her, the Asari crept out of bed and wrapped a nightgown around herself before tiptoeing down to the kitchen. After a particularly saucy dream, Liara got the idea of surprising Shepard with breakfast in bed, and she had the perfect meal for just such an occasion; donuts! Okay so it was a bit of a cop out compared to the handmade breakfasts she stuffed her lover with, but for a nice meal to have in bed an obscene amount of donuts was a good choice nonetheless, and they were still baked with love...and that little extra special something.

As Liara began preparing a heaping tray of the pastries, the scent of glaze caught up to her and she inhaled deeply. It smelled absolutely delectable, and her stomach voiced agreement with a hungry rumble.

"I suppose...a sampling would not be a bad idea..." Liara mused, picking up one of the pastries. "The drugs won't affect my mind like they do to her, I made sure of that, didn't I?" Under normal circumstances her trained Shadow Broker side would have been shouting at her "Don't eat that you fool, a small risk is still a risk!", but that was drowned out by the sound of her stomach, growling angrily through that layer of pudge on her abs, demanding to be filled.

Her stomach won. Liara took a bite from the pastry, and it was like a beautiful song that broke out in her mouth. The delightfully fluffy texture, the pleasant tingling sweetness, the sensation of that delightful flavor filling her mouth and causing a moan to escape her lips.

"Ohhhh...so good!" Liara said, a little short of breath. "I...another couldn't hurt, could it?" She picked up another donut and bit into it, this time overwhelmed by the stunningly sugary taste of chocolate filling. The Asari practically shuddered with delight and couldn't stop herself from picking up another one even as she swallowed the second. Strawberry next, the candied fruity taste making her break out in giggles as she continued to sample more and more, each one taking her on a roller coaster of sensational delight, up until the point where her hand brushed against crumbs.

"Wha...oh, by the goddess..."

The whole platter had vanished! Liara paused, wondering if she was really so enthralled that she ate the whole plate without noticing. No no that's not it, she just...didn't finish filling it. Yeah that was it.

There was a creaking sound from upstairs. Hurriedly, Liara quickly dug into the stockpile of pastries and donuts she prepared ahead of time and refilled the tray. Urgency and a somewhat filled stomach overrode her donut-driven desires and she dashed upstairs, so eager to watch Shepard go to town that she forgot about the whole incident.

---

Some time later, she caught herself with a mouthful of pasta as she prepared a noodly feast for Shepard, one that would need a lot more noodles she suddenly realized. Not a huge deal, considering she had a very light lunch with what had to be just a few snacks, right?

---

A little while after that she got the massive breakfast taco she made for Shepard and the one she made for herself mixed up for a moment. How romantic, they must enjoy the same flavors in their taco. Or did the mix up happen because they were the same size? Either way, Liara didn't eat the whole thing like Shepard did so no problem, right?

---

A little while after THAT, Liara opened the fridge to find that all the ice cream was missing! Did Shepard finish it off? No wait...she did. Whoops. Well, she got hungry last night and wanted a sweet treat, what was wrong with that?

---

You know what? Liara was going to cook up two steaks for herself today. She was feeling peckish, and besides if Shepard got to indulge as much as she wanted then why not her? What's the worse that could happen?

---

This wasn't happening. It couldn't happen. She had to be seeing things.

Liara opened her eyes again, hoping against hope that what she saw in the mirror was wrong. Rubbing off a spot where the mirror misted over slightly from Shepard's shower, she looked at her reflection.

"Oh no..."

The smooth angular look of her face was gone now. In its place were plump cheeks and a healthy double chin that made it look far more round then before. Slowly, dreading what was to come, she took a step backward.

"Oh my...it can't..."

The layer of pudge from so long ago was an ocean now. A big double-rolled belly spilled into her lap and hung down lazily over her undergarments. Thick meaty shoulders threatened to swallow up her elbows and even her thick neck as she raised her arms to rub her immense gut.

"How...did I not notice...?"

Liara turned around in the mirror and let out a small gasp at the sight she was dreading the most. Thunderous thighs that no pants could fit over, hips that refused to pass through all but the most generous doorways unaided, and above all...that butt. The Asari was equal parts mesmerized and disturbed by it, as it quaked with gelatinous mass at the slightest touch. Liara didn't think she'd seen anything that big before outside of an Elcor or Krogan.

Stepping on the scale was almost a formality at this point. Pushing her gut in to read the numbers on top, she read with mounting dread, that she was a whopping three hundred nine pounds now. There was one undeniable, horrific fact that Liara took from this, a fact that was clearly shown from her blubbery chest all the way down to her fat little toes.

"By the Goddess..." she whispered. "I'm....fat!"

"You say something, honey?" Shepard said as the shower-head sputtered off.

"N-nothing!" Liara said hurriedly, rushing to finish her morning routine. "Just...thinking about breakfast." Normally she would have meant thinking about what to make, but now her mighty gut seemed to growl angrily, demanding sustenance.

"Ooh, I'm excited to see what you have planned today!" Shepard said excitedly, stepping out of the shower and wrapping herself in a towel. Liara turned to look at Shepard and...
11211322.title: Liara decides to let loose a little and indulge.

112113221.content:
Eileen’s form wobbled and jostled as she struggled to fit the towel around her prominent gut. A sigh of relief escaped Liara’s lips. Despite how much she’d accidentally grown herself, Eileen had certainly kept pace, and some. The five hundred some-odd pound behemoth almost made Liara look normal.

Almost.

As long as Liara was thinner than Shepard, she thought, things were fine. Liara almost thought twice about the absurdity of her logic, but it was as if something from within kept her from caring.

“Something wrong Liara?”

Liara was pulled back from her thoughts. “Oh, it’s nothing dear I assure you.”

“Are you sure hun? You’ve been spacing out a lot more than usual.” Shepard dried herself off and reached for a shirt that was two sizes too small.

“Oh, I’m just trying to plan out the day. A few errands to run, and some meals to cook.”

Liara watched as Eileen struggled to fit into her clothes. Eileen had done away with underwear a few weeks back, opting instead for sweat pants and a tee, both of which barely contained her flab. By the time she was done, Eileen was out of breath. It was hard to believe this was the same woman who saved the galaxy from the Reapers only a few years ago.

“Oh that reminds me, do you mind restocking on snacks when you go out? I kinda ate them all.”

Liara just sighed and laughed. “I’ll write that down. Now then, how about breakfast?”
112113221.title: ...felt relief. At least Eileen was still much ...

choices: ...it was time to come clean with Shepard.
...it was time to bring in some help.
1121132212.content:
This was never supposed to happen.

In the idle hours before the Reaper Invasion, Liara often dreamed of what would happen when the war ended. She thought of how the galaxy would rebuild, how the many empires might come together in the aftermath of such an enemy, but mostly she thought of Shepard. She spent nights dreaming of the life they would build afterwords, in a galaxy that didn't need their protection anymore. Her beloved had done so much, given up everything to save the galaxy...to save her...that she deserved every happiness, every luxury she could ever want. Even in the darkest hours, if it wasn't the many friends she made or the importance of her mission that kept her going, it was the dream of one day pampering and protecting her beloved Shepard, bestowing on her the love and affection that she more then earned.

Then the war came to an end, and as the galaxy rebuilt, stronger then ever, Liara saw her deepest desires begin to unfold in front of her. It took a chemical suggestion or two to get the ball rolling, but soon Liara was living out her dreams in earnest, and Shepard was getting everything, anything she wanted, all thanks to Liara. The Asari's heart swelled with happiness as she watched her beloved also swell, descending further and further into her new hedonistic life, always waited on and looked after by the Asari she loved, without a care in the world. Liara saw her dreams come true at last; Shepard was her prize pig, fat and happy, safe and sound from the dangers of the world. It was everything she ever wanted.

Except that Liara realized, perhaps too late, that eating habits she didn't want were starting to rub off on her. It could have been the drugs, it could have been from Liara being around so much food all the time, or maybe it was just that eating like a pig is contagious, but Liara found herself being dragged kicking and screaming into obesity by her constant pampering and feeding of Shepard. She tried to diet or exercise, but a day's worth of healthy activities were undone by just an hour in Shepard's presence, and Liara spent a lot of hours around her. And so the days went by, with Liara's diets failing one after the other as her fantasies about pampering her beloved Shepard pushed her further and further, up to the point where she reached a new milestone.

Liara glared down at the bathroom scale, a hand mirror in her hand to see around her belly. Swallowing her pride, she took two ponderous, heavy steps, heaving herself onto the measurement device. Sighing, Liara adjusted her mirror to see around herself, but paused at a dreaded sound.

*creaaaaaaaaaak....grooooan*

Liara's eyes widened as she felt the metal shift underneath her.

"No, no, please don't, I can't be too big for this, please!" she pleaded, as though willing herself to be lighter would somehow work. It did not.

*CRUNCH*

"DAMN IT!"

Lumbering off the ex-scale, she looked down and saw a giant crack right between the indents her bare feet had already worn into it, with various electronic bits spilling out the bottom of the device. Admitting defeat, she shoved the broken scale to the side and looked over towards the other one. The oversized one, meant for heavier species like Krogans, that they had installed for when Shepard got too big for the usual scale. The one that Liara dreaded ever needing to use.

Like an immensely flabby prisoner walking to his execution, Liara slowly waddled up to the new scale, which groaned under her weight as well but held firm, displaying a cheery bright number on the wall in front of her.

Five. Hundred. Sixty. Three.

Liara didn't scream or complain anymore about how she managed to put on another ten pounds since last weigh-in despite all the dieting she supposedly did. She almost did this time, thanks to outgrowing the "skinny" scale, but Liara now faced every increase in her girth first with reassurances that she was doing this for Shepard's sake, then out of grim resignation. Maybe she'd try to diet again, eat healthy for a day then blow it with a massive midnight snack again, or a gorge session alongside Shepard. Just like she always did.

Liara tugged down on her sweat pants and t-shirt, the same pair Shepard wore at this size before she outgrew them, and pondered the blob of an Asari she saw in the mirror. It was almost comical to think of how shocked she was at her size over two hundred pounds ago; her face looked almost entirely round with no neck to speak of, with massive cheeks and an array of chins that dominated her features now. She felt around her chins tenderly with fingers twice as thick as before and padded palms attached to her pillowy forearms, long ago having swallowed her elbows and wouldn't let her rest her arms at her sides anymore. The double rolled belly had blossomed into a big blue apron that flowed from a shirt unable to contain it, propping up a pair of melons that could put actual prize winning melons to shame. Why Shepard's species judged foodstuffs for their size rather the merely eating them was beyond her, but that's another story.

Dropping her hands to her sides as best she could, Liara felt along the expanse of her couch-crushing hips and thighs thick as actual tree trunks at this point. She never had to worry about not fitting through doors before, and now she almost certainly did, if not for her legs then for her absolutely unstoppable rump. It was practically a seat all its own, bouncing and wobbling with every small motion and stopping long after Liara stopped moving it. Even Shepard had trouble growing her own plump rear to this size, and she was still quite heavy compared to her lover.

Five. Hundred. Sixty. Three. It still felt so very unreal, and yet here it was.

Rubbing her stomach to loose a light belch, Liara reflected on the lifestyle that got her hear, and realized...
1121132212.title: Liara's Lavish Lifestyle

11211322122.content:
“Time to bring in some help,” Liara thought aloud, stifling a burp once more with her hand, the other lazily scratching at her gargantuan ass.

Her and Shepard were too far gone to even consider losing weight, Liara’s own attempts being a testament to the futility of such plans. She could come clean with Shepard; admit she’d been drugging their food and what not. But what was the point? It wasn’t as if Shepard minded being fat, or at least she’d never voiced any qualms to the growing asari. It was almost as if Eileen just didn’t care, stuffing herself nonstop for half of the day and lazing about the other half. Eileen was content with the way of things.

Catering to her “prized pig’s” every need was always Liara’s top priority, one which had only grown more and more difficult to fulfill over the past few months. Bringing in extra help seemed like the only solution.

But who to ask? There was certainly no shortage of former crewmates and friends willing to help out, but the thought of someone seeing them like this made Liara’s stomach churn—or maybe she was just hungry? The savior of the galaxy and her asari lover had been reduced to apathetic gluttons, pleased to pursue a life of pleasure. It was embarrassing.

Then, Liara had an idea.

“Liara!! Are those brownies done yet!?” Shepard’s voice sounded through the hallway. Didn’t Liara just gave her a fresh batch? Oh well...

“One moment dear! I just need to make a few phone calls!”

------

It was noon once more. The sun shone in through the window and warmed Eileen’s numerous rolls of pale flab. This was the most sun she’d felt in a long while, having not left home in little over a month. She had no reason to leave. She felt loved more and more with each passing day, with Liara always there for her, giving her whatever she wanted. It almost felt sinful to be this happy.

*UUUUURRRRRRPP!!!*

Shepard leaned back and rubbed her stomach, hearing the tormented couch beneath creak with the shift in mass. She looked over to see her smaller lover spilling over the edges of a smaller loveseat adjacent to her. The asari was polishing off the remnants of her own blueberry swirl cheesecake, moaning in pleasure with each bite. Eileen looked on with a smile, glad to see her lover enjoying herself. When finished, Liara let out a similar belch and looked back at Shepard.

“So, what did you think?”

“As good as always, even better than the last one somehow.” Shepard replied.

“Aww, you really think so?”

“I know so!”

Liara heaved her poorly dressed body out of her small sofa’s depression and lumbered towards Shepard with a washcloth in hand. “You just keep getting messier every day, don’t you my little piggy?” Liara teased, oblivious to the blue mess surrounding her own mouth.

“Hey, who are you calling little?” Shepard teased back. Despite how much fatter Liara was now, Eileen still had her beat by over two hundred pounds, give or take. Liara dragged the wet cloth through Eileen’s chasmal cleavage and up to her face, making sure to clean every smudge of cheesecake left behind before planting a blue-stained kiss on her lover’s doughy cheek.

“I’ll be right back dear. Any ideas for dinner yet?” Liara said as she waddled towards the kitchen.

Eileen idly watched the television before her. Most screen time was filled with ridiculous advertisements for the latest and greatest waste of money; who in their right mind would ever buy a reinforced, deluxe nanofiber, quadruple wide, couch-bed hybrid with heated seats and a working massage system? Especially not for THAT price! She recalled these frivolous advertisements being the norm, even before the Reaper Invasion. Some things never change it seems. It took her a moment, but Liara’s question finally registered with Shepard’s preoccupied brain. “How about pizza?”

Pizza again? Liara could practically feel the irresistible mixture of cheese and sauce slide down her throat once more. “Sounds good to me.” The ass-heavy asari returned from the kitchen with two small mountains of cookies, ready to be devoured. “Oh, by the way,” Liara said, waving the cookies in front of Eileen to get her attention. “An old friend should be stopping by today, might be staying with us for a while.” She gave Shepard her plate of cookies before carefully sitting back down in her own couch. Any sudden movements and the poor thing might finally break.

The two behemoths started on their “light snacks,” sometimes even pausing to breathe. “Shoh, *munch* whoffs *smack* cohmin’ ohfver?” Eileen asked, her mouth stuffed with several cookies at once.

As fate would have it, the doorbell rang.

“Come iiiin~!” Liara sang, courteous enough to swallow before speaking. Not a moment later, the door swung open. Stepping through it was...
11211322122.title: Liara's Time of Need

choices: The pair struggle to Diet, Leading Miranda to confiscate junk food
The pair have trouble exercising, making Miranda slow things down.
112113221222.content:
'Coming!' Liara yelled as she got up off the couch or tried too.

A quarter ton of butter blue Asari takes some effort to move. For one thing she was wedged between an arm rest and Shepard's sprawling body and for another the once terrifying shadow broker was pathetically out of shape. Liara's once rather graceful stems pressed down in the simple act of standing, both her dimpled knees popping loudly as her hips raised an inch off of the couch. To say that Liara's exercise hadn't kept up with her eating was an understatement, she got in less than a thousand steps every day and did nothing more strenuous than stirring batter. After a second her legs gave out and she colapsed back onto the couch.

Again the door bell rang.

'Should I get it?' Shepard asked plunging another cookie into her mouth.

Shepard surely knew she'd gotten fat but Liara had hidden exactly how big the galaxy's savior was. The freckled marshmellow of a woman, who using her vanguard powers had once been able to dash across a battlefield and shoulder check a Krogan through a brick wall, hadn't been able to rise without help for several months now, ever since she was around Liara's size.

'No, no I'll manage,' the blubbery Asari asserted, rocking forwards.

Arms thicker than a linebackers but ludicrously bereft of muscle pressed down on the arm rest poking up past Liara's blue love handle and on Eileen's dimpled knees. Straining, every atrophied muscle fiber screaming, her biotic powers lifting herself up to the maximum and sweat breaking out across her forehead, Liara managed to get up.

Breathing heavily, the former archaeologist advanced on the door. As she lumbered across the living room, breathing heavily, she passed a mirror that showed every inch of her rotund, rolly poly body. Liara was both glad that she was wearing panties and a sports bra, both overloaded to the point of breaking, due to often going nude and somewhat horrified that this was as formal a clothing as she could get into. When she got to the door, she had to reach past the adipose loaded barrier fo her gut and she slightly misjudged the distance, the door slapping her in the lower fat fold as it opened.

'Ah, I see I arrived in the nick of time,' Miranda Lawson said with an arc of one perfect eyebrow as she looked down at the door filling tonnage of Liara and saw the elephantine spread of her former commander on the couch.

Miranda was as far a cry from the morbidly obese pair as could be imagined. Chiseled cheek bones and a sharp chin instead of a swollen round face and dangling jowls, an exposed collarbone and straight athletic shoulders instead of a puffy slouch and a fat hump, big proud and high tear drop breasts instead of swollen saggy dugs that resembled couch pillows, a tapered waist and a washboard belly instead of canyons of fat rolls and bean bag bellies, shapely and girlish hips instead of couch filling flanks, a spectacularly round and amazingly pert booty instead of the crinkly trash bags filled with jello hanging from Liara's overwhelmed backside and slender runners legs that were a fifth of the Asari's near useless stems.

'Miri!' Eileen cried from the couch through a mouthful of cookies as she tried to get up for a hug, 'what have you been up to?'

'Helping the Alliance hunt down what's left of Cerberus and a fe modeling jobs to fill time,' the operative said coldly, 'I can see what you two have been doing.'

It took the morbidly obese ex-N7 operative even longer to rise than Liara had and in that time the Asari went increasingly red in the face from embarassment.

'Living like love birds!' Shepard laughed a moment later after finally getting up and waddling over, each step punctuated with a horrible slap of thigh fat, 'so good to see you again, what's the occasion!?'

'The occasion is, that your...house mate,' Miranda said politely but coldly as she took in the waves of fat that had swallowed all the hard work she'd had rebuilding Shepard from death, 'has reported that you two have been having some issues lately.'

'Issues? What issues Liara?' Shepard wheezed, reaching out one pathetically swollen arm to lean on the wall as her knees began to complain.

'Well, I've been having some trouble taking care of you lately,' Liara admitted weakly, 'it's been a bit much.'

'Which is an understatement,' Miranda said with one toss of her Raven locks, 'you two are...in inexcusable shape and I'm going to change that.'

'Please Miranda, I know I'm not battle ready but It's not that bad, only fifteen pounds at most,' Eileen said, trying to cross her arms over her bovine chest and getting caught up in her drooping cleavage, 'now, put those bags down and let's have some snacks until dinner.'

'Not that bad? Only a few pounds?' Miranda asked icily, 'and it's only just after local noon yet your'e eating again? You need emergency help.'

'Let's all sit down and just um, talk this out,' Liara tried to compromise, the meeting going worse than she'd planned, 'I did ask for some help getting into shape but...'

'You left out the exact size of the situation,' Miranda said, 'this is inexcusable for both of you. If I didn't know who you were I'd think you were different people you've gotten so fat.'

'That's a bit unfair, you don't come into someone's house uninvited and call them fat!,' Shepard said, lumbering forwards to poke Miranda in the chest for emphasis.

However, the once athletic redhead was more than six times her own weight and had no sense of where she began and ended. The gap between Liara and the wall looked plenty wide enough, but Shepard wound up pressing the ample Asari into one wall while her own bunch up side fat knocked over a row of vintage paper books and got stuck. Her protruding gut did bump into Miranda's rock solid waist at least, even though Shepards pastry dough arms got stuck on the wall and Liara. Shepard tried to extricate herself, but her laughable physical strength combined with her immense bulk kept her wedged tight. Liara's reaction didn't help either and the two graceless hulks pushed and shoved weakly and awkwardly at each other as their breathing began to turn into heavy pants and sweat began pouring over their bodies.

'Just a few pounds Eileen?' Miranda asked, gloved hands taking hold of Shepard's lower stomach roll, which had begun to bifurcate in the center, 'Or is it normal to get stuck in the hallway?'

'Okay...we...might *huff* have a problem,' Shepard gasped, exhausted by the tiny amount of activity.

Several minutes of Miranda using her biotic powers to move the two back inside, a weigh in and a blood test later saw the former Cerberus operative tut-tutting them both.

'These results are unbelievable,' she sighed as she looked at her omni-tool's read out, 'I've never seen anything like this.'

'It's...not that bad...,' Shepard said through a new mouthful of cookies Liara had thoughtlessly provided.

'Shepard, you're the fattest human being in over eighty years. You weigh seven hundred and eighty four pounds,' Miranda snapped, 'more than three hundred pounds more than the next heaviest, whose a professional body builder. you've gained more than six hundred pounds since the war and have blood sugar and cholesterol levels that had been relegated to the history books. If it wasn't for your special forces grade nanites in your blood and mostly augmetic circulatory system you'd have full blown diabetes and high blood pressure as well.'

Shepard's mouth hung open in amazement at her obesity being laid bare.

'It's not that bad,' Liara patted her lover's immense thigh only for the genetically engineered perfectionist to turn on her.

'Not that you're much better,' Miranda informed her icily, 'Dr. T'soni here is the fattest Asari in the recorded history of her race.'

'...the fattest?' The azure tub of lard repeated, unsure whether to be happy, ashamed or shocked.

'By three hundred pounds,' the model esque brunette sighed, 'but I think I got here in time. Girls it's going to take work, but I'm going to get you back to your old selves.'

Shepard, back to being hard and lean? Perish the thought, Liara realized, this was the opposite of what she wanted.

'Really all I wanted was to get a bit stronger, it has been harder to to do the house work with all this bulk,' she insisted, 'I don't think getting thin again is realistic.'

'Oh no, I'm not accepting any half measures for you two,' Miranda told her, 'it's time for 1200 calorie a day diets, 12 hours of exercise a day and constant weigh ins. I'm going to whip you two back into shape like my life depends on it.'

Both Liara and Shepard cringed, this wasn't what they'd expected...

But Liara thought as she looked at the immense bulk of her lover, she'd read that humans who lost some weight could rapidly regain it. And as for Miranda...being around fat people supposedly made others fat...
112113221222.title: ...Miranda Lawson.

choices: Sometime later. Liara and Shep have lost some weight but Miranda's gotten huge.
Things end up go downhill. Miranda loses control and all them are gaining!
The guilt gets to Liara and she reveals the truth to Miranda and Shepard.
1121132212221.content:
Miranda's plan was simple and she was sticking to, but she'd run into a bit of a snag. When it came to exercise, Liara and Shepard handled themselves well, surprisingly. Well, as well as two of the fattest, if not the fattest, people in the galaxy would be expected to.
Despite any huffing, puffing or flat out wheezing, the two lovebirds did their exercises. It would seem that in spite of the lazy, hedonistic lifestyle, there was still quite of bit of left of the two women who had all but saved the galaxy.

That didn't seem to extend to their want and desire for food.

Miranda had watched them like a hawk, looking for any hidden stashes of treats that deviated off her strict 1200 limitation. Being the practical woman that she was, after finding Liara attempted to sneak a delectable set of chocolate cookies, began combing the house. The sheer amount of food in home was staggering and the former Cerberus operative felt it wouldn't been out of place for a small vessel with full crew! She'd had never thought to see in a home of two.

'Well, we won't having that.' Miranda had thought.

She had been tempted to throw it away honestly. Just remove the temptation away from Shepard and Liara's environment. Simple and efficient in her opinion. But, Miranda felt...conflicted. For one, she didn't wish to essentially just throw away money, especially money that wasn't her's. So, she thought of donating it to a soup kitchen or homeless shelter. Yet, she found that she couldn't even bring herself to do that. As she had taken stock of all the food, she'd seen quite a few things herself had never had but wanted to try. Even little alien delicacies she'd never knew existed. Honestly, with her now tighter control of the situation and Shepard and Liara's steady efforts, she didn't need to resort to such methods. Besides, as long as she kept them on their 1200 calorie diets, Miranda was sure that she could use the treats as an extra form of motivation.

'And maybe, ' She mused, 'have something for myself once in a while. What would be the harm?'

For Liara's part, she was becoming a little worried. Not for Shepard, as she could always regain any weight lost. Not too mention is was actually rather exciting getting the opportunity to fatten Eileen again. Not for herself, as she didn't mind losing weight. She'd be able to pamper Shepard and operate on her own again. That would never be a bad thing and the strict dieting she was on would help refine better habits to make sure she didn't land in such a situation again.

What she was worried about was Miranda.

Liara had no idea how Miranda's body would react to the drugs in the food supply of the house and Liara felt rather guilty. She'd contacted Miranda to help get things into a better semblance of order, not fatten the poor woman up. Then again, given Miranda's extensive genetic engineering, the drugs may have little to no effect. Besides, if she said anything, that'd reveal just how far she'd gone to fatten Shepard and Liara didn't want to cross that bridge any time soon.
1121132212221.title: Dieting isn't easy...

choices: Miranda snaps awake; she realizes how fat she's gotten!
Miranda doesn't clue in; she gets bigger, the other two get smaller.
Miranda gets lazy; the girls relapse and all start growing!
11211322122211.content:
"Alright ladies, that's ten...braap...pardon me...that's ten laps, take a water break!"

Liara and Shepard took great, heaving breaths as they slowly lumbered to a stop, their legs aching fiercely after a fast-paced jog around the racetrack. Liara doubled over with her hands on her chubby knees as her lover waddled over to take a seat on the bleachers, the metal groaning but holding firm under her weight.

"What a workout," Shepard gasped, cracking open a water bottle and guzzling down so quickly that water dripped down from the sides of her mouth. "Last time I ran like that I was fighting Husks on Thessia."

Liara chuckled, toweling off sweat from her forehead as she sat down next to her, sighing as she took a load off and started sipping her own water bottle. The asari had been dreading this sort of workout ever since Miranda showed up on her crusade to get them healthy again, but ironically the constant exercise wasn't that bad. In fact, it was even sort of fun. Maybe part of that was because Shepard was doing it with her and doing anything with Shepard was a wonderful experience, but she couldn't deny that a part of her looked forward to the daily workout routine.

And perhaps most unbelievably, it was working! The pair of them had lost quite a bit of weight since Miranda’s intense crash diet began. Liara had shrunken down to a healthy three hundred or so pounds, and Shepard had reached Liara’s old weight from before they started dieting. Liara was pleased that they hadn’t lost all the weight, since she still loved Shepard at such a large size and frankly, she’d grown attached to her own extra chins and bulging belly by now, but the benefits were undeniable. The two of them could move around a lot easier, they got stuck together less often, and…well, not to be crass, but their evenings were a lot more energetic as well. Don’t get her wrong, “personal time” when they were super-sized was fun, but with the excess pounds shed they could go at it a lot longer. It was really the best of both worlds; they were both getting healthier, but nowhere near skinny.

The snag was that “healthy but nowhere near skinny” applied not just to the obese couple, but their trainer as well.

“Good, remember to stay hydrated,” Miranda lectured the pair of them as she waddled up, sucking down an extra-large soda. “It’s important to stay healthy during a workout.”

Liara nodded and tried to play off her inability to look Miranda in the eye as exhaustion from the workout. Internally kicking herself for leaving so many of the drugged snack food out before Miranda got involved, the Asari had watched in horror as the snacks and treats she had scattered around the house hit their workout coach like a freight train. They were in workout mode for less then a week when a belly began to pooch out the front of Miranda’s workout wardrobe; now that belly fell down her front in two big meaty rolls, not big enough to hide how her thighs and hips had doubled in size to accommodate a brand new bubble butt that put the old Miranda’s impressive rear utterly to shame. Her eyes following the undulating of Miranda’s fat rolls with mounting dread, Liara couldn’t help but wonder who was bigger at this point, the dieter, or the one giving the diet? It was hard to say when Miranda seemed to be gaining the chins and rolls that Liara was gradually losing.

“I have to say, I’m impressed,” Miranda suddenly announced.

“A-about wh-hat?” Liara stuttered.

“Your dieting is going extremely well,” Miranda clarified. “You’ve both lost a lot of weight and that’s commendable. You’ll find that your lives are better once you’re fit and healthy like the rest of us.” She laughed at her own humor, her stomach rolls wobbling with mirth. That only made Liara feel worse, since that sort of joking was how Shepard reacted to her own weight gain thanks to the chemicals and Miranda should have been off them by now. Liara’s only horrible conclusion was that somehow the perfectly engineered human’s perfectly engineered genetics made her even more susceptible to the formula, and she wasn’t looking forward to when reality finally kicked in.
11211322122211.title: ...but you can't argue with those results.

choices: Miranda is left to her own gluttonous devices.
112113221222112.content:
A vain human being would have recognized themselves putting on a few pounds.

A normal one would have noticed several.

Even a dull minded one would have noticed themselves ballooning up from a salivating 135 to a door frame busting 325 lbs.

And some how Miranda hadn't noticed a thing.

It wasn't that the once curvaceous brunette was stupid. The mental profiles of several brilliant scientists had been added into her genetic mix, along side the legs, hips and breasts of earths sexist models and she'd been sharp as she'd been sexy. But despite having the skills to be an expert genetic scientist and a master spy, Miranda was completely oblivious to every extra inch.

The reason why the vain ex-spy didn't notice her transformation into a slob was buried deep inside her genetic code: a humiliating contingency created by her father's scientists in case his perfect daughter went rogue. If she tried to escape, exposure to a special compound would begin rapidly altering her body type. Her basal metabolism would plunge, her appetite would sky rocket, her workout ethic would vanish, her halved aging rate would rapidly correct itself and she'd never notice a thing until she hit five hundred pounds and woke up as a massive, middle age ball of slovenly lard. By chance, Miranda had avoided exposure during her escape twenty years ago but the junk food Liara had left lying around happened to be loaded with the stuff.

When MIranda had first bitten into a drugged Ho-Ho, she'd found the collection of sugar and chocolate to be disgusting. But as the retro viruses in it rapidly rewrote her genetic code, she found it okay. And by the second bite delicious and by the third pure nirvana. Miranda hadn't been able to shove treats into her mouth fast enough, going to bed with a painfully stuffed tummy that began to immediately send calories to her thighs.

In the morning, Lawson's customary six pack had lost a third of its normal bulges. A layer of fat had crept up her midsection in the middle of the night, burying her lower abdominal muscles in a soft layer that was starting to roll over her work out spandex. Those same pants were stretched tight over a no longer perfectly round booty, which had its first degree of sag and a sand grain fleck of cellulite on one perfectly smooth cheek, the first of many to come. Miranda had been blissfully unaware at the tightness as she'd run the mammoth Shepard and the elephantine Liara through their first workout, nor how her usually graceful routine hadn't generated any of the customary endorphins.

At the end of the week, the busty brunette's bosoms were threatening to break out of two cup sizes too small sports bras and starting to show stretch marks. The last vestiges of her abs had turned into a gooey paunch with buttery love handles hanging over the sides of her spandex. Modelesque cheek bones had turned into cherry red apples with new dimples and a second chin showed whenever she smiled. Perfect runners thighs had started to rub when she walked and delicate ankles were puffing up. Her perfect badonka donk was taking on a life of its own, flaring out and sagging down as its firm muscles dwindled away and were replaced with ever deeper layers of fat, even as the mirror smooth skin was now studded with cellulite.

'Why don't you two run through this workout on your own?' the ex-operative had told the pair of swollen former heroes when they'd arrived at the running track, 'Let's see what you two have learned.'

In truth, the thoroughly out of shape brunette just hadn't had the energy to break a sweat that morning. She put the two fatties through an hours long workout, while killing a few bags of chips and a couple containers of twinkies and Ho-Hos to put her own soft body into the overweight category. On the hover drive back, she'd stopped to get the two land whales a dressingless salad each and gotten herself an extra large milk shake without thinking. The check out worker had almost had a heart attack seeing Miranda's milk white F cups burst out of her over stretched DD cup bra as she handed over her card. Miranda choked up the wardrobe malfunction to a faulty seam and kept drinking milk shake with one heavy boob hanging out, bouncing on the ride home at every swerve.

It would be one of the last times the increasingly plump Miranda would attract someone else's attention. Giant tits or not, the rest of her body was going rapidly to seed, not helped by the thousand plus calories of milkshake she drained in the five minute drive. As she got out of the car, she gave her first ever fat girl grunt as weakening legs pushed up a body that had gained a quarter of its mass in just a week. That night when she'd passed out with a belly full of drugged junk marked the first day Miranda had failed to work out since adolescence.

Fat came faster and faster without any exercise as Miranda became ever more gluttonous and lazy. The household snack budget had actually increased as the once willowy woman was now eating more than Shepard and Liara had at their peak. Fifteen thousand calories of saturated fat and processed sugar a day were pouring into her, yet her now altered genetics meant she was still hungry over the months of her gain. Soon she was unrecognizable, a milk pale ball of lard that had started huffing when she got up and down.

'I'm *huff* really impressed with you two,' Miranda wheezed as Shepard and Liara finished another jiggling lap, 'Keep running and you'll be as skinny as me in no time!'

In truth, Miranda had twenty pounds on the former Shadow Broker and given her rate of gain and Shepard's rate of decrease, it would be at most months until the ex-operative took the title of fattest person in the world. When she'd stood, a small tidal wave of wrappers had fallen onto the ground and her shorts, stretched transparent by their contents, let doughy sprawls of cellulite laden ass cheeks hang out.

Liara jogged/waddled by, slowing her pace a bit as she saw that the bench her obese trainer had been sitting on remained bent after she'd stood up. Miranda was barely recognizable anymore as herself. Six months ago she'd been svelte and curvaceous, looking like professional model in her early twenties. Now she was a milky mountain of pudge that looked her actual late thirties age, small irregularities that her engineered genes had protected her from were making their mark: a little dusting of adult acne was on her bulbous cheeks, she had bags under her eyes and the start of crows feet on their sides. Sharply plucked eyebrows had grown bushy and thick, while her lustrous black hair had lost its sheen and hung in a limp pony tail, with a tiny sliver of silver just barely visible in it. Even her shining blue eyes were duller, slowly fading towards brown.

Liara felt guilt spill through her heart. Miranda had, out of the goodness of her heart, transformed Liara from a quarter ton pile of blue blubber barely able to get up off the couch, into a a still very overweight but decently in shape Asari on track to keep losing weight and with a near normal blood pressure. She hadn't even had a craving lately, all while Miranda had transformed into the very thing she was trying to help Shepard and Liara lose. Why she was oblivious to her transformation, Liara had no idea, but she had to tell the once perfect woman she'd turned into a parody of herself.

'I said keep it up blue berry!' Miranda yelled from the side as Liara slowed, waddling over with the rasp of her cellulite layered thighs joining the blue woman in her jog.

'Sorry,' the shadow broker covered as she watched the once perfect woman wobble, 'just got a little tired...'

'Well that big ass doesn't look tired of being enormous, does it?' the brunette told the alien, punctuating the tease with a slap of Liara's meaty backside.

'I've lost two hundred pounds!' Liara interjected, noticing that sweat had begun pouring off Miranda's body.

'And you've got a hundred, *huff* a hundred and seventy to go, don't you lard *huff* ass?' the spy panted, already completely out of breath, 'if...if you *puff* want to be as skinny as me...*huff* you'll... *urf* keep *ugh*.'

Miranda stopped dead in her tracks, hands on her knees and gasping in and out as quick as she could. Lungs burning, heart pounding, joints complaining and vision filling with spots. Liara stood watching, wondering if the brunette was having a heart attack when Miranda locked eyes with her.

'My *ugh* cramp, isn't *ufff* an *ugh* excuse,' the spy wheezed, explaining away her inability to jog a hundred feet, 'to *uff* stop *huff* lard ass!'

Liara turned and kept jogging, thighs slapping together and brow furrowed. Her fat body jogged and wobbled, but the fury of the shadow broker was building inside her. She'd been willing to help Miranda but now...well, leaving her to her own devices was the least revenge she could get. She might even super charge the now porcine Miranda's gain...

1121132212221121.content:
While Miranda spent the rest of the afternoon stuffing herself, replacing the tides of sweat a hundred feet of running had made pour out of her body with well over a gallon of the caffeinated corn syrup humans called soda, Liara planned.

While the former specter and former shadow broker ate the tiny balsamic salads and carrot sticks for their dinner and Miranda Lawson seamlessly transitioned from eating a bag of potato chips to mowing down a full pound burger (with a quarter pound of blue cheese) that had an order of fries, an order of fried stuffed mushrooms and an order of onion rings both on the burger and the side to eating five scoops of triple fudge ice cream drowned in chocolate sauce, whip cream and walnuts to popping open a new bag of chips before the grease that had dribbled on her sagging udders had even dried, Liara planned.

While Shepard and Liara began a long love making session made easier by the cumulative loss of 500 or so pounds, Liara was planning even as she had her face between Shepard's still pillowy but much stronger thighs.

When the freckled heroine had at last passed out, the Asari forced herself to get off their shared king size bed. She stood relatively easily, the lightened fat load and the new strength in her thigh muscles making the task as mundane as it should be, and crept down to the kitchen. Miranda had set up a staggering array of alarms and locks on the fridge, but the while the Shadow Broker had become medically obese she was still a dangerous hacker. She deprogrammed them (and to the credit of Miranda's diet, had no temptation to even look at the smorgashboard of snacks) gathered four sticks of butter and soon had the stove sizzling and the fridge relocked.

A moment later, she crept up the stairs bearing a funnel and a large bowl filled with three thousand plus calories of warm butter. Part of her felt guilty, before Miranda had arrived the stairs were becoming a no go zone for her ludicrously unfit figure, but the slap on her ass burned in the Asari's mind. Miranda called her fat ass? Well, it was time to show that cerberus bitch what a fat ass really was.

Liara had no need for stealth, the raccuous snoring and grunts that came from Miranda's open mouth covered up any noise the grumbles from her overloaded stomach didn't.The pale brunette was passed out on her bed, an ice burg of dough surrounded by a sea of empty food wrappers and soda bottles, her mouth a ring of chocolate. She was clad in a lacey black nighty fit for a woman a hundred pounds lighter, it was fraying on every seam and her sensitive white skin was beat red where the bra and panties dug into her body. Seeing the perfect beauty reduced to such a state made Liara feel wet despite the thorough orgasm she'd just had. Miranda was so soft, so bulging, so layered in cellulite across her hips, that Liara's thoroughly chubby chasing libido was thoroughly turned on. It also made her reconsider what she was doing.

An extra three thousand calories a night wouldn't even be noticed on this lardass. No, Liara would have to do even more. This would just be a start.

'Call me a fat ass?' the feeder Asari whispered as Miranda started sucking down butter, 'well, if I and Eileen have to be thin again, I'm going to make you so fat you won't even be able to get up.'

...

Miranda woke up well before dawn, the sole remnant from her previously well regimented life. She found she had a slightly upset stomach, which she wrote off as from a punishing ab work out she'd imagined herself doing the day before. Atrophied muscles struggled a moment against the giant belly and enormous breasts pinning her down, then rolled slowly over with a huff and the rattle of wrappers sliding off the bed, then the slight smack of her strechmark coated double belly hitting her tree trunk thighs. With a grunt and the creak of joints, the pathetically out of shape woman stood up and in her mind she sprang lightly to her feet as ever.

Waddling out of her room on weak swollen legs, in her mind strutting with long, strong stems, the brunette snatched up a box of doughnuts strategically placed by Liara the night before. Half of the custard filled callorie bombs were gone by the time Miranda's slow pace got her to the guest bathroom of Shepard's mansion like home, pausing only to knock on the doors of Liara and Eileen's shared bed room to awaken them for their work out.

'Fatties would lay in bed eating all day without me,' the Cerberus operative chuckled, plunging another doughnut into her mouth and waddling on, the divided bulge of her gut pressing open the bathroom door before her slow moving hand could stop shoving pastry down her throat, 'can't believe they let themselves go like that.'

The guest bathroom had a full length mirror opposite the door and Miranda preened in front of it as she polished off the last of the calorie bombs. To her eyes she appeared as he always was:a tall, breathtakingly gorgeous woman in her early twenties, balanced perfectly on the triple edges of curves, slimness and muscle. Lustrous, silky and shiny black locks that looked perfect even on waking up framing a stunningly smooth face of angular cheek bones, a sharp chin, narrow brows and big blue eyes that belonged on a magazine cover. While the round double Ds sitting perfectly in their lace cups, a long hour glass torso with a narrow waist and firm muscles, girlihsly round hips and the long slim thighs of a sprinter belonged on a very different type of magazine. She turned around, inspecting the twin hemispheres of her perfect booty displayed by the thong. Satisfied, she gave the flawless ass a smack and then lifted up her shirt to inspect her equally superb abdominals, flexing the six pack.

'I was afraid all their junk food would rub off on me,' she laughed, failing to find even the slightest layer of fat on the firm abs, 'but I really am perfect after all. It almost seems a waste to keep this perfection here on its lonesome, but those two would eat themselves even fat again without me watching them like a hawk.'

Outside of the Cerberus operative's eternal illusion was a different matter. The real reflection had horrible posture, round shoulders slumped under their load. Her dull, course brown/black hair was a limp mop of greasy split ends, with a dotting of grey at the roots. Slight crows feet at the corners of her at best hazel eyes complimented the heavy bags under the piggish orbs, showing her real age of thirty nine. Red bumps and white heads were spreading up from her cheeks and onto her forehead, an untreated adult acne outbreak growing farther every day. Naturally narrow, arched brows had grown wide and wooly, a thickening spatter of hairs in between them promising a mono brow in the near future.

And that was even before her weight.

Her diamond shaped face had become round and slovenly, the cheeks bulging out like a chipmunk even in the scant times they weren't full of food. The sharp chin was buried under a heavy hanging jowl that plunged out further every day and the swan like neck was thick as a line backers. Slim shoulders were soft and puffy, leading into the arms not of a skilled fighter but into the wobbling limbs of a lunch lady, her increasing bingo wings looking soft as bags of frosting and leading down to clumsily plump fingers.

The F cup bra was stupidly too small, mounds of striated fat mushrooming out above, beneath and to the side of its fraying black lace.One bra strap had broken as she'd waddled to bed with arms full of treats the past night and on the front only one snap remained bound. As Miranda took a shallow breath, deep as she could get as her body began to develop asthma per its genetic protocol, the snap popped and her breasts surged free.

'What is with the fabric on this planet?' Miranda sighed, 'this is the third piece of clothes this week!'

She took off what to her mind was a 34 DD bra, her brain refusing to read the letters that said 42 I. The breasts she saw in the mirror looked high, totally symmetrical and tight, the small pink nipples pointing up. In reality the veiny milk mountains hung straight down to rest on her bloated gut, the brown nipples stretched to saucer size. Stretch marks covered their sides and her right breast hung a few inches behind the left.

Stripping off the size twenty six nighty she would have sworn was a size four, the porcine agent waddled towards the scale as she started the shower, puffing from the slight effort of disrobing. She didn't notice how her elephantine ass cheeks, resembling trashbags eighty percent filled with melted marshmellows, and beef cow hips knocked over a soap dispenser as she squeezed by the sink. And when she stood on the scale, she looked past her pert funbags to see it say '135 lbs'.

'Hmm, I'm taking it a little too hard working those porkers,' the obese woman said idly patting what she thought were firm breasts, 'I need to put on a few pounds or the girls will start deflating.'

In reality, the flabby woman was looking down at where her sagging breasts rested upon her stupendous gut. Permanently bloated with junk food, the more than doubled waist had a clear bifurcating roll that had blocked out view of her bloated feet for a month and a half and cast a shadow over the blue numbers reading '341'.

Miranda squeezed into the shower, moving awkward with an extra 200 plus pounds stuck to her body. Before a few minutes under the hot water had passed, her hamhock thighs and bloated cankles had started trembling from keeping her poundage upright for half an hour. She plopped down onto the rest seat Liara had had installed long ago.

'Can't believe these fatsos need shower seats,' Miranda laughed, while rubbing soap across the many folds of her apron gut.

It took a long time to subconsciously clean her bulk and when the porcine brunette waddled out, a robe barely buckled in the front of her clothes, she wheezed down stairs to find...
1121132212221121.title: Liara further sabotages Miranda

11211322122211211.content:
'What is this?' Miranda demanded, raising one bushy eyebrow as she saw a large chrome chair replete with cup holders hovering in the living room, Liara's still mammoth booty pressing against a pair of shorts as she programmed it.

'Oh, Miri,' the Asari said, 'I didn't hear you coming down.'

'Yeah, unlike you I don't make the stairs creak as I walk down,' the porcine brunette bragged, as she stepped down off the creaking stairs, 'but what is this?'

'Oh, well, its a director's hover chair,' Liara said, drinking in the sagging canyon of cleavage Miranda had thoughtlessly on display, 'you've been...well you've been looking a little thin lately and I'm worried about you injuring yourself. We need to do cardio all day to try and lose all of this fat, but you were already in great shape. Exercising that hard could injure you or make you underweight.'

Unexpectedly the hallucinating brunette agreed, 'You're right, I've been overdoing it. I'm sore all the time from over exerting myself and I've lost five pounds in the last couple weeks, can you believe it? The scale said I was 135 lbs and at my height I'm almost underweight. If I lose anything it'll be either muscle or curves I don't want to lose.'

Liara would have been surprised if Miranda had any muscle at all beneath that flab, but she merely smiled as the slightly heavier (for now) human waddled up and sank into the hovering chair, bean bag buns hanging over the arm rests fit for a regular human. It dipped dangerously low before its engines recalibrated, on board computer moving it into the Krogan class. Several whirs from the seat sounded as it widened out and shaped itself into Miranda's sprawling ass and waist-thick thighs, becoming perfectly comfortable and beginning to massage her sore back.

'Oh this feels great,' the fat woman sighed, 'oooff, I don't want to ever get out of this.'

'Great, I was thinking though that well...my weight is starting to plateau,' Liara lied, for with the drugs out of her system she'd been shedding weight like water, 'how about some supplements to get my metabolism super charged?'

'Ummm....good idea,' Miranda sighed, half asleep as the the hovering chair began massaging her swollen ankles.

'I'll order them now but...how about anything for you?' Liara pressed, 'I hate to say it but you've gotten a bit...'

'A bit what?' the hazel eyed woman said.

'Well, I hate to say this but your element zero tanks don't look like they're full,' Liara said, nodding towards the veiny stretched out fat bags, 'and your hips and butt...they've gotten a bit boyish. How about some supplements to get you your curves back.'

'Hmmm, I think you're right,' Miranda, her hallucinating mind very suggestible, 'I'd hate to lose my backside.'

'I'll get right on that,' Liara promised, waddling off towards the kitchen 'then I better make breakfast.'

'No, I should do that,' the obese spy complained, making her chair spin around, 'you two can't be trusted until youre thin again.'

'But you spend so much effort cooking for us,' Liara said, even though she and shepard were usually served raw salad and Miranda either reheated or ordered out for herself, 'so I had another thought...'

A skeletal robot whirred out of the kitchen, bearing what looked like two small salads and one medium salad to Miranda and two small salads and a full english breakfast of a half dozen fried eggs, a slab of bacon, a dozen sausage links and patties each, a six egg omelette and a mountain of hashbrowns drowned in barbecue sauce, with a 24 oz cup of hot cocoa drowning in whip cream to Liara.

'You bought a robot helper?' Miranda asked, 'aren't those for lazy people?'

'Maybe, but hey, you don't need to be our maid as well as our coach,' Liara lied, 'you focus on getting us thin and let it handle the cooking and cleaning.'

'Great idea,' Miri nodded, digging in greedily, 'hey, sorry I called you a fat ass yesterday.'

'Oh?' Liara asked, caught off guard by an apology from the abrasive woman.

'You've lost a ton of weight and deserve to have that rewarded,' Miranda murmured through a full mouth, 'I've got to be mean to get you going though when your body wants to quit. I'll do anything to get you two back in tip top shape again.'

'Well, thank you...' Liara said, shame suddenly filling her as she watched her coach continue eating.

'Miri I've got to tell you something...,' she said quietly, too quietly for the brunette to pick up over the whirr of her seats repulsors.

'But you've got to admit its kinda funny,' Miranda laughed.

'What's funny?' the asari asked.

'Your ass. I mean, it was almost as nice as mine is,' Miranda continued, shoveling in fried eggs, 'but now its like a big blue bean bag behind you. Even when you've lost all that weight your still just gigantic back there. Did you have to tell me something?'

'The scale upstairs is a little inaccurate,' Liara seamlessly lied, 'it says your about ten pounds heavier than you are.'

'That would explain somethings,' Miranda muttered through the bacon, 'I've felt tired all the time lately, like i'm carrying weights around.'

'Better not workout with us today then,' the Asari said, as if Miranda had done that in the past three months, 'you don't want to get too thin.'

....

Eileen strolled out of the house, locking the doors behind the parade of fatties. Her stomach grumbled with hunger but she shushed it, she couldn't believe how fat she'd gotten in the last year. It almost defied belief that someone could get so fat so fast. That she'd been almost eight hundred pounds at her biggest...

'Jeesh,' she whispered to herself, feeling heat rise between her thighs.

It was like one of the ancient stories she'd found buried in the internet, from the fat fetishest sites of the obesity epidemic before its cure with the creation of nanites. She'd been enormous, mammoth and obscene, a pig of a woman like she'd always dreamed of banging. She'd never expected to be the fat one in any relationship, she'd been too ashamed to ever admit her secret fetish to anyone. But with Liara pampering her and then beginning to plump up alongside her, it had been a dream. She'd been having fat sex every night, the best sex she could imagine as pendous breasts and mushroom asses and billuous rolls bounced and surged against each other and never have to admit she liked fat girls.

Granted, she knew she should do something when she'd gotten too big to get up on her own, but she'd known that when her feet had disappeared and the first time she got stuck in a doorway. Even as she'd wanted to try and take a more dominant role she'd also enjoyed being pampered and plushed into near helplessness. She was happy that she was getting into the more manageable four hundreds now, instead of pressing in on a half ton but she was missing the weight that had been on Liara. Her 'little blue berry' being a mere three hundred pounds, able to easily go up and down stairs and do easy chores, was a bit saddened. Yeah her hip measurements were still about fifty inches and her barely increased E cups sagged crazily, but she wasn't huge anymore.

'That's why i'm working out,' the quarter ton Shepard thought to herself, 'to get into the best shape of my life so I can get Liara bigger than I ever was and take care of her. I can thank Miri for that at least, even if she is making Liara skinny.'

'Ugh, who put the seat up so far?' Miranda grunted from the front of the hover car.

Having slid gracelessly from the hover chair, almost falling, the obese ex agent was trying to shove her mountain of a gut into the car. It hit the horn at least three times before the milk-white tide of lard settled in finally and started buckling her seat belt over her gut. As Shepard began sliding her own wobbling mass in on the other side, even with her revitalized muscles it was no easy feat to shove five hundred pounds into a space meant for two hundred at most, she noticed that Miranda was red faced and panting, sweat running down her face and pooling in her straining sports bra.

As the cerberus spy began chugging a two liter soda, Shepard reflected that she really didn't want to cheat on Liara. Her little blue berry was kind and caring and sweet as honey. Even if she'd staid a svelte 120 Eileen would have loved her. Miranda on the other hand, was abrasive, cold and aloof. But her heavy breasts and super sized booty had gotten Eileen's mass effect drive running since she'd first laid eyes on the hour glass brunette. Efforts to get into the brunettes pants had been for not, as had half hearted attempts to get the perfect woman to soften up a little back on the Normandy 2.

So seeing her all day in sports ware was invigorating to Eileen's libido. Especially as Miranda began to obliviously balloon into a butter ball at a blistering pace. Miranda's ass was nearly the equal of Liara's, while her freshly doubled belly was a thick apron even now pressing against the wheel and she had the biggest tits Shepard had ever seen that weren't on herself. Her face had gone from photoshoot ready at all times to at best plain if you didn't count the pimples.

'Get your fat rolls off the gear shift,' Miranda chided Liara, as her chubby fingers pried the stick out from between the tiny space left by their joint hip bulges, 'if the car will even lift given how you tilt it.'

Eileen caught the anger in Liara's eyes and how the sweaty Miranda started drinking yet another soda. Why the vain woman wasn't noticing her own transformation was a mystery to her, but...what if she could speed it up?

And as for Liara...well...three hundred would be a good spot for her friend to rebound up from, wouldn't it?

1121132212221122.content:
Liara shook her head at the thought at the furthering the ex-Cerberus operative's gain. She was angry, yes but the only reason Miranda was even in this situation was because of her...and that guilt was enough to curb her anger but not completely eradicate it. She'd leave Miranda alone, at least for now. She jogged on, determined to put some distance between herself and the large brunette.

For her part, Miranda was still pulling herself together. As she huffed and puffed, some buried part of her psyche wailed. Despite the changes to her genetics due to her cruel father's fail safe, that had not overridden every aspect of Miranda's mind, just most it. Her genetically induced ignorance wasn't meant to be complete nor last forever. As such, the parts of her that made up the Miranda Lawson, the perfect woman, the perfect heir of the Lawson dynasty and one of the most beautiful and capable women in the entire galaxy was were still there, even if they had been shunted to the backseat.

And those parts, cried. In anger and in despair. If said parts could have been given a voice, a way to speak, they'd roared themselves raw in several different languages. They'd bemoan her current pathetic state, berate themselves for allowing this to happen, resolve to herself moving with Shepard and Liara and so very much more. Alas, such thoughts were trapped behind a wall of enforced indulgence and gluttony, crying out to nothing and wouldn't be heard until it was far too late.

To Miranda's current state, all she could really think about the next thing she was going to eat.

"I *uff* really go...*ooh*...for a chili-dog *huff* or five..." She panted out to herself as she started awkwardly shuffle herself off to her next meal...
1121132212221122.title: Miranda is left to her own gluttonous devices.

choices: ...she realized that she was getting fatter at a rapid pace.
...she was back at her old pre-Miranda size.
11211322122211221.content:
Genetic tampering is a fickle thing. If Liara remembered that, then she probably would have tried more forcefully to get Miranda to stop before she hit that five hundred pound wall.

But the wall came, late at night after Liara and Shepard had retired following a day's workout, one that helped Shepard dropped down to a comfortably obese four hundred thirteen and her blue lover down to a pudgy two forty-five. While those two lay entwined in each other's arms, Miranda's genetic failsafe had gotten her out of bed and into the kitchen, where she gorged herself on a big chocolate cake without a care in the world. As the food slowly digested and became fat, the nanobots finally reached that golden number and shut the whole system down. Mid-bite, Miranda was hit with the full knowledge of everything that happened, every gorge session and every roll of fat that blossomed on her perfect body as the part of herself that knew what went on finally snapped to attention. Look what you've done, it seemed to scream at her. Look at the hog you've turned into.

Miranda was too stunned to even speak. She ran to the bathroom, the floor rumbling from her heavy footfalls, especially as she lost her balance, unfamiliar with her new immense weight. Switching on the light, she glanced at herself in the mirror with horror. What was once a slender, lithe figure was a heaping mass of fat, rolls upon rolls of belly poured on top of an ass and thighs that could crush chairs under their girth. Slim muscular arms drowned in a sea of arm fat. Wrists and ankles suffocated by the fat spilling over them. Her face...her perfect, perfect, face...a bloated, flabby mess, swaddled in chins and dominated by a pair of apple-sized cheeks. She..she wanted to scream, but the sound caught in her throat. She couldn't speak, she couldn't breath...

"I..." she gasped. "I...I l-look..."

And in that moment, something snapped. Not her belt or her pants, as one would expect, but her personality. The fail-safe implanted by her father to make her want to gorge didn't just suppress the voice upset with her getting fat, it suppressed everything. And when the dam finally burst and her thoughts came flooding back, everything became mixed up in a turbulent slurry of emotion and personality. That was a part of the fail-safe, to make Miranda mentally collapse and thus easier to recapture and "fix", but her perfect psyche was too good to be scrambled like that and managed to keep Miranda's mental state together...and it retained a little bit of the fail-safe's coding to amplify what was already there, namely the desire to gorge and grow fat. Essentially, Miranda reached an epiphany thanks to a failing fail-safe, and when she looked at her tremendous form, overflowing with creamy, soft fat, she found the words to finish what she was saying.

"I look hot!"

With an uncharacteristic giggle, the new Miranda put her arms behind her head, shaking her tremendous belly in front of the mirror with glee.

"I'm so big and huge...why did I ever want to go on diets and work out? I look so damn good at this size!"

"Mmmhmm...Miranda? Is something up?"

Miranda spun around, dropping down her arms at once as Liara stepped around the doorframe. Miranda looked at the pudge collecting around her waste with renewed interest, remembering how much of it there was when she started. She had been the fattest Asari in the galaxy, she remembered saying.

And she will be again.

"You feeling alright?" Liara asked, suspicious of her perkiness.

"Oh, I'm just fine, Liara," Miranda said, cheerfully wiping chocolate icing off her lips. "I'm just excited for the new workout program for tomorrow!"

"New program?" the Asari said suspiciously. "But what's wrong with the old-"

"Don't you worry about it, darling," Miranda interrupted, waddling over to place her hands on Liara's shoulders and lead her out of the bathroom. "With the new program, we'll be getting you into the right shape in no time~."

Liara stared, incredibly suspicious, but her loud yawn convinced her that it was too late to worry about now. And as she left to join Shepard in repose, Miranda immediately doubled back to the fridge and began to plot. She'd done so much damage to their figures already, Miranda thought to herself as she remembered how they filled out the sofa when she arrived. They had a lot of work to do before they got all those succulent rolls and curves back.

And as Liara drifted off to sleep, unaware of Miranda's newfound chubby chasing attitude, she was none the wiser until...
11211322122211221.title: Miranda Snaps

choices: Liara arrives at breakfast and confronts Miranda directly!
Liara arrives at breakfast and gets distracted by the food.
Liara arrives at breakfast and finds Miranda turning it up a notch...?
112113221222112211.content:
"Break time, ladies!"

Liara and Shepard slowed to a stop, panting heavily but feeling a bit confused.

"Was that ten laps already?" Shepard asked, doubling over as she tried to catch her breath. "It felt more like five..."

"Mmm," Miranda Lawson mumbled, distracted by the rolls of Shepard's stomach scrunching up as she leaned down, a rather hungry look in her eyes.

"Miranda?"

"Oh, sorry!" the morbidly obese operative spouted cheerily. "Must have dozed off for a moment. Feeling a bit...under the weather."

Liara barely paid any attention to the conversation, too distracted by the suspicious circumstances. For weeks now Miranda had been a rude, sloppy mess hundreds of pounds overweight, but ever since the Asari bumped into her last night, too sleepy to really pay attention, she seemed quite different. She was still hugely fat of course, that couldn't change overnight without a special surgery, but out of the blue she suddenly seemed...nice. She didn't squawk about how out of shape they were compared to her or put them down for not working out hard enough. On the contrary, she almost asked them to come outside and run laps, and only after making sure Shepard and Liara both had a good healthy breakfast.

Hell, she even looked better too. As opposed to the stained jumpsuit with holes torn in it that she used to wear, she swapped into a voluminous shirt and short shorts combo with the same hexagon pattern as her old outfit that was big enough to actually fit her girth, hugging her couch-crushing rear end snugly while supporting the triple belly pouring over her waistband. It even looked like she'd had a good long shower since the last time they saw her; the markings and age lines on her face had faded, and her hair was back to being full and luscious, flowing down either side of her face and draping over the nearly flawless skin on her chipmunk cheeks.

I supposed that was the silver lining to ruining her waistline, Liara thought guiltily to herself. She got to keep that flawless complexion. Maybe her age-defying nanites finally caught up to her growing girth.

"Now, we have to keep your energy up, ladies!" Miranda announced, waddling towards them with a pair of drink cups. "Staying hydrated is key!"

Liara nonchalantly grabbed the drink cup and took a big swig, but nearly gagged at the sudden taste. She thought it was something rancid that caught in her throat before her senses re-tuned and realized that whatever she drank was...

"Wow, sweet!" Shepard exclaimed, exhaling after taking a swig. "What's in this stuff?"

"Oh just energy drink stuff," Miranda explained, a smile creasing her lips. "It's sweet and it'll help you keep up your energy for your workouts!"

"Wow, awesome!" the former Commander exclaimed, taking another big swig. Liara stared at the cup incredulously, wondering what exactly was going on.

"Is something wrong Liara?" Miranda asked, wobbling towards the now slightly chubby Asari.

"Er, nothing Miranda," she said, chewing her lower lip to pieces out of guilt. "I guess that...uh..."

"Hey, I'm trying to get you guys in the best shape of your lives," Miranda explained, her eyes shifting slightly at the idea. "It's a little unorthodox but I think we'll both enjoy the results you get from this health plan."

Liara sighed, taking another sip of the sugary drink. On the second taste, it actually was pretty good, come to think of it.

'Whatever you say Miranda..."

---

"Rise and shine, Liara!" Miranda called from the living room. "Shepard's already starting her workout, hurry up or you'll be late!"

"C-coming!" Liara called out, still staring at the bathroom scale, the one Miranda had insisted on before her diet plan changed. At first the Asari thought she was imaging things, and her sluggishness was just due to the change of their workout plan, but after seeing how much of the bed Shepard filled last night...

Trying to see past the curve of her belly for the first time in a while, Liara finally caught sight of the numbers; a cheery two hundred twelve.

"How did I gain fifteen pounds back in a couple of days?" the Asari murmured under her breath. "That's....not even possible..."

"Liaaaaaara!"

"C-coming!"
