Liara half expected to see cracks forming under her portly feet, nearly being swallowed by her calves.

In short, Tali was fat. Monstrously fat. Almost as fat as Liara was weeks ago, before Jack showed up.

"And here I was, worried how you'd react to seeing me this size!" Tali giggled nervously, rubbing her hands down her flowing thighs. "I had no idea you two were even bigger!"

BRAAAAP

In timing that almost seemed comedic, Miranda waddled her way out of the kitchen, food stains running down her face as she stuffed it full of potato chips from an oversized bag. Coming to a dead stop at the sight of Tali, now notably fatter then even the five hundred point, food addicted secret agent, the sight was enough to make Miranda's single-minded obsession with food slip for just a moment.

"Bloody hell...and I thought I let myself go..."

----

Next stop on this wild ride...

What's Up With the Weight: Tali explains the backstory behind her ultra-obesity, and why she's so excited about it, as she finishes up with the gravity generators.

Cheerleader on the Rebound: Uh oh...the shock from seeing Tali wasn't a temporary thing. Miranda is coming back to her senses, and she's NOT going to be happy!

My Ideas Are Better (Free Choice): I'll be slightly hurt if you pick this one, but with the right therapy I think I can come to forgive you.
11211322123111121131222111.title: One Ample Admiral, Coming Up

choices: Liara doesn't feel much of a change...what gives?
112113221231111211312221111.content:
How fitting that Tali's size reminded her of their meeting with Jack, because her reaction to Liara's massive size was a pretty dead ringer for Liara's reaction to the shocking transformation of the Quarian engineer. Liara didn't even move to stop the mechs as they automatically resumed feeding her after Tali waddled off into the back to work, chewing and swallowing on instinct as she continued her thousand-yard stare.

"First us, then Miranda, and now Tali," Shepard commented, lowering her bulk into a sagging loveseat across from Liara's cusion and taking one end of link of sausages that one of her LOKI's looped around its neck, beginning to swallow them down one after the other. "Don't you just love retirement?"

"Tali's not retired though, she's an acting admiral and a leader in the Quarian rebuilding effort on Rannoch," Miranda pointed, uncharacteristically stopping herself from devouring a pastry in a messy fashion to speak clearly. "I did not even think Quarians could get fat, let alone to THAT size..."

"There has to....*glomph*...be a way....*urmph*...to ask her....*burrf*....tactfully...." Shepard panted, swallowing one sausage link after another as she fed it down her throat like a rope on a winch. "Liara honey, think you can turn on that old charm and find out?"

"BWAAAAAAAAARP..."

"That's the spirit!"

Letting the conversation lapse to eat, naturally, the three ladies became so engrossed with their food that they almost didn't notice Tali waddling over to the floor tiles next to Liara, dutifully followed by a helper drone with an omni-tool suite to match the one Tali sported. Bending over to remove the floor and presumably insert a grav generator, the Asari enjoyed an eyeful of the Quarian's enormous rear, her suit audibly creaking as it strained to keep cheeks that could have easily filled up the sofa Liara crushed under her mass a month ago. The Asari's mouth went dry at the dirty thoughts springing into her head, so she tried to quell them by breaking the ice as opposed to the furniture. After a few moments of blissful stuffing, Liara lifted her hand weakly to halt the endless march of food so she could chew the fat, so to say.

"So...uh...." Liara huffed. "Those seem...small..."

"Small, but powerful!" Tali insisted, straightening up at a steady, even pace. "These are derived from the artificial gravity generators we had on the migrant fleet, perfect for when space is a limited commodity. And not to make judgements, but I think that you would appreciate that notion." Reaching out, Tali slapped the side of the giant Asari's exposed belly, sending out a rippling wave of blubber from the hit and knocking loose a small belch, making Tali giggle and Liara turn slightly purple.

She's certainly less reserved then she was nine hundred or so pounds ago. Liara thought to herself as Tali produced a couple of rings, somewhat resembling the device used to project omni-tools. "Anyway, I think the generators are all set, these mini-tools have a remote connection you can use to adjust gravity higher or lower. They're flexible, so you can just stretch it around your hand."

"That's good..." Liara said, noting that she could have barely fit a couple fingers through the device at its normal size. She almost said something about probably not being able to reach her arm with her other hand, but Tali solved the issue by stepping forward to snap it on it for her, despite the impressive amount of blubber on Liara's forearms, it fit neatly.

"You gave this a lot of thought, I see," Miranda commented, attaching her own wrist device herself as Shepard only just managed to reach past her flabby front to slip the device on.

"Well, it's become sort of a necessity, between the end of rationing, the economic boom, and the Geth helping to automate the labor intensive work on Rannoch," Tali explained. "Our species is getting heavier at an astonishing rate, necessitating devices to help us manage it. I'd have been pinned underneath myself a long time ago if it weren't for these." Tali gestured to her chubby legs, which Liara noticed seemed to have devices similar to the ones Tali was installing underneath the floor attached to her boots.

"That's...alarming," Shepard suggested.

"Alarming? It's incredible!" Tali retorted. "There's finally enough food to go around, and our people are prospering instead of starving! It's something I'd never thought I'd see in my lifetime!" She tenderly rubbed her huge flanks with one hand. "I...never thought I'd get to experience the sensation of being full, of being stuffed senseless, not just having enough to eat, but having TOO much."

"Wait," Miranda interjected. "So...all this happened because you WANTED it to happen?" Liara and Shepard winced at Miranda's blunt question but Tali didn't seem to mind. Far from it, she seemed practically giddy.

"Oh, of course I wanted it!" the Quarian declared with unrestrained glee. "Look at all of this fat, so soft and round and warm...I wanted more of it the moment I realized I had it! I wanted to grow so big I needed a new suit, to waddle instead of walking, to crush things under my weight when I sit down!" Burning through a few last-minute calculations, she drew herself closer to Liara, or as close as their respective bulks would allow.

"I still remember waking up one day...and not being able to get up," Tali said, her voice trembling with excitement. "Keelah, I could have died right there and it would be next to heaven. I had to install some of these gravity generators to function of course, but to be honest...I like it better when they're off."

"Erm, well...I'd like to be able to move about a little bit easier, personally," Liara said, trying to force a smile.

"Don't knock it til you try it!" Tali said gleefully. "That's how the human phrase goes, right Shepard?"

"BUUUUUURP."

"I will take that as a yes." Tali took a moment to double check all the systems, then looked over at Liara excitedly. "Everything's set up, booting the grav drives now, you'll be able to feel the change in three....two....one...!"
112113221231111211312221111.title: What's Up With the Weight

1121132212311112113122211111.content:
A deep resonance hummed and slowly subsided as the drives activated. A fluttery sensation swept through the mansion’s residents like that of a quickly descending elevator. As Liara took a sharp breath, she noticed a great weight was lifted from her chest. Her breathing felt lighter, easier, airier. Lifting a lardy arm high above her head, it felt as if the fat deposits were filled with air.

“Feels weird at first, right?” Tali noted through her thick accent. “You get so used to that heavy feeling that it almost feels wrong to be light again, like your fat is just fluff.”

“I have to admit Tali, I’m damn well impressed!” Shepard said, rising to her feet as if it were nothing. She twisted back and forth with audible pops coming from her spine. Reaching her arms into the air, she pulled an effortless plantar flexion. Liara noted how Shepard’s fat had much less sag than it used to, almost like she was floating in water.

The sensation of fat on Liara’s body was no longer like lugging around sacks of weight, but more like wearing an immense suit made of foam cushions that restricted her body’s full range of motion. With an awkward struggle, Liara lifted herself off of the floor and onto her feet and felt light as air. Over two thousand pounds of flab and it felt like she hadn’t gained an ounce. It felt... wrong. “I see what you mean now.”

“These little saviors are Personal Gravity Devices, or PGS for short,” she explained, motioning to her own wristband. “They link up to the grav drives installed to your floor and adjust your body’s weight as requested. Just personal preference, but I try not to dip beneath a few hundred pounds or I tend to feel all floaty. Kinda like that,” Tali suggested as she watched Shepard test her mobility. The ex-commander was now leaping several feet into the air to do jumping jacks while Miranda bound around like she was on the moon. Their flab rippled like watery waves with every motion.

Liara lifted a wrist above her billowing breasts to look at her PGD and adjusted until she was at a comfortable weight.

"We really owe you one Tali," Shepard said. "I know you're needed back at the Flotilla but you'd be welcome to stay if you'd like."
1121132212311112113122211111.title: Lightening the Load

choices: This is the part where she kills you!
11211322123111121131222111113.content:
As the pod of whales inhabiting the mansion distracted themselves with the PGD's, they missed the notices from the security system informing them that two people were coming up to the front door. Fortunately, they were friendly faces, though one of them was rather reluctant.

"Seriously, this is a bad idea," Jack insisted, bouncing nervously on her heels as she traipsed up the front steps. "Like, do you seriously need to tell her in person?"

"Of course I do, she's my sister!" Oriana said, admonishing her lover. "And yes you're coming with me, we're telling her together."

"I mean...fine but... you know she's..."

"And I know she's gotten fat, J," Oriana continued. "I've been talking with Shepard about some Reaper tech, remember? I know that they're all massive at this point, so if you're worried about me being shocked or something-"

Blinking, relief echoed across Jack's face as she was relieved of the burden of bringing up the elephant in the room, or rather, the three elephants in the mansion. "Well, honestly," Jack said with a sly grin. Now I'm worried about how well you're taking it."

"I'm a designer baby who managed to live through an attempt to wipe out all life in the galaxy by a race of giant robot squids" Oriana said bluntly. "Seeing someone who weighs a ton at this point is just quaint."

"If you say so," Jack shrugged. "Let's just spring the news and jet, I need to get some grading done when we get home."

"Not going to stay and have a bite?" Oriana winked as she rapped gently on the door.

"Har har," Jack said sarcastically, though with a little ghost of a grin on her face. "Bet you'd love to see this ass getting bigger, wouldn't you?" Jack wiggled her skinny tush up against Oriana's hip, quickly pulling herself away when the door suddenly turned and opened, revealing the obedient little LOKI bot.

"Hello, Jack and Miss Lawson," the robot chirped. "Please, come in. The mistresses are in the back with the Admiral."

"Can you get my sister, please?" Oriana asked.

"Certainly, madam, she's right in the front kitchen."

As the two milled about waiting for the robot to return, Jack felt a weird mixture of nervous and excited anticipation. Miranda being a fat slob was a hilarious mental image and would probably make her day, but Jack still remembered why she needed Liara and Shepard to distract her in the first place. To say Miranda was upset about Jack dating her beloved sister behind her back for quite some time was an understatement, and it was frankly a miracle that the hugely obese blobs that were her former teammates had kept Miranda's belly full enough that the ex-Cerberus operative didn't burst through her window and try to atomize her.

Jack was shaken from her thoughts by heavy footsteps coming from the kitchen along with the sounds of chewing and swallowing, then...

"Ori?"

"MIRI!"

Oriana ran over and jumped on her big sister, sinking her knee into the belly hiding Miranda's legs as she wrapped her arms around Miranda's neck, a tricky feat considering she had to reach across her massive breasts to do so. Handing her hoagie off to the robot, Miranda wrapped her arms as best she could around her sister as well, somewhat hampered by how thick the fat blocking her elbows were. Jack let out a little snort but hid her amusement at the whale Miranda well, clearly close to or surpassing a quarter ton at this point.

"You look, uh, great!" Oriana said, a little falter in her voice.

"I feel great!" her big sister said happily, her chin tripling as she let out a hearty burp that made Oriana wince. Smiling, Miranda turned to Jack. "Hi Jack, nice to see you too!"

"Uh, hi," Jack replied, awkwardly waving her hand. She was kind of surprised at how...uneventful it was. Maybe she'd not only been distracted, but had changed since she last saw her former frenemy.

"Sooo, there's something I want to tell you about us, Miri," Oriana said excitedly, squirming in her shoes.

"Mm?" Miranda said, retrieving her hoagie and taking a big bite out of it, scratching the back of her flabby calf briefly with her foot. Glancing over at Jack, something seemed to itch at the back of her mind about the tattooed punk, something critically important...like she was an important relation. Liara's formula had done its job well though, and Miranda, while suspicious, remained clueless. The former information broker knew where to get the best equipment after all, and it'd truly take something monumental to shock Miranda back to her old self. Something like...

"Look at this!" Oriana said, holding her hand out. Miranda looked closer and spotted something new; a platinum white ring around her finger. "Jack, show her yours!"

Jack uncrossed her arms and held her left hand up, revealing a similarly colored band on hers. Miranda glanced between the two, her food-addled brain working furiously as Oriana stepped back and took Jack's hand in her own.

"What is...?" Miranda faltered, the corner of her mouth twitching slightly and her hand gripping the sub tighter and tighter.

"It's an engagement riiiing!" Oriana practically sang. "We're getting MARRIED!"

Miranda's facial tic froze as she looked over at Jack, who smiled weakly.

"Well...Jack Lawson has a nice ring to it," she joked.

And at the words 'Jack Lawson', something inside Miranda's head snapped, and she smiled her sweetest smile yet.

The one that always preceded someone getting murdered.
11211322123111121131222111113.title: A Cute Couple

choices: -her mouth. "I hope you do, because you'll be seeing a LOT more of me~"
-Jack's mouth. "Good, because I like that feeling too~"
-both of their mouths. "Get used to it, J. It'll be happening a lot more~"
112113221231111211312221111131.content:
"Well I did need to get back to the fleet," Tali said, mulling over Shepard and Liara's offer. "But-"

The conversation was cut off by a bloody shriek, and a loud thump.

"What the hell?" Shepard said, touching back down on Earth after playing around with the gravity, her fat falling down around her like a puffy dress.

"That sounded like Miranda!" Liara realized. "Was there something wrong with the gravity?"

"N-no!" Tali insisted, double-checking her omni-tool. "There should be an alarm if the PGD fails, and everything's fine."

"Damn it!"

Liara lumbered towards the front entrance, her unused leg joints popping and creaking even as the gravity generator helped her manage her tremendous tonnage. Leading the way like a big blue wrecking ball, Liara emerged in the front entrance to...MIranda, sitting on the floor looking rather stone-faced.

"Miranda, what happened?" Shepard called out, coming up second in the trio. There was a groan and Shepard saw Orianna get up from next to the side table, where she appeared to have been thrown.

"Hi Shepard!" Miranda said in an unusually bright, sing-song tone. Spotting the Quarian bringing up the rear, she smiled even wider. "Oh, Tali! I'm so glad you made this gravity generator work in reverse! I really wanna bust RIGHT through the floor!"

And the three quickly realized why, because underneath her enormous pale ass...was Jack, gasping for breath and turning blue, crushed underneath the Cerberus cheerleader's immense girth which was only getting heavier as Miranda played with the controls.

"Get...off...me...lard...aaah!" Jack gasped, her panicked breathing becoming shorter and shorter.

"Ooh, one ton!" Miranda said happily. "This outta do it!" She reached for the control again but Shepard, as always, took action, jumping forward and thrusting her massive belly out. Miranda's eyes bugged out as she was caught unawares and belly-bumped right off of Jack, collapsing in a heap next to her.

"Are you insane?!?" Shepard said. "You're gonna fucking kill her!"

Miranda sat back up, blinking in confusion. "I...was going to...?"

Jack coughed, her face changing from blue to bright red as her lungs worked furiously to bring oxygen back. Oriana ran back to her fiance to hold her hand, glaring daggers at her older sister. Miranda's hatred of Jack had indeed come back, but in that brief moment of bloodlust, bottled up by the chemical-induced gluttony inflicted on her by Liara, it seemed to have burned itself out remarkably fast.

"I...I'm sorry, Ori," Miranda said. "I...really don't know what came over me." She looked so guilty that even Oriana felt her feelings soften somewhat.

"I think you need to apologize to the woman you just nearly crushed to death!" Tali interjected, crossing her arms like a disappointed parent.

Once everyone was calmed down, and refreshed with a little snack, Shepard sat down the Lawsons and Jack in a circle, an impromptu mediation as it were. Liara's sobering presence was barely needed; with Jack nearly suffocated under an enormous rear end and Miranda feeling guilty about almost doing that suffocating, both were receptive to talking, and with Oriana they aired out their grievances, talking for nearly a couple hours. It was a conversation a long time in the making, and for the first time, an encounter between Jack and Miranda was ended amicably.

"Okay, this was really productive, I think," Shepard said, sucking down a gallon of milkshake rather loudly. "So, last thoughts?"

"Allow me," Oriana said at once. "Miri, I'm sorry I wasn't honest with you from the start, I should have told you about me and Jack long ago, and I apologize for letting it get this far."

Miranda nodded. "And I apologize for letting my emotions get the better of me," she said coolly. "And while I don't..." she began, but cut herself off following some urgent looks from the others. "And...I trust your decisions, and I want you to do what will make you happy."

And at last, Jack spoke up. "Okay...then I'm sorry for jerking you around like I was doing too. I was an asshole for sneaking around with your sister behind your back."

The two shared a rather forced smile, their animosity still not quite tempered, and probably not for quite some time. At long last, Miranda held out a hand, and Jack firmly took it.

"Take good care of her," Miranda said succinctly.

"I will," Jack promised. Orianna let out a small sigh and moved closer to Jack, squeezing her around the waist and nestling her head against Jack's. Miranda took a deep breath, and held her tongue.

"Well, what are we standing around for?" Shepard declared. "It sounds like we have an engagement to celebrate!"

"I'll have the robots start preparing a feast, then," Miranda declared.

"They don't do that already?" Tali joked, prompting billowing belly laughs from the obese squadmates as they began their pendulous waddling towards the dining area, long abandoned after Liara and Shepard had been rendered immobile. Jack stood up to follow but found herself stop, pulling back by the wrist.

"One quick thing, J," Oriana said, drawing in closer. "I couldn't help but notice...when my sister, well, sat on you..."

"...yes?" Jack responded with caution.

"Well, you seemed flustered when she got off and you could breath again," Oriana suggested, noting how Jack froze, biting her lip as she recalled the incident. "Last time I saw you that...well, it would have probably prompted a reaction from my sister at the time, wouldn't you say?"

"I-I don't know what you mean," Jack said, playing dumb,

"Jaaack..." Oriana teased. "You LIKED that, didn't you?" Jack's face immediately flushed, and Oriana looked triumphant.

"I-don't know what you mean," Jack repeated herself, looking side to side as if for an escape route. Oriana thwarted any such maneuver by holding onto her arms and keeping her there, drawing so close that Jack could feel the puff of her breath on her face.

"Come on, admit it. When my fat sister sat on you...you really liked it, the feeling of all...that...weight..."

Jack snarled, her defenses shattered upon being called out. "Well...so what? I..I...er..."

Oriana reached over to the table, picking up a small cookie, the same laced with that fattening chemical, that had been leftover after a binge session earlier, and stuck it into-
112113221231111211312221111131.title: The Part Where She Kills You

choices: "I'm sorry Shepard, but I'm needed back at home in person."
"I might be able to manage everything over communication systems..."
There's a knock at the door: Jack and Oriana are back?
1121132212311112113122211111311.content:
Oriana took time to chew and swallow a second chocolate-chip treat, allowing the powerful drugs to silently throw her metabolism out of whack. It wasn’t the same knee-buckling reaction Miranda had to the serum, but the Lawson felt a tingling jolt coarse through her spine.

“Wow, I could eat these all day. Imagine that... you could be my skinny little slut, fetching me as many calories as you want to fill me with, and I’ll be all yours at the end of the night.” Oriana stuck out her waist for emphasis, caressing her slender tummy as she popped another cookie in her mouth.

Jack’s mouth went dry as she tried fruitlessly to find any words. “Uh- y-yes!” When Oriana first met Jack, she never would have imagined her as the submissive type, but a few weeks into their relationship she discovered the girl’s soft spot.

A belch sounded from the dining hall followed the commander’s strong voice. “You guys coming?”

“On our way!” they said in unison.

Walking into the dining hall, the engaged couple observed the scene before them. Shepard and Liara were seated across from one another on what looked to be the floor, though truth be told, if there were anything underneath they wouldn’t be able to tell beneath the oceans of flab. The half-ton quarian looked to be seated in a specially designed seat, though the residents of the house knew it to be the sofa Liara once called home, and Miranda was sat back in a reinforced armchair, allowing her gut to hang free from her undersized shirt. The table, it seemed, was more of a formality than of any true function, with the only dishes being Jack and Oriana’s, resting in front of two expensive dining chairs. Rather than feed themselves by hand, (as per usual), everyone was sat back as assembly lines of LOKI mechs laboriously gave them their fill.

The couple gave inquiring looks at one another before walking to their chairs, which were oversized for their lithe frames. No wonder everyone here was so big…

The plates before them were surprisingly light compared to what everyone else was eating. Only a salad and a glass of wine. Between bites of food, Shepard noticed the puzzled looks on their faces. “*Smack* *munch* If you guysh - *Mmm* *Slurp* - want anyfhing elsh - *Munch* - jusht ashk the mechsh. *UUURRRRP*”

The two began on their salads, which tasted surprisingly clean compared to the others’ meals. When finished, they sipped on the wine. Jack looked over to Oriana with a new, yet familiar look in her eyes. “That’s probably enough for me, but you could probably do with some more.” She turned to one of the mechanized servants. “Could you get her something heavy? Some Lasagna maybe?”

Within only a minute, the meal was in front of her, steamy, cheesy, and filled with the household’s signature fattening agent.

---------

Thirty minutes later, Oriana was ready to burst. Her stomach churned away as the drug worked it’s magic, helping somewhat to soothe the pain and aid digestion. There were still a few bites left over, and Jack slowly teased them into her overstuffed fiancee. The others it seemed, kept on eating without slowing pace, aside from Miranda who was wrapping things up with dessert.

Once the final bite was down, Oriana let out a satisfied belch as Jack caressed the bulge of her belly. A few moments of rest later and the two stood up from their chairs and prepared to leave, but not without asking the mechs for some sweets for the road. Shepard noticed this and the feast was put on pause.

“”Well Oriana and I are ready to head home, if you don’t mind.” Jack looked over at Miranda, who looked as if she were a few brain cells short of being functional. The bloated bitch took a moment to process what was going on, but more importantly why her meal had stopped. Miranda’s brain slowly kicked back into gear as she recalled the rest of the day.

“It was great to see you two again!” Shepard said. “And congratulations!”

“Oh and Liara,” Jack paused, looking at Miri once more before returning her eyes to the blue hostess. “Thanks again.”

Liara nodded, once more feeling conflicted over whether what she’d done was okay. Perhaps she may never get over it unless she told Miranda directly.

The group said their goodbyes, congratulations, and good wishes as the engaged couple turned to leave the dining hall.

“Before you guys go...”

Oriana and Jack looked back to the voice. It was Miranda.

“Jack… I- I’m sorry.”

Jack looked back at the bloated girl, trying hard to ignore the smears of cream and chocolate surrounding her face. It wasn’t an artificial apology, like the one Shepard coerced the girl into during their little meeting. It was heartfelt.

“Miranda you- I... I’m sorry too.” Jack stepped towards her new sister-in-law, shared a moment of silence, and hugged the doughy mass before her. Stepping away, they looked at one another with a genuine smile.

“You’ve got a little something there,” Miranda teased, pointing out some chocolate Jack picked up from their little embrace. They both chuckled, and Jack wiped herself clean.

As Jack and Oriana left she looked back at Miranda, and found the smile never left her face.

Some seconds later, the sound of the front door closing echoed through the house.

“That was very sweet of you Miri.”

Miranda just sat in silence, pondering her new life and her old. There was just no point being hateful anymore. Miranda smiled at the thought, and felt her stomach ask for something more.

“I do hate to change the topic, but I believe you offered to let me stay earlier...” Tali remembered.
1121132212311112113122211111311.title: The First of Many Meals

choices: The pounds pile on, and Tali breaches the one ton marker!
Not so fast, Tali. Here comes a new and improved Miranda to outweigh you!
Here comes a new challenger...another friend joins this not so little reunion!
11211322123111121131222111113112.content:
"I might be able to manage everything over communication systems..." Tali mused allowed. "I mean, I've sort of been doing that already, since it's been trickier to move around..."

"So you think you can stay?" Liara asked, excitedly bouncing on her chubby toes, though Tali didn't remember her standing up at all. Had her butt gotten so huge that her height didn't change when she sat down? The Quarian felt a surge of carnal emotion at that particular idea but kept it under control.

"I think I could manage it," Tali said happily, patting her expansive stomach.

Shepard clapped her hands together. "Wonderful! We have a room set up for you right away, germ sealed and everything so you won't get sick or anything!"

Tali tilted her head. "That's...awfully convenient that you have a room like that set up, Shepard." She watched Shepard's bloated food-stained cheeks turn pink before breaking the tension with a laugh. "I'm only joking, I appreciate that you went through the trouble to set it up."

*BRAAAAP*

The deep belch echoing from Miranda's mouth grabbed everyone's attention, revealing she had already continued to feast on dessert, chocolate sauce dripping down her chins and flecking over her substantial cleavage. The three much larger girls suddenly remembered that they were nowhere near filled up and quickly joined Miranda in devouring the spread, or rather Tali joined Miranda and the two far larger girls sat back and ordered the robots to continue stuffing themselves senseless.

As Tali shoveled cakes and cookies into her stomach, she was thankful for the new addition to her suit, the detachable lower part of her mask that revealed her mouth (and her row of three chins). It had been a godsend for a lot of Quarians who would happily take a immuno-booster every once in a while if it meant eating solid foods, and it had really been a dream come true once Tali discovered her great love for food, stuffing, and her own increasing mass. Sure she could have gotten this far on her old diet of liquid feed, and in all honesty the idea of hooking herself up to a feeding tube that could properly fill her up was kind of hot, but it was interesting to taste all the solid versions of foods that Tali only knew as liquefied before now.

Okay sure she gorged herself so quickly nowadays that she barely got to experience that for more then a few seconds, but it's the thought that counts.

Licking her fingers clean, Tali's stomach gave off mixed messages of being stuffed and still demanding more. Eager to please, the Quarian reached for a nearby double-layered cake...and stopped, her fingers half a foot away. Confused, she tried reaching again and felt an unpleasant gurgle and a painful sensation from her belly. Looking down, she felt both embarrassed and aroused; her gut was pressing into the table, so bloated and immense that it kept her from reaching it.

She had finally gotten too big to feed herself.

"Uh, Liara," Tali said loudly over the messily loud smacks and chews of the Asari. "How do I order the robots to...give me food?"

"Just...ask..." Liara huffed in between swallowing down an obscene amount of ice cream cake being poured into her mouth. "Smart...little....things..." She strained to lift one of her bulbous arms and gently brushed her bloated fingers against the chassis of the nearest robot, which might have been the one-ton version of a pat on the back.

"Well, okay...robots, can you feed me?" Tali asked, unsure. She was pleasantly surprised as two mechs sprung from the side room, immediately grabbing the cake that the Quarian reached for and taking large chunks to feed directly into her waiting mouth. This was a new experience for Tali, being fed like this. Sure when she first became aware of her feelings towards obesity and did some research she learned about feedees and feeding, but to experience it firsthand, even from artificial drones...

Tali was going to need some private time when this was all said and done.

Looking over at Liara, her belly spilling across the floor and swallowing up the table even better then she was, Tali felt unrepentant glee at the idea of catching up to her size. Only a thousand pounds to go, and she'd be the fattest Quarian in the galaxy, no doubt about that.

Oh wait, she already was. Well, at least Tali would make sure her title would be very, VERY secure.
11211322123111121131222111113112.title: Tali Joins the Party

112113221231111211312221112.content:
"Bloody hell...I thought I let myself go," Miranda grunted, her normally melodious, polished australian accent sounding deeper and crass to her ears.

For months, Miranda had been under the mind numbing effects of Liara's weight gain additive. The moment the genius spy tasted it her tastes changed to consume the simplest, cheapest junk she could get a hold of, both dietary and entertainment wise. Everything else faded away, leaving her to gorge herself on any and all fattening goodies she could get her hands on in the heart attack factory that was Shepard's retirement home and to entertain her dulled wits on trash TV. Day after day after day, she'd shoveled ten or fifteen thousand calories of grease, salt, fat and corn syrup into her mouth while watching soap operas and trashy talk shows, cheering along and laughing at the usually obese, lower class interviewees. She'd gone from wearing designer clothes even to relax to wearing stained, overstretched white undershorts and rapidly shredded granny panties. Her high standards had fallen away and her self importance had crumbled, she barely had an identity anymore and while she was aware of herself gaining a couple pounds a day, of sweating between her room and the kitchen, of her feet disappearing from view of her heart hammering during the dangerous ascent up the stairs to the shower, Miranda's true self was viewing all of this in a dream like haze.

Until the day she saw the half ton Quarian that had once been the wide hipped but slender Tali a few months ago. How had she gotten so fat so fast?

Rusted gears began turning in Miranda's mind as her true personality came to the fore, breaking back into control of herself like a drowning swimming breaking to the surface. The bleary, piggish eyes that had once been able to freeze a man or woman in place blinked and she swallowed a huge mouthful of potato chips, blanching at the disgusting sludge of grease and salt going down her throat. She hated potato chips, they disgusted her taste wise and on a conceptual level, why were they in her mouth?

Always fast heart rate rising, Miranda angled her head down, feeling layers of chin fat bunch beneath her once modelesque face and seeing the sagging ruins of what had been her torso. Perfect breasts had become flappy, floppy tube socks stuffed with coins, pimples and stretch marks and crumbs scattered across their pendulous cleavage. The trim, strong arms of a scientist and spy had swollen up, a pair of immense, spider vein striated bingo wings giving her lunch lady arms, fast swallowing her wrists and making her greasy fingers thick and clumsy. She dropped the horrible bag of chips they held with a faint shriek and turned to run, panic that this ruined body was her now threatening to overwhelm her recently regained wits.

Before getting trapped in this madhouse, Miranda had run six miles a day, every day and each day it took her exactly thirty six minutes. She made it about ten feet before she had to quit and fall to her knees with a heavy thump, having driven the swollen, cellulite coated lumps that were her legs up to almost four miles an hour. Chest on fire, sweat pouring off of her overheating body, joints screaming, Miranda made herself calm down, taking deep breaths in through her nose and out through her mouth, an old runners trick.

"Miri, you alright?" the literal ton of lard that was the savior of the galaxy said through half of a ham.

Miranda ignored her and tried to get up. Thicker than her waist her arms might be, but they were woefully weak and she had to use her biotic powers to get up. Those had crumbled with disuse too and the psychic might that had let her lift a tank was barely enough to get her to her feet. Ignoring Shepard's question, the wheezing brunette waddled to her room, wincing as her sore knees complained of the almost normal walking speed they'd endured for a few feet.

She slammed the door behind her, wadding across the sea of potato chip bags, ice cream tubs, beer bottles and cake tins the robots hadn't cleaned up from her breakfast. Miranda's swollen feet screamed, a bad case of gout flaring up as she kicked aside a small mountain of rocky road ice cream, and her deflated bouncy castle of an ass knocked over a four foot stack of pizza boxes.

"Wot the fuck happened to me, I waz hot as shit! Now me ass is bigger than a fucking Krogan!?" Miranda slurred, shocked to find her accent that of gutter trash.

A glance in her mirror almost killed the spy on the spot, showing how far she'd fallen. She had to put a swollen hand on the side of her bed to support herself, making herself look at what had been done to her, cataloging it from the bottom up:

Miranda's slim, arched feet had fallen, growing wide and flat under her weight, her toes swollen with gout. Cankles softer than chewed bubble gum hung almost to the floor, days from hitting before her feet and her calves were surely bigger than her old thighs. Her knees were red and swollen, already complaining at standing up for minutes. Acres of thigh fat pressed in on each other, each thigh rivaling her old body for sheer mass, the skin an ugly mess of warped stretch marks, pimples and spider veins.

"Used to be a fooking champion goddamn jogger bitch, I waz!" Miranda stammered, making herself close her slack jaw afterwards.

Shapely hips that begged to be squeezed were balloons of fat, so huge that in a normal house she'd have gotten stuck in the doors, so much fat had been packed into them they were doubling over. Her crotch, once her lowest belly roll had been lifted up to expose it, was a swollen mess, her usually hairless bush having become a jet black tangle. The granny panties tore to pieces in her hand but the various fat rolls held them up and when Miranda dropped her heavy gut it covered her "modesty" anyway. A turn around showed her back was a tide pool of fat rolls, leading down to a deflated crinkle ass that looked to be made of melted wax until slapped, ripples forming in the toneless, almost flat sea of lard.

"Bitch, I did a thousand damn squats a fucking day for that ass! Now I've gotta gut like bloody melted ice cream!" she sneered, turning around to finger the immense apron of her stomach, which was in a race with her ass to see which could sag to her knees first.

Once Miranda had had a six pack, now she had two inner tubes of fat stacked atop each other. It gurgled faintly, digesting the nutritional nightmare of her breakfast. She pressed her sausage fingers into the folds, finding sweat filling the deep crevice. Her once spectacular breasts sagged down to her fist sized belly button, parodies of their old firmness.

Her face was even worse: fat had swallowed her perfect features, her chins covering up her long neck, sauce stains ringed her mouth and her piggish cheeks looking bee stung they'd swelled so much. Her long black locks had been replaced with a no maintenance pixie cut that didn't do her any flavors and she'd clearly stopped waxing her eybrows, her one flaw growing in wild and wooly. A case of adult acne had spread across her face, marring her perfect ivory complexion.

"Wot the fuck happened ta me?" the trashy cerberus operative wheezed, "I wuz bloody beautiful I wuz!"

She dug through her messy room, finding in her luggage a never unpacked first aid kit and a medical testing device. She wrapped it around her puffy wrist with difficulty and fumbled with the buttons, having to squint to make out the display due to her vision having gone from 20/10 to 20/100. It began taking in data with a happy hum.

While she waited, memory came flooding back: taking that drink, feeling cold, feeling hungry for months, eating and eating, getting fatter and weaker in body while her mind rotted on trash tv. For the first time in months an emotion other than hunger bubbled up in her belly, so strange that Miranda couldn't identify it. The medical device dinged that it was ready and she squinted at the holographic read out.

"Wot da fuck, is dis a joke?" she squeaked.

Her blood pressure was sky high. Her cholesterol through the roof. She had gout. She had arthritis. She had lost four inches in height from her own fat compressing her, going from 5'10 to 5'6. Her BMI was a laughable 80.7.

She weighed 500 lbs.

Miranda recognized what the feeling was and it was hate.

Liara and Shepherd had ruined her, when all she'd been trying to do was protect her sister. They'd been her friends and had wrecked her genius mind and perfect body, turning her into an obese, low class slob. And by God, she was going to get her revenge on both of them!

Story divulges:

The High Road: Miranda was going to regain her perfect body and mind, then she was going to make Liara, Shepherd and Jack pay in a suitably ironic fashion!

The Low Road: the New Miranda knew exactly how to fix this, drag the galaxy's savior onto cheap daytime television and show the entire galaxy just how trashy they'd become!
112113221231111211312221112.title: Cheerleader on the Rebound

choices: Quite chubby, and eager to grow.
Comfortably obese, with plenty of rolls and folds to play with.
Utterly massive, and loving every second of it!
112113221231111212.content:
"She really prefers that?" Liara asked quizzically, only barely acknowledging the LOKI's toddling up to provide oversized milkshakes to her and Shepard. Jack could only nod, leaving Shepard to quell her laughter with the refreshing taste of about a gallon of vanilla and strawberry shake. "I'm surprised she told you something so personal so soon."

"Well, it was kind of an accident," Jack admitted. "I was bored and borrowed her computer to play a video game, and...she had pictures of you on there, Shep."

Shepard turned a little pink as she finished slurping. "M-me?"

"Well, you like a thousand pounds ago," Jack admitted. "She collected a couple tabloid photos of you puffing up and put them in a little sequence. I thought it was some intel project so I teased her about having a kink for pretty girls getting fat and...well she confessed." By the shameful look on her face, Liara could tell that Jack felt pretty bad about blowing the lid off of this little secret. It was quite a change from the brash firecracker who practically got off on humiliating people that she knew years ago.

"So she asked you to put on some pounds?" Shepard asked.

"No, Ori said she loved me the way I was and didn't want to change me just to suit some fantasy of hers," Jack said with a sigh. "But...I...the way she makes me feel..." Jack hung her head, her eyes watering. "I...I never felt this way about anyone before. And I don't want to lose that, ever. I want to make her happy."

"By...getting fat?" Liara questioned. Jack nodded mutely, and the blubbery asari couldn't help but smile. "That's so sweet!"

Jack blinked. "You don't...find it weird that I want to be a tub of lard for her?"

Liara, huffing, reached down with both of her hands to lift up her enormous gut, letting it fall onto her naked thighs with a heavy slap, jostling loose a belch that rattled the window frames.

"Yeah I suppose that wouldn't be as weird to you guys," Jack admitted, stepping forward. "I knew you were getting fat, that's why I went to you guys but...holy shit..." Jack hovered her hand over Liara's expanse. "Can I...?"

"Go ahead," Liara chuckled. Jack lowered her hand onto Liara's stomach, delicately feeling the surface and how it shook before kneading it slightly.

"So weird..." Jack said, removing her hand and running it across her own flat stomach for comparison. "Wonder how it'll feel on me."

"Well, there's one way to find out." Liara shifted her massive rear end slightly and patted a sliver of space left over on the couch, just enough for a regular person to sit comfortably. Jack hesitated slightly before sitting down next to Asari blob. "First of all, if you want to gain weight, you have to get off your feet and relax. Stress burns calories."

"Ori's at the tech conference on Mars, right?" Shepard piped in. "If you wanted to, you could hang out here for a while, we're not exactly starved for food and there's plenty of room to grow."

"You guys aren't going to turn me into a blob like you, are ya?" Jack asked, somewhat accusingly.

"Not unless you want us to," Liara countered. Jack opened her mouth, hesitated, but before she could finish a robot tottered up with a third massive milkshake.

"Man, you guys drink a lot of these," Jack said. "Unless you two are splitting this last one?"

"Actually, it's yours," Liara said, lifting up her other arm with the omnitool on it, hidden from Jack's sight by the expanse of Liara's gut. "I plugged you into our system, you'll get meals just like ours now, if you want them."

Jack's eyes widened and she looked at the gallon-sized shake like she was just asked to crawl over flaming coals.

"I can NOT drink this!" Jack insisted. "It's the size of my freakin' head!"

"SUBJECT REQUESTING ASSISTANCE WITH NOURISHMENT," the LOKI suddenly chirped in. "ENGAGING ARISTIPPUS PROTOCOL."

"Oh crap, I didn't mean to turn that on," Liara said, hurriedly returning to her omnitool and stumbling to work the controls with her sausage fingers.

"Turn what on? What the hell is an -MMPH!"

Jack was cut off when the two LOKIs came in from the side to stick a tube into her mouth that was attached to the end of a funnel. The move was so surprising that the angry biotic hesitated to respond, letting the robots set up their device and begin pouring the milkshake into the funnel. Jack was so shocked by the sudden chill that she swallowed, feeling overwhelmed by the delectable chocolate taste. Despite it being so thick and sweet, it kept flowing, forcing Jack to keep swallowing so it wouldn't get sucked into her lungs. Shepard and Liara both watched awkwardly as Jack was force-fed the milkshake, their eyes drawn to the belly emerging and swelling from beneath her shirt, pressing against Liara's mass on one side and the arm of the sofa on the other. By the time the shake was drained dry, her belly was perfectly round and rolled her shirt up to put her belly button on display. Gasping for breath, Jack tore the tube out of her mouth and collapsed backwards on the sofa, covered in sweat from the exertion of an intense feeding.

"Uh...Jack?" Shepard prodded carefully. "You okay?"

"Urrrrgh..." Jack mumbled, letting out a moan followed by a dainty burp. "...think I'm gonna....hrrk...pop..."

"Right..." Liara said, feeling a little sheepish. "So uh...I take it you'll be skipping second breakfast?"

---

And so, Jack's quest to gain began on a rather auspicious note. She did indeed skip second breakfast after belching out a couple swearwords, but managed to stomach a big lunch and dinner with some excessive dessert afterwards. Eventually, Jack did settle into this new routine and developed an appetite to match the two much larger girls, if only out of love for her new girlfriend, and it wasn't long before the Skinny Jack was a thing of the past.

Soon Ori would be back from her conference and would find a new Jack that was...
112113221231111212.title: The Things We Do For Love

1121132212311112122.content:
Shepard and Liara were friggin' miracle workers, Jack thought to herself as she ponderously stepped out of the shower that morning. After getting so used to the massive installation that the enormously obese couple had in their bathroom, the shower in Jack and Ori's flat felt tiny by comparison, by extension making Jack feel even bigger.

It was a strange feeling to say the least, but by the time she said goodbye to the two blobs in that mansion, Jack had gotten used to the ins and outs of "the fat life", as the pair had called it. And honestly, it wasn't all that bad. Sure it was tiring more often then not, but her new waddling gait was manageable, the sensation of outgrowing her clothes at a rapid rate was tolerable, and the constant need for snacks was honestly probably the best thing about it. Especially the shakes; she wouldn't admit it even with a gun to her head, but she really got to enjoy the feeling of being stuffed with that milkshake, and that Aristippus Protocol was probably the biggest contributor to her rapid rise in weight.

She even wore it well, or at least Jack thought so. Checking her appearance in the mirror as she dried her hair, her face sported a nice thick double chin with a third on the way, working together with her chubby cheeks to create a nice round face to match her body. Below her thicker neck, her breasts had gone up a few cup sizes as well but still remained perky and bouncy, not unlike the growing bingo wings that hid the muscle beneath them. Tossing the towel aside, she tugged on her shorts over her wide and chubby hips, thick and flabby enough to start hanging out the sides of chairs, and only just managed to pull them over the pair of basketballs that made up her butt, sticking out the back like a shelf. Skipping on the bra this time, Jack donned one of her nicer T-shirts, pulling it down over her new breasts and as far down her blossoming buddha belly as she could go, only managing to reach just above her navel, and on an extra large too. Taking a deep breath, Jack pondered the skinny punk alpha bitch turned flabby fat and pampered alpha bitch in front of her, running her hands up and down her love handles and patting her thick thighs to send them into a jiggle. Shepard and Liara had done an excellent job fattening her up, Jack thought.

She almost felt bad about lying to them about why she wanted to get fat.

*click*

The front door unlocked and opened with a creak, followed by shuffling footsteps.

"Jack, you home?" Oriana called out.

"Right here, out in a sec!" Jack shouted back, barely able to contain her excitement. Gussying herself up at the last minute, Jack dashed out of the bathroom and headed through the hallways, hoping to position herself before Oriana saw her.

Success! Jack strode into the entrance hall just as Oriana was bending over to set down her suitcases, showing off a pair of basketballs herself. Even in her tight skirt and blouse her rear end looked huge, matching perfectly with her chunky legs and hippo hips. Righting herself with a huff, the younger Lawson placed a fleshy hand on the belly, defiantly showing diamonds of flesh through the tight buttons on her top.

"I'm such a fat hog..." Ori whimpered, tears visibly welling in her eyes.

"You don't look that bad to me," Jack quipped. Oriana turned to argue once again that yes she was practically a hideous ugly blob of fat until she saw the new and improved Jack. Her mouth opened in a perfect little "o" shape, matching her nice round double chin as she pointed between the gut she sported and Jack's own belly. Jack grinned, lifting up her shirt slightly to show off the layers of her love handles and belly fat before Oriana found the words to say.

"Jack....what did you do?"

"Well, I ate a lot," Jack said simply, jostling her belly with a smirk.

"But...you're so fat now!" Ori pointed out, looking deeply confused. "You were so skinny and-"

"And now I'm not. I'm fine with the size that I am," Jack completed her sentence for her. Ori's shocked expression faltered slightly as she was cued into what was going on, replaced with a mix of confusion and affection.

"You did this for me, didn't you?" she asked outright.

"Pretty much!" Jack said brightly, bouncing forward with a pleasing jiggle. Ori almost backed away but Jack was too quick for her, wrapping her meaty arms around her fat girlfriend. "I love you for you, Ori. It doesn't matter to me how fat or how skinny you are, it won't change how I feel about you."

Jack was no cunning manipulator or master strategist. If she was, she might have been able to come up with a better way to make her girlfriend feel loved outside of getting fat for her. Still, the smile that crossed Ori's face when she was finally convinced that Jack loved her unconditionally made her feel like she could take on ten chess grandmasters all at the same time and win in four moves each. Oriana wept tears of pure happiness as she buried her face in Jack's blooming chest, leaving Jack to stroke her hair affectionately.

"...I love you so much, Jack..." Oriana mumbled into her girlfriend's cleavage.

"Ditto," Jack said teasingly, making the two break out in giggles that wobbled their fat rolls. Ori leaned upwards almost immediately afterwards and planted a kiss that seemed to last for days, weeks even. Breaking apart at last, they shared a content smile, swaying gently on the spot.

"So..." Oriana said, wiping tears off her plush, red face. "You want to get something to eat?"

Option A: A Growing Love

With their relationship rekindled, the loving couple enjoy being a couple once more, and with no further consternation about their weight, you can guess what's to come.

Option B: Double Date

Jack takes Oriana to see the masterminds behind her rapid weight gain, Shepard and Liara. And it's very easy to eat way too much when you're hanging out with a couple that weighs well over a ton together.

Option C: The Inevitable Free Choice

Anything can happen, really. Perhaps one of them gets into weight gain more then the other, or another friend of Shepard's gets roped into the mix. And of course, Miranda must be overjoyed at what Jack has done to her little sister...
1121132212311112122.title: The Big Reveal

choices: Oriana finds more friends to feed!
Oriana feeling guilty, feeds herself as much as she feeds Jack!
11211322123111121223.content:
Orianna couldn't sleep. Lying in bed staring at the ceiling, the sound of Jack's breathing next to her keeping a steady tempo, Oriana's mind was racing too fast to drift away into the night so easily. At first she thought it was because she was so happy; what Jack did to herself to make her feel better about her size was incredibly kind, and thanks to the stunt she did finally feel comfortable with the way she was again. Idly kneading her stomach, Jack did feel less miserable about herself, but that was in addition to how she felt about Jack.

Simply put...Jack looked hot as hell.

She realized it when they shared dinner and Jack idly stretched her arms in such a way that her shirt rolled up, leaving a belly to pooch over her waistband. The sight left a tingle in her loins and a heat in her chest that wouldn't subside, not helped by when Jack made a joking comment about how she was going to outgrow all her shirts soon. Soon every little thing to do with Jack's weight was giving her little moments of ecstasy; her hips brushing against narrow door frames, the gentle creak of the furniture she sat in, even the way they could only just barely fit in the same bed without squishing into one another. And in the height of this ecstatic feeling of attraction, Ori began to imagine what it would be like if Jack got even bigger...

Oriana shuddered, turning over to look at Jack's porcine form with a hungry look in her eyes as she was lying on her back, fast asleep. Picturing the belly hanging out in the air rising like bread dough, Orianna leaned over and wrapped an arm around Jack and squeezed against her, dreaming of a time when she wouldn't be able to fit in the same bed as her. Something, deep in her darkest desires and sexual fantasies, she decided to make a reality.

And then some.

---

"Man, you went all out for dinner tonight, haven't ya?" Jack said with a giggle. "What are we *hic* celebratin'?"

"Oh, just us being together," Orianna said with a charming smile that would have made her sister proud. "Now eat up, you're not finished yet!"

Jack let out a groan as she reached over with her fork to finish off the steak Orianna was plying her with. Swaying slightly, Jack knocked over one of several empty beer bottles, consumed alongside the five empty plates stacked up next to her at the table.

"Man, thish is good..." Jack mumbled through a mouthful of her dinner. "I didn't know you could *hic* cook so well!"

"Just a helpful skill I picked up," Ori said coolly, already preparing yet another plate of food for her girlfriend. She felt like pushing her luck today; getting Jack tipsy was a great way to push more food on her, and since she got back a week ago Ori had been careful to cultivate a bigger appetite in her girlfriend, all the better to fit more food into that wonderful belly of hers.

Jack's sixth plate was gone in a matter of moments, as she unleashed a rattling belch and finished off another bottle of beer to wash it down with. Trying to set it on the table and missing, Jack leaned back in her seat, arms hanging limply.

"Sho stuffed...." Jack mumbled. "No more..."

"But it's your faaaavorite~" Ori said in a singsong voice, spearing a chunk of steak on a fork and holding it up to her mouth. Pulling a face, Jack let out another belch and opened her mouth, allowing her girlfriend to feed her. Trying to hide her own ecstasy, Oriana smiled as she fed Jack one bite after another, her overstuffed girlfriend groaning and moaning with every swallow. On the very last bite, there was a distinctive *snap* as the button on Jack's shorts popped open, her taut gut bulging out unrestrained as her head swayed back and forth.

"That was...*hic*...good..."

Ori smiled as Jack's head fell to one side, falling asleep almost immediately.

"And it's going to get even better..." she cooed, rubbing Jack's almost spherical belly with the most delicate touch she could manage.
11211322123111121223.title: Uh Oh, Ori's A Feeder

choices: Liara ups the dosage of her formulas.
Liara can't do anything; she's the complacent piggy now.
112113223.content:
Liara broke into a cold sweat at the sight of Eileen stepping out of the shower and toweling off, and not for the reason one would think. She was still plenty fat, with a big belly that hung in front of her with thick thighs and legs to support it, but there were warning signs. She seemed to be moving a little faster, they hadn't gone clothes shopping in a while, and the third chin threatening to arrive under her flabby chin was a no-show.

Eileen was losing weight.

She wasn't supposed to, though. Liara did the math and found the formula, she should be fat happy and inflating with lard at an astronomical rate! She was getting fed like a hog at every meal and annihilated course after course. WHY WAS SHE LOSING WEIGHT?

"Something wrong, Liara?"

"It's...it's fine, my love, just...thinking," Liara said, her heft feeling more cumbersome then usual. Was it her twisted imagination, or did Shepard actually look slightly thinner then her?

"Well that's always a good thing!" Eileen Shepard giggled, planting a kiss on her lover's chubby cheek. "I was actually thinking as well...what if I made breakfast today? I've been thinking about your blueberry waffles and I just want to try my hand at them!"

"Wh-what?!?" the fat Asari cried out. "B-but...I'm supposed to make breakfast..."

"And you're wonderful at it, but I think I owe you a few breakfasts you don't need to make, darling," Eileen said sweetly. "Let me make them...please?"

Liara was horror-struck, feeling her whole grand plan for Shepard coming down around her.....but she couldn't say no to her. Not in a million years.

"O-okay..."

"Wonderful! You'll love it darling, I promise!" Eileen said gleefully. Wobbling out of the bathroom, she left Liara staring at her fat reflection in the mirror. Shepard wasn't succumbing to the formula anymore, it seemed, and she was going back to her old self more and more. No wonder she'd been having her old nightmares of witnessing her beloved Shepard's death over and over again.

What was a girl to do?
112113223.title: This Wasn't Part of the Plan!

choices: "It's full of the chemicals that you were giving to me~"
"I bet you can out-eat anyone, you little piggy~"
"I'm gonna make you the biggest Asari in the galaxy~"
1121132233.content:
As the days rolled by, Liara's desire to do anything about the situation slowly but surely evaporated. She still had that urge to stuff Shepard so full she couldn't walk, to pamper and protect her so she'd never be unhappy or unsafe again, but it was rapidly losing against just the love and affection that she felt for her beloved Shepard. When Eileen asked if she could make dinner every once in a while or go out shopping, Liara just couldn't say no to the woman she loved so much. On top of that of course was the struggle of being a big girl. A few dozen pounds was manageable, but three hundred was highly cumbersome and made her usual routine far more exhausting then it would have been. Asari biology and Salarian medical science meant that she wouldn't suffer from poor health, but no pill could make carrying around a one hundred pound badonk any less strenuous. Thus love and weight combined to create a potent force that convinced Liara that it wasn't a big deal if Shepard took over some of the household tasks, which led to Liara becoming lazier and lazier. Soon enough, Shepard was cooking and cleaning every day, and Liara simply lazed about enjoying the fancy dinners her beloved made for her, dinners that kept growing and growing in size.

By the time Liara realized that her and Shepard had effectively swapped places in the relationship, she was far too lazy to care and settled into the new arrangement with ease.

The day things came to a head began like any other; with Liara waking up to the smell of something delicious. Stirred from a post-breakfast nap, the Asari tried to get to her feet, shifting a few inches before collapsing onto the comfortable sofa again. Shrugging it off, Liara braced herself and tried again, moving a couple more inches but dropping heavily onto the sofa with a resounding thud.

"Liara, darling! Don't hurt yourself!"

"S-sorry, Shepard," Liara said huskily, sweat forming on her brow from the effort of standing up. She gave one last push, and at last completely left her usual perch, stumbling forward as her weight shifted but managing to straighten herself out at last. Trying to get to her feet was such a tasking ritual that Liara was trying to do it less and less, but for food she'd gladly do it ten times over.

Taking her first step towards the kitchen, the groan of the floorboards underneath her feet helped her realize just how immense she had gotten. Liara was fat before, but Shepard had pushed her to all new heights of gluttony and adipose, all of which was on full display thanks to the (comparatively) tiny shorts and tube top-like garment that Liara's lover had dressed her in that morning. Her face was cherubic and almost entirely round, with a row of triple and quadruple chins, depending on how far Liara opened her mouth to shovel in more food, and it remained perched between a pair of immense meaty shoulders, leading down to blubbery biceps thicker then a regular person's head and thick fingers that were starting to get too big to use effectively. The tube top did a decent job of keeping the watermelons growing on her chest in line even as they outgrew the bra sizes you could find in regular stores, but the same top let her belly out on full display, a delightfully round apron of flab so large that Liara couldn't even reach her cavernous belly button. It was frankly a miracle she could walk, but it was easy to see how she could remain balanced, since her hips were wide enough that she needed to use a three-person sofa to sit comfortably and mounted a gigantic rear end that stuck out almost as far out the backside as her belly stuck out the front and was so caked in blubber that the jiggles and wobbles it made from merely walking around took several seconds to die down if Liara stopped moving. At the very least the jiggle stopped when she jammed her ass in the doorframe, as she had started to do when entering the kitchen.

"Liara! It's not quite finished yet," Shepard giggled.

"Hungry!" Liara said thickly, her piggy eyes gleaming with excitement and her stomach roaring for sustenance.

"Okay, sit tight, I'll get the grilled stuff for you to snack on," Eileen Shepard relented as Liara thundered toward the table and lowered herself across three chairs clumped together, rubbing her monstrous gut happily. If she hadn't been so excited about the food, she probably would have noticed that her lover was still shrinking; without the massive influx of calories and the repression of the nanites in her body by Liara's little formula, Shepard's flab had been reduced to a rounded face and a cute belly bump, with some padding left over on the rest of her, ahem, 'feminine assets'. She wasn't skinny anymore for sure, but it was quite shocking that she could get away with being called curvy again.

Again though, Liara didn't care. Her only thought was on the plate of fried, fattening grilled cheese sandwiches and the extra large chocolate milkshake set in front of her. The immensely obese Asari practically squealed in delight as she attacked the shake first, tearing the lid off and pouring the thick, sweet concoction down her throat in one gulp, with some of the shake dribbling down the corners of her mouth. As Liara set the cup aside and unleashed a booming burp, Shepard leaned in, pressing another shake into her hand and dabbing at the corners of her mouth to clean them.

"Drink up, sweetheart," Shepard cooed seductively, before leaning in and whispering-
1121132233.title: The Tides Turn

choices: ...tomorrow, when the retirement (and the feasting) really begins
...some time into their retirement, when those pounds start adding up.
...well into their retirement, when they were REALLY living large!
11212.content:
“Yes, about that…” Liara said cautiously. "Have you given any thought to how you wanted to spend our retirement at all?"

"Well," Shepard said with a coy smile. "I'd like to spend it mostly with you."

"Th-that's now what I meant," Liara said, barely restraining a chuckle. "I mean, what is it you want to do, now that the Reapers are behind us?" Shepard pondered the question, idly stroking her potbelly as she thought.

"I...don't really know," Shepard finally said. "We don't really need to work I guess, since between the pensions, sponserships, and all your old Shadow Broker contacts we have more money than we'll ever need, but then...shoot I dunno. It feels like I spent my whole life fighting against the Reapers, I don't know what I'm gonna do now that they're gone..." Eileen Shepard's face fell slightly at the uncertainty, but Liara put a hand on her chin and lifted it up to give her a long, sensual kiss. When they finally broke apart, Shepard was as red as a tomato and struggling to string words together.

"W-well...we could do that," Shepard said, giggling like a school girl at the thought.

"You're right, Shepard," Liara said. "We have spent so long fighting the Reapers...now that our destiny is our own...why don't we spend it enjoying what life has to offer? We can visit distant worlds, see new faces, indulging in whatever pleasures we encounter along the way. My old connections and safe houses could easily become vacation homes, after all..."

"That sounds intriguing," Shepard mused, turning to her prominent paunch, giving it a wiggle with both hands. "Maybe I should work this off before we go..."

"Why though?" Liara said suddenly, taking her hands in her own. "Our lives are our own now, Shepard. What need is there to care about your figure anymore? Why not enjoy life without having to worry about restricting yourself?"

Shepard blinked. "You mean...I should just keep eating, damn the consequences?"

Liara's blue skin took on a slightly purple hue. "I...suppose that is one way of looking at it, yes." There was a pregnant pause as the two stared into each others eyes before it was broken by Shepard laughing.

"Well, if it means I don't have to stop eating all these treats you give me, then why not indulge?" Shepard reasoned. "I'm retired, after all!"

"Oh Shepard, I -mmf!" Liara began, before she was cut off by Shepard suddenly stuffing a slice of cake into her mouth.

"Correction, actually," Shepard said with a grin. "WE'RE retired, so I don't plan on indulging like this on my own, honey-buns."

Liara instinctively chewed and swallowed the cake slice, the taste hitting her like a wrecking ball of deliciousness. No wonder Shepard was getting pudgy from her cooking, the Asari reasoned as she took a great shuddering breath. Taking hat moment of enjoyment as a sign of agreement, Shepard got to her feet, taking the cake tray in one hand and Liara's hand in the other.

"What's say we go inside and finish this cake?" Shepard said brightly, adding in an oh-so-suggestive wink. "We got a retirement to enjoy!"

Liara turned a deeper shade of purple as she was dragged into the house for what was assuredly an amorous evening. This was going to be a lot of fun, and Liara and Shepard couldn't wait to see what will happen...
11212.title: Big Retirement Plans

112123.content:
"Shepard, hurry up!" Liara called out from the kitchen. "She'll be here any minute!"

"Nearly done, sorry!" Shepard called back, turning off the shower taps hurriedly. She got lost in her thoughts again, thinking of how the last few months of her retirement had gone. It had truly been a wonderful experience, traipsing across the galaxy without a war to fight, just enjoying all the sights and sounds they missed in between their missions. Shepard took Liara on a tour of all the famous earth cities and landmarks, followed by Liara taking her to all the immaculate cities she heard but never saw before on Thessia, and they had gone on to visit every place in between, drinking in all the beauty and wonder that the galaxy could provide And the food! Together they sampled cuisines from across the cosmos, sampling some of the most delicious feasts you could have in Citadel space, and every time Liara borrowed recipes and ingredients so that she could recreate the most delectable courses at home. True to her word, Shepard had abandoned everything that could cause her stress on her epicurean adventure, feasting like royalty at every meal and staying as far away from any semblance of exercise or restraint. And now that they were back home from their epic adventure, for now, the effects of all that feasting were...quite apparent.

As the shower turned off, there was a pause, only interrupted by a tinny electronic voice recited out a number.

"Five hundred...fifty!"

"Yeah, that sounds about right...." Shepard mused, wrapping an oversized towel around herself and stepping into her bedroom, preceded by an absolute mountain of a belly, falling around her in two thick rolls of fat. Taking great waddling steps towards the wardrobe to get dressed, Shepard started out with a flabby belly but her hourglass figure had taken the brunt of her new diet's effects, with tree trunk thick haunches propelling her along to her next meal and her belly propping up breasts the size of pumpkins that needed special bras with enough letters to fill a dictionary. Hurriedly getting dressed, Shepard quickly put on a polo shirt and jeans that would have been tiny on an Elcor, straining momentarily to button the latter closed. It wouldn't last one more feast at this point, Shepard realized with glee, and she glanced in the mirror to make sure her hair was orderly and framed her wide, triple-chinned face nicely.

"Shepard!"

"I'm coming Liara, sheesh!" Shepard moaned loudly, turning to lumber out the room and down the hall, rattling every loose object as she stomped by before arriving in the kitchen. The smell of all the delicious food being prepared was heavenly; her mouth was already starting to water at the spread in front of her.

Which could have meant the spread of food, or the spread of the absolutely massive rear end blocking the view of the stove. Shepard, a mischievous grin on her face, waddled up to the rear end and grabbed it with one fat-fingered hand.

"Shepard!" Liara yelped, standing up straight with a hot bowl in her mitted hands. "Not when I'm in the oven, please!"

"But you look so good, honey," Shepard said seductively as her lover turned to set the dish among the others on the table. Indeed, Liara's smooth dress left little to the imagination and hugged every one of Liara's curves, mostly because she had blown past a quarter ton as well. It highlighted just how much of a pear she was, with her decently large breasts and upper arms upset by a perfectly round boulder of a belly perched in front of a massively wide set of hips and haunches, which had a chair kill-count that ran into the double digits at this point.

"Save it for later, my love," Liara chided, her large round face purpling slightly. "We have a guest coming over."

"Yeah, I know," Shepard said, dropping down into a steel double-wide chair. "It'll be nice to hang out with someone from the old team at least. I imagine she'll lose her head once she sees all of this though." Shepard slapped her belly, sending it wobbling for a good few seconds.

"Oh I'm not so sure of that," Liara said, setting up another dish and popping a little piece of it into her hungry mouth in a well-practiced move. "I've heard she's gotten rather portly herself, so perhaps seeing us won't be such a surprise anymore."

"I don't know, people were still shocked to see the savior of the galaxy looking like this," Shepard pointed out. "Not that I mind of course, I look damn good."

"No argument there," Liara said, leaning around Shepard's massive rack to give her a kiss, which was still a little awkward at their size. Right on cue, the doorbell gave an electric trill. "Ooh, that's her!" Liara said happily. "Can you get that, I need a few more trips to get this set up."

"Yup, I got it." With a herculean effort, Shepard heaved herself to her feet and made the lumbering journey to the door, the electronic hatch sliding open to reveal...
112123.title: FatShep and Large Liara

1121232.content: So, is it Jack? Or is it Miranda Lawson?
1121232.title: Big Surprise

choices: Something interrupts the three big eaters mid-feast!
11212321.content:
Jack, unsurprisingly, opened up with a burst of laughter interrupted by a large belch

"Holy shit, what have you been eating? Krogans?"

"You're one to talk, fatass," Shepard replied with a smirk.

Jack gave a hearty laugh and munched down the last of her candy bar, jiggling her belly to let out another piercing belch. And there was a lot to jiggle; Jack had dressed up a bit for the occasion with a presentable shirt and slacks, but only the latter did anything to cover her up, since her great boulder of a belly was unable to be contained and forced itself out over her waistband, putting all those tattoos on display. Jack evidently was a super-heavy fatass not unlike Liara, and most of her five hundred pounds seemed to be concentrated in her legs and rear, which were wide enough to make Shepard worry that Jack would get stuck in the door trying to get inside. Her upper body got a decent amount of that flab judging by Jack's brand new bosom and the one thick double chin wreathing her face like a scarf, but it was definitely her massive ass that made up most of her new bulk.

"Great to see you're doing well, Jack," Shepard said warmly.

"Thanks," Jack said, turning sideways and stepping inside with a slow gait. "Ya know, I heard you were kinda turning into a whale, but...damn!" she continued, reaching out to jiggle a handful of Shepard's belly fat.

"What can I say? Retirement has been good."

"Speak for yourself, it's tough teaching biotics when you're the size of a whale. Still, least I can threaten to sit on my students if they misbehave."

"You could probably sit on the whole class at once," Shepard pointed out, giving her a friendly elbowing. Jack opened her mouth to snark at her but stopped short when she saw the spread of food laid out for them.

"I see someone's hungry," Liara remarked, finishing up the table setting and taking her seat. Jack slowly waddled to the table, her eyes fixed on the feast in front of her, and immediately dove for the largest hunk of meat she could find, not even bothering to take her seat, and began devouring it.

"Well..." Liara said, giving Shepard a hungry look. "How does the human phrase go again? When in Rome...?"
11212321.title: Jumbo Jack

choices: "I wonder how good she REALLY is..."
1121233.content:
"Samara!"

"Shepard!"

The joy at seeing one another led to a rather poignant pause as the former Justicar and Commander considered one another

"Shepard, you do not need to worry about offending me," Samara said at last. "I'm aware of my size."

"Oh...oh, I wasn't..." Shepard blustered before laughing. "I mean, I didn't know how best to approach the subject..."

"Have I not always been honest with you, Shepard?" Samara said. "To be blunt, we are both rather large."

"Yeah you're not wrong...you're never wrong, really," Shepard said with a laugh. "It's good to see you again Samara." The two women attempted to hug one another, no small feat considering the weight that they shared. While Shepard was an overinflated hourglass, since their war against the reapers Samara had blossomed into a top heavy behemoth around the same size as Shepard. Still in a red outfit similar to her old uniform, Samara's belly ballooned outwards in a perfect sphere the size of a IVV tire, propped up by pleasantly plump thighs, and the sharp angles along her jaw had melted into smooth curves that left her with a perfectly round face with three chins hanging down, but all that took a backseat to her absolutely massive rack, approaching the size and shape of beach balls and unable to be contained without showing a generous helping of cleavage. Shepard got to enjoy a face-full of them as she wrapped Samara in a hug, who in turn held on as best she could with her flabby ham-hock arms.

"Come on in, dinner's nearly done," Shepard said, her tubby cheeks turning a shade of pink.

"I'd be delighted to, Shepard."

The pair of them lumbered back into the dining room just as Liara finished setting up the last of the dishes. Shepard and Samara both sniffed the air, getting a bit of delight from the feast that was to come.

"Samara, I'm so glad you could make it!" Liara announced, her eyes flicking down to Samara's enormous cleavage. "We have...quite a lot to catch up on, don't we?"

"It seems we do," Samara said, a smile flickering across her stern expression. "For now though, shall we begin?" Shepard grinned as she and the monstrously overweight Justicar lowered themselves onto the double-wide benches, and all three girls began eating.

Shepard and Liara learned a while back that when you reached a certain point, table manners just slowed down how fast you could eat and were best left by the wayside. To that end, the loving couple had learned the art of devouring and enjoying their meals at breakneck speed, and dove into the feast before them with an animalistic spirit. Shepard tore into a Turian bird dish by tearing chunks off with her bare hands while Liara tore off massive chunks of steak from a Krogan meal and swallowed them down, occasionally sounding off with an impressive belch.
