12311.title: Anything for Shepard

123112.content:
"I'm sorry Liara, but I don't think of you the same way."

"What?" The Asari named Liara T'Soni seemed completely shocked at this statement. She'd just confessed her feelings toward Sarah Shepard, and could've sworn to anyone that she felt the same way, that they had a connection.

"I said I don't have the same feelings towards you.", the captain repeated. It took a several seconds for Liara to grasp what was happening.

"I really need to get back at it. Garrus and Wrex should be geared up for our next mission." Sarah turned and went back through the storage room door, leaving Liara by herself to contemplate the last two minutes.

"I... I..."

That's about as far as she got.

She wracked her brain for the next few minutes as she absentmindedly walked towards the mess hall. She found a suitable seat and sat, finding herself next to Gunnery Chief Ashley Williams.

"Oh, hey kid. How's it hanging?', she greeted the Asari, but got no response back.

"Um, Liara? You turn your ears off or something?", Ash tried again.

"Oh, yes, Williams, hello, yes good evening, hello.", Liara spattered out every greeting in her vocabulary in a span of five seconds.

"Ok? You feeling alright Liara? Did something happen with you and Shepard?", she inquired.

"Umm, well...", Lara started off, a bit hesitant.

"Oh, come on, don't be afraid to tell me, we're both ladies here."

"Actually, Williams, Asari are mono-gender, meaning that we are not necessarily-"

"Yeah, I know, you've told us plenty of times", Ashley interrupted, "Just tell me what happened!"

"..."

"Well?!?"

"Are you familiar with the human term 'friendzoned'?"

"Wait, Sarah put you in the friendzone?!? Jeez, that's harsh, even for her." Liara's usually emotionless face was showing a sign of sadness and disappointment.

"I though we had a connection, that our connection with the Protheans linked us somehow. I guess my assumption was wrong."

"Well... maybe there still is. Maybe you just need a good push to get her to see it." She had Liara's full attention.

"I've heard on the grapevine that Sarah is into this fetish called feederism.", Ash whispered.

"Feeder... ism?"

"It's basically where a person gets off on fat chicks, stuffing their faces, gaining weight, things like that."

"Sarah is interested in... overweight women?"

"Exactly." Ash could see the gears turning in the lovesick Asari's head. "And you know what? I can help you."

"Please! I'll take any help I can get!" Liara pleaded to her human friend.

"Now that's the spirit. Now, we've got a couple ways of going about doing this. I got this little compound from the black market that increases your appetite, but decreases your metabolism, but we can ALSO take some of Wrex's Krogan food, enough calories and fat in one serving for a human to go two WEEKS on. Sol where do we start?"
123112.title: Friendzoned

choices: Shepard definitely takes notice of fat Liara.
Shepard barely even acknowledges her weight.
Ashley meets Liara first to see the results of the binge.
1231121.content:
"The enhancer sounds dangerous," Liara thought aloud. "But...not as dangerous as stealing food from a Krogan..."

Ashley looked relieved. "I was hoping you'd be fine sticking with the formula."

"You were hoping...?" Liara asked innocently.

"Er, yeah. Didn't want to deal with getting caught by Wrex," Ash said dismissively, thankful that Liara wasn't picking up on her rather transparent motivations. "In any case, the enhancer isn't alone, we're going to need a lot of food. I can probably lean on the quartermaster to get some extra rations, but that'd take a while to get here..."

"Are you certain we can't use it sooner?" Liara pleaded, desperate to get started on this impossible gambit for Shepard's affection. Ashley chuckled at her insistence.

"I was just getting to that," Ashley continued. "While Shepard's off in the citadel doing whatever, there's a nice little restaurant on the Presidium that can work for you."

---

"Gordogan's? What kind of name is that?"

"No idea," Ashley said as the pair of them looked at the stylish neon sign advertising the cozy little restaurant, which admittedly looked rather shoddy next to the other shiny storefronts. "But the owner's a Krogan who specializes in 'foreign' cuisine, which means we can get very large portions for a good price."

"How do you even know about this place?" Liara asked. "I've never heard of such a store, let alone one on the Presidium."

"I...have my ways," Ashley said coolly, leading the Asari to a table. As the pair of them sat down, a disinterested looking waiter appeared nearby to take their order.

"I'll have a bacon burger, all the usual trappings," Ashley said. "And she'll have the Tri-Burger Special."

The waiter scoffed and looked over at the timid Asari. "You sure you can handle it, blue?"

Liara furrowed her brow and glared back. "Positively."

"Your funeral," the waiter said before trouncing off. As soon as his back was turned, Ashley pulled out a plain looking bottle from one of her pockets.

"Here, hold your hand out," she ordered. Liara did so immediately, receiving two small green pills. "There you go, that should be enough to kick you into the feeder mindset. So to say."

Liara, without a second's hesitation, swallowed them down and pulled a face. "Blecch, what a revolting taste..."

"You'll probably be feeling the effects of those for the next week or so," Ashley reasoned. "Just a fair warning, they can be rather potent...so I'm told."

"I just hope it will get her to notice me," Liara said sadly, her heart aching all over again.

"Best way I can think of...oh here it is!"

"Here's your food, ladies," the waiter said. "Good luck blue, you're gonna need it." Liara glared after the waiter, only for her face to fall when she spotted the burger itself. Liara was slightly familiar with Earthen cuisine and wouldn't know the proper size of a dish like this, admittedly. But even she knew this was way larger then it needed to be!

"By the Goddess!" she exclaimed, picking up the unholy hunk of hamburger in both hands, the sauces and toppings dripping from the sides. "It's larger then my head, how am I supposed to eat this?"

Ashley idly started counting off on her fingers, picking up her own burger with the other hand. "Three...two...one..."

"Ugh!" Liara groaned, scrunching up. "My stomach!"

"Don't panic," Ashley assured her. "The initial hit is the worst."

"I...I think I've been poisoned!" Liara stammered, tears coming to her eyes from the immense pain. Glancing up at the giant burger in her hands, all thoughts of poisoning or something going wrong fled from her mind at the sight of that absolutely succulent meal in front of her. The tenderly cooked meat, the delectable combination of sauces and seasonings, all perfectly topped off with the finest ingredients you could find. She wasn't poisoned, she realized. She was hungry. Extremely hungry.

"Bon Appétit," Ashley said, not that Liara heard as she chose that moment to dive face first into the burger and start scarfing it down. The intense hunger of the pills turned her into an eating machine, tearing into the burger like a ravenous beast without caring about manners or who was looking. Not that they mattered anyway, Liara thought. Only one thing mattered right now. She was hungry, and she wanted to eat eat eat!

Before she knew it though, her hands were empty. She had devoured the burger in its entirety, its only remnants being the stains of sauce smeared across her hands and face. Glancing down, she saw sauce dribbling down her front as well as her distended stomach pressing against her once pristine outfit. Ashley grinned, still only halfway through her burger that Liara was eying suspiciously. Liara almost wanted to snatch it out of her hands before the waiter returned with another one of the Tri-Burgers.

"Wha?" she said, confusion temporarily winning out over hunger. "You ordered another one for me?"

"No...you did," Ashley said. "You screamed for another one when you were annihilating the first one."

"I don't even remember...ooh..." Liara groaned as her stomach pulsed, demanding more sustenance despite the burger already in her. Giving in to her ravenous instinct, Liara picked up the new Tri-Burger and started again, tearing into the delectable meal with renewed vigor. At some point a breeze told her that her overstuffed belly had split a seam on her dress, and before she knew it, even that burger was gone, and she started licking sauce from her fingers.

"So good..." Liara said wavering on the spot. "So...sleepy..." Her thoughts fogged over from that point on, overwhelmed by the sheer bliss of an overstuffed belly.

---

As the Normandy left the space dock the following day, the lurch of the vessel taking off roused Liara from her sleep.

"Ugh..." she groaned. "What a night..." As she got to her feet, feeling that she had been dressed in her usual tank top and shorts sleepwear, the events of the previous day came flooding back to her. The appetite enhancer, of course! But had it worked? She remembered that she was able to eat those massive burgers, but they were supposed to tank her metabolism as well. How effective was that?

Luckily her quarters had a bathroom with a decent sized mirror in it, so she made her way over. Not daring to look down at herself, fearing that it hadn't worked, Liara felt a little slower then normal. Was it her imagination, or her still being tired from waking up? Positioning herself in front of her mirror with her eyes closed, she braced herself for what she was going to see, and opened them. She gave a small start when she didn't recognize the Asari with the rounded face staring back, but the truth hit her right afterwards.

"By the Goddess!" she cried. "I'm fat!"

Her hands flew to her belly in amazement. When she last saw her belly it had burst through the front of her dress, but instead of subsiding the bulge had spread around, leaving behind a healthy potbelly with love handles. Giving it a few healthy jiggles, Liara ran her hands across more of her body, feeling the substantial layer of pudge that covered her arms and legs. Especially her legs, Liara realized, with brand new thunder thighs and a monstrous rump that was straining the seams of her shorts.

"I cannot believe it worked!" Liara said aloud, flexing her arms and giggling as the fat hung off of them. At that moment, her stomach grumbled, demanding to be filled, but the flabby Asari had other things on her mind. She was a big girl now, and Shepard was sure to love the new her! Heading to get dressed in something that would hopefully fit her, Liara planned on what she would do when meeting Shepard that morning.
1231121.title: Appetite Enhancer

choices: Liara keeps getting bigger, Shepard stays ignorant.
Liara keeps getting bigger, but Ashley starts getting more intimate?
Liara's growth finally catches Shepard's eye.
12311212.content:
Liara had to sort through a good portion of her clothes, but she managed to find something that she could tug over her new girth that was still presentable. Smoothing out a few wrinkles, Liara ran her hands over her protruding belly again, and turned on her heel to observe her rear and thighs straining against her leggings. Her fat wasn't as obvious now that she was stuffed into her clothing, but it still left her looking quite porky. All the better for attracting Shepard's attention, Liara concluded.

With baited breath and knowing Shepard's habit of stopping in before breakfast, the Asari headed for the lab she haunted, enjoying the sensation of her thighs and belly wobbling with every step. Getting an idea to postpone the issue of her angry stomach demanding food, she stopped by her locker and rummaged through the basket of assorted chocolates and candies she stashed there, a gift she had for Shepard before the commander "friendzoned" her. Taking out the biggest candy bar she could find, the portly asari arrived at her workstation as usual, swallowing down a king-sized bar of chocolate in a few bites. She was licking her fingers clean when she heard approaching footsteps. Taking a deep breath, Liara straighten up, trying to act normal. Don't come on too hard, just...let her see you. She's bound to go nuts.

"Liara, are you busy?"

"No Shepard, I was just doing some...preliminaries!" Liara said, stumbling slightly as she got to her feet, keeping her expression as neutral as possible. Shepard seemed to match said neutral expression as she stood there with her arms crossed. Were her eyes flicking downwards, Liara wondered?

"Well, we found some information on the Protheans that may be useful," Shepard continued. "Do you think you could give it a look and see if it fits in with your research? I want to make sure we're not chasing something phony."

"I'd be happy to Shepard," Liara said. Feeling brave, Liara moved like she was stretching, extending her new belly outwards, which backfired when a little, ladylike burp escaped her lips. "Oh...pardon me," Liara said sheepishly.

"It's, uh, fine," Shepard replied carefully, still not betraying much of an emotional reaction. "Keep me updated, if the info is legit it could be bad news for the Alliance presence on Noveria."

"Will do, Commander." As soon as the Commander left, Liara took a moment to breath and, out of pent up frustration, went back to her locker and devoured all of the candy remaining there.

---

"Seriously, she didn't say anything?"

"Nothing!" Liara complained to Ashley, idly stirring her eggs with her fork.

"Keep eating, Liara. Gotta get used to putting away a lot," Ashley reminded her. Liara forced herself to keep eating her big breakfast despite the candy she enjoyed an hour ago.

"Not that it matters...Shepard isn't going to go for this anyway..."

"Sure she will Liara, just gotta stay the course," Ashley said encouragingly. "Big part of being this new you is confidence, you need it to keep eating as much and often as you can."

Liara nodded. "That is true. I admit that since I got big last night I have felt a bit more confident."

"That's the spirit," Ashley said, encouragingly "Now eat up. We gotta get you even bigger if you wanna get with Shepard."
12311212.title: Big Blue

123112121.content:
"In fact, if you're up for it, around dinner time we can do a feeding session. To get you into the mindset and whatnot," Ashley suggested.

"A feeding session?"

"Yeah, that's a big part of being a feedee. You get fed." Ashley snarked. "Clue's in the name."

"Very urp funny," Liara said, stifling a soft burp. "But you're probably right, if this is what Shepard 'prefers', I should become well-versed in the technique."

Ashley smiled. "Meet me in my quarters for dinner and we'll get this ball rolling, alright?"

"Of course."

Liara finished her large breakfast and would later go on to have a large lunch as well, but even that wasn't quite enough to sate her, and she brought snacks into her lab to silence her demanding belly and help her focus on her work. It was very surreal to be eating like a hog and still be so hungry, Liara mused to herself, feeling around the edges of her new belly. Maybe it was wishful thinking on her part, but it felt a little larger then it did this morning, and when Liara looked down on it she could feel a burgeoning second chin as well. She didn't feel too concerned though; if anything it made her excited for her "dinner" with Ashley.

At the appointed time, Liara went against the tide of personnel making their way to the mess hall and wandered her way into Ashley's quarters. She couldn't help but notice that Ashley's living place was rather spartan compared to hers, probably because Ash was an Alliance soldier and wasn't afforded special accommodations, but that comparison was quickly forgotten as Liara spotted the massive array of food laid out across numerous foldout tables.

"Whew...right on time, Liara," Ashley said, wiping sweat from her bow and pulling up a chair. "Want to get this started?"

"Oh most certainly," the Asari said, her mouth already starting to water.

"Just be aware," Ashley warned Liara, coming after her with a plate of hamburgers, sadly not the size of that delectable Tri-Burger from the previous night. "Shepard's not gonna let up, and neither will I. You're going to be eating all of this, Liara, no exceptions or excuses."

Liara bit her lip, a hunt of doubt in the back of her mind, but as Ashley hovered the burger in front of her nose, all thoughts to the contrary vanished as her stomach roared for sustenance and Liara opened her mouth wide, letting Ashley stuff the burger in. Liara thickly chewed the massive hunk of meat and letting out a little sigh of relief as the thing plopped into her stomach.

"That's the spirit," Ashley said, stuffing in another burger. "Keep on eating, don't stop until I tell you to, and you'll get BIG." Liara obediently swallowed again, and Ashley stuffed in more burgers, one after the other.

"Keep...going...!" Liara said with an involuntary shudder that, in the back of her mind, concerned her somewhat. She was doing this for Shepard, so that she could catch her eye, right? She wasn't...enjoying this, was she?

Said thoughts vaporized as Ashley graduated to donuts, their sweetness shocking the Asari scientists back to the here and now. Like the burgers then went down one by one, Liara obediently accepting them again and again, even as Ashley moved to two at a time to speed things along. Before Liara could even try to savor the sweet taste, the marine had moved on to a big bowl of pasta forking it into her mouth with great speed.

"Come on fatass, don't slow down now," Ashley ordered. "We got a long way to go before we're done."

"Mrf?" Liara said through a mouthful of spaghetti, looking hurt.

"Oh, right," Ashley said, forgetting for a moment that this was new to the Asari. "The insults are a good thing, it's what feeders say to the people they feed, 'cause they enjoy getting fat."

"Mnng...ah, I didn't..huff...know," Liara said, catching her breath at this respite from the feeding. "This is...exhausting..."

"You'll get used to it," Ashley explained, lifting up the pasta bowl. "Now open wide, my...er, Shepard's prize pig. It's time to really fatten you up!"

Liara obediently opened her mouth to let the feeding continue.

---

By the end of the week, members of the Normandy were starting to notice a startling change in the Asari scientist that Shepard picked up from Therum. When asked she would claim it was a common ailment that only afflicted her species, and since most of the crew knew little about xenobiology (aside from Chakwas who Liara was avoiding for obvious reasons), pretty much everyone took what was happening at face value.

That didn't stop the occasional giggles and mutterings though, and it earned the scientist a nickname among the crew; the Blue Whale.

And what a whale she was. The appetite enhancer had done its job incredibly well, morphing Liara from "a skinny thing to a Capital F Fatass", as Ashley so eloquently put it. Thanks to her new feeding sessions and skyrocketing appetite, Liara's belly blossomed into a mighty ocean of flab, hanging out over her crotch and bulky enough to set on a table in front of her when she's eating. Her hips and shapely rear got a generous portion of her new weight as well, both becoming too wide to fit in a normal chair and oftentimes impeding her travel through narrow crowded hallways on the ship. Nowadays it was hard to miss the Asari that doubled her weight and had started to soar past that number in a matter of days, especially considering her wardrobe was becoming more and more revealing as she began outgrowing her usual garments.

In fact there was one person who seemed not to have any interest in the "blue whale", and it frustrated Liara to no end; Commander Shepard.

"She barely looked at me!" Liara vented, her voice rife with frustration as she tore into a hunk of steak the size of her head. "I had to practically wave my data pad in her face to get her to acknowledge I was even there!"

Ashley was equally flummoxed at this news, moreso because it left Liara in such a bad mood that she didn't want to be fed like the last few evenings. "Maybe...she's under a lot of stress?"

"If she is then she needs medical help!" Liara said, her jowls and chins wobbling with righteous indignation. "I'm at least three hundred of your pounds heavy, she has to have SOME sort of reaction! How can she miss me?"

"Three hundred?" Ashley asked, raising an eyebrow.

"Probably more...that is as high as the scale went before it stopped working," Liara replied sheepishly. "It's just....augh!"

"Maybe you need to change your approach," Ashley started to say before shook her head vigorously.

"No, I don't want to hear about it right now," she insisted. "I just want to eat. A lot."

"...sure thing, you're the boss," Ashley said, folding her hands in front of her and watching the Asari whale gorge herself, arm fat jiggling as she flew back and forth for more food to stuff down her angry maw. Eventually her rapid pace started to slow down and her eyes started to glaze over.

"Shepard..." Liara slurred thickly. "Why won't you...look at all of this..." She swayed on the spot as she grabbed at her voluminous belly. "I'm so...sexy now, Shepard..."

"Liara?" Ashley backed away as the bloated overstuffed fatty of an Asari looked like she was about to puke, but instead unleashed a massive belch and collapsed into her chairs, blissful asleep...
123112121.title: Bigger Blue

choices: (Someone else on the crew, or anyone really. Choose well padawan)!?!
1231121211.content:
Liara's stuffing-induced dream, oddly enough, put her back on her old lab in Therum and back to her old, stick-thin self, before the attack by Saren's forces and before the Normandy arrived to save her. Looking over some scans of Prothean ruins buried in the magma, she lowered her datapad and spotted, of all things, a cupcake sitting on her desk.

"Hm? Who left this here?" Liara wondered aloud, picking it up and turning it over in her hand. "Well, I skipped lunch anyway," she reasoned, plopping the muffin into her mouth. The second she swallowed the muffin, her stomach gurgled and immediately pooched out against the fabric of her dress, a couple pounds at the most, and when Liara blinked there were two muffins sitting on her desk.

"Well, how about that?" she mused, picking up both muffins and eating them one after the other. Her belly bulged further out with every bite until they were finished, only for three to appear when Liara glanced away.

"Do you like them?" came a sultry voice from behind, the speaker obscured by dream logic.

"They're delicious," Liara said happily, munching down one after the other, raising her head to watch four more appear in front of her and reveal her new double chin.

"That is good," the voice said soothingly. "Because it's for you darling, it's all for you. I want to see you grow~."

Now Liara didn't have to look away and look back, the cupcakes were just there, never being depleted somehow. Shoveling in one after another after another, Liara's clothes began to strain against her growing form, seams tearing and leaking blubber from the broken stitches. Before she knew it the cupcakes were turning into a pile, and she was grabbing them by the fistful and devouring them with no end in sight.

"Eat, eat, eat..!" the voice demanded. Liara complied with eagerness and her belly burst from the dress and fell heavily down her front, exposing her undergarments to the world. Not even stopping to cover up, Liara kept eating and eating as a pair of hands reached around her and started caressing the expanse of her globular gut.

"You're so intoxicating, Liara," the voice said. "Imagine how good you would look if you got...bigger." Liara kept on eating as her gloves began to strain, finally bursting off of her fatty fingers as she reached for more muffins.

"...bigger!"

Feeling a tear down the side of her thigh, Liara looked down to watch her leggings shred to bits, her boots splitting apart and letting her fat feet spread across the ground at last.

"...bigger!!!"

With two loud snaps, her bra and panties cracked under pressure, leaving the Asari naked, but the growing didn't stop there, her belly growing out and around until it reached her knees.

"So...good...." Liara murmured as her arms grew thicker, heavier, and slower by the second. Her neck thickened to help compliment a roll of chins, and her belly quickly joined her feet in spreading out across the floor in good time. Shoveling infinite numbers of cupcakes into her mouth, Liara felt herself grow and grow, flying upwards and in all directions as her weight grew to new and indescribable heights, her flab spreading across an unknowable area.

"So...big..." Liara groaned, but gave a little yelp as something clambered onto her belly, making its way towards her face ringed with chins.

"You're such a good piggy for me, Liara," the figure climbing up her body said. "So big, so very, very fat."

"I'm such a fatty," Liara said with a giggle, sending her whole body shaking violently. "I'm gonna be the biggest, fattest Asari in the whole galaxy for you, Shepard."

"Shepard?" the voice said curiously, climbing her way up to her face at last. "What makes her so special, my big blue whale?"

Liara's expression changed on a dime as she realized who her encouraging feeder was, just as they clambered up to an intimately close distance with her extremely flabby face, and gave her a passionate, loving kiss on the lips.

"You! Gah!"

Liara woke up in a cold sweat, jiggling from the sudden movement in her belly. Looking downwards, Liara found herself back at the size she was since last night. Running her hands over her face to ensure she had the right amount of chins for her weight, she pondered what she saw in that dream.

Liara still pined for Shepard, right? If so, why was her mysterious dream lover...
1231121211.title: Dream On

choices: Order some more food and get ready for class
Clean the place up before her old commander (and lover?) Jane Shepard arrives.
12312.content:
The University of Chicago's Terra Nova Campus was a sprawling complex spanning almost three miles of the planet's verdant surface, just outside of one of the major colonial cities. Night was upon this remote world now, but Liara T'Soni was still up and working. She flipped the page of her virtual book, and snorted at the preposterous theories presented therein. Honestly, Protheans inventing disco music? How did the writer come up with this nonsense? Better yet, why was this a best-seller in human space? The asari maiden snorted, and bit into yet another donut, the custard filling spurting into her mouth. Filling dripped down her double chin and splattered on her UC-TN sweater. It clung tightly around her breasts and belly, clearly intended for a woman at least fifty pounds lighter. Liara was fifty pounds lighter when she got it, but her grant to study at the famous human university was stingy, and she had to seriously cram in order to finish her course early. Cramming wasn't a problem for the studious asari, but it meant no time for proper meals. The cafeteria was a goddess-send, and the dozens of nearby fast food and delivery places were essential to her avoiding starvation.

Human food was a lot different from typical asari cuisine. It was sweeter, bolder, tangier - All the flavors were overpowering to one used to a subtle palette of tastes. That made it hard to stop at just one donut, just one bag of chips, just one burger. It was also extremely fattening, packed with so much cholesterol that she could just about hear her heart crying with every bite of pizza. Her body ballooned, from 150 (According to her scale, which used the primitive human measurement unit of 'Pounds') to 300, turning all the clothing she'd packed into skintight stripperware and forcing her to switch to human clothing. While jogging pants and a sweater weren't the most dignified outfit for the daughter of a noblewoman to wear, she had to admit, it was one of the most comfortable.

Running a hand through her tendril hair, Liara shook her head and tried to focus on the reading. Pretty soon, however, she grew bored, and reached for another donut, only to find the box completely empty! Now that was a horror she couldn't stand, even worse than the terrible pseudoscientific nonsense she was reading, and she got up. She was going to have to...
12312.title: Just plain overeating

choices: No, her studies are important. Dieting can wait.
Yeah, she'd better hit the gym before she needs to roll to class.
Before she decides, a friend meets up with her.
123121.content:
"...and a half dozen of the blue sprinkle ones."

Liara punched the button and with a heavy thunk a cardboard box dropped from the dispenser, stuffed full of delicious pastries. She bent over to lift it out, the seams of her sweatpants gently creaking, and immediately popped the top open to retrieve a jelly-filled one, stuffing it into her mouth with a few quick munches.

"Mmm...just divine," she moaned, licking jelly from her lips. Tucking the box under her arm for ease of access, she immediately went in for a second, her somewhat noisy eating drawing a few stares from passing students in the halls. If she hadn't been so focused on doing well in her studies and packing away calories to help deal with the stress of higher education, Liara probably would have been embarrassed by how she looked and acted in front of all these humans, making her species look like a bunch of prim and proper softies who turn into fat slobs at the slightest provocation. And while a few people probably did think that, most of the students at UC weren't going to make any judgements. Liara wasn't the first student to get fat in response to the stress of university education, even if she did go a little farther then the infamous 'Freshman fifteen', and even then most people didn't see it as a mark of shame or a personal failing. It was just a funny quirk of the school, like the library with the best computers in the second row, or the sneaky back entrance to a campus building that'll let you shave five minutes off your travel time. Oh, the fat Asari who carries boxes of donuts between classes? Yeah she's cool, really nice once you get to know her, just be careful she doesn't steal all your fries.

In the meantime, Liara waddled through the campus devouring donuts on the way to her next course, a rather challenging lecture on human archeology. Not the Protheans inventing disco kind either, ACTUAL ancient history. She rather enjoyed the difficulty of the coursework even if the seats were a little small for her, Liara thought as she grazed the curve of her belly with the back of her hand. If she hurried though, she could get the larger seats up front. She wasn't too big for those benches, at least not yet anyway.

In the back of her head though, Liara knew that the classes were going to get harder as the year went on, more stressful, more time-consuming. At last sparing a thought for her flabby body, she wondered if perhaps she should work to lose some of this weight, at least so she could still fit through doors before the semester ran out.
123121.title: University Days

choices: Miranda Lawson, head cheerleader and campus ultrahotty
1231212.content:
Although New Illinois was the actual state Liara was living in, it would also be accurate to say she was living in the state of denial.

Not denial of any instinct, impulse or pleasure, for Liara hadn't told herself no about any sweet or savory goody for months now. But denial over just how big her nine thousand calorie a day diet was making her. As a child she'd been rather spoiled and consequently very chubby but her strict mother Matriarch Benezia had put her foot down on that, putting Liara on a seventy four year diet that had only ended when she'd arrived at UC and gotten out of the figure conscious Matriarch's fingers. Access to an unlimited meal plan meant that Liara had splurged, indulging in old habits and trying to ignore the results.

When her Asari formal dress robes had started whiskering over a little belly pooch two weeks into term, Liara had told herself they were just shrinking in the wash. When she'd suffered a wardrobe malfunction and split a halloween costume, a slutty "Batgirl" one her roommate had suggested, from crotch to breast she'd blamed it on beer bloating. When her belly fat had first started to press against her desk in mid-November, she'd blamed it on picking a bad seat. When her back had started to hurt from her boobs getting bigger than her head, she'd assumed it was just becoming a woman. When her butt had gotten too big for any of her underwear to fit over, she'd quietly bought thongs. When her thighs had gotten so layered in cellulite the craters showed through her yoga pants, Liara started buying specially formulated cream. When a physical had showed her weight had increased by a hundred and fifty pounds in a semester and her blood pressure was "worryingly high", she'd blamed the later on stress and gone on medication that only increased her hunger.

But it wasn't until she'd arrived at the building her first serious archaeology class would be in, that she found the class was on the twelfth story. And that the elevator was broken. And that the two liter of soda and heavily creamed coffee that morning didn't count as hydration. And that the box of blue icing donuts didn't sit easily on her stomach as she began to haul her heavily overweight body up the stairs.

Liara had at first hoped to sneak into class but instead she waddled into the room thirty five minutes late. Her grey sweat pants were stained black with sweat and she gasped continuously, unable to catch her breath. Every eye went immediately to this blue berry cream puff wobbling into "Practical Archaeology" and interrupting the lecture describing the physical exertions of high altitude digs in extreme heat and cold.

Liara waddled towards a chair, huffing and puffing as she waddled through the tight rows of desks, wobbling hips bouncing into several students, and forced her beach ball buns into the seat. She began to mentally lambast the school for having such tiny desks but when she looked around the room all she saw were fit and active looking young humans easily fitting into their chairs. As the lecturer went on about how difficult digging on exotic planets with few resources and nothing to depend on but your own body was, the obese, gluttonous Asari looked down at the doughy double belly pouring into her lap and surging onto her desk.

"This is new," Liara had to admit, looking at the sweat double folds of blue fat, "I've really let myself go to seed. I'll never become a real archaeologist until I can get back in shape."

The words diet didn't enter into Liara's mind. Indeed the obese Asari was even now pulling a candy bar out of her bag to get her energy levels back up. But she remembered liking exercising six long months ago, when she'd been thin, active and restrained.

After all, Liara mused as she munched on the chocolatey goodness, how hard could working out be?

...

That afternoon, Liara waddled nervously into the campus gym. The gleaming machines and taut hotties both seemed alien to the plus sized Alien, who was feeling that her very heavy lunch and post lunch snack might have been a bad idea. Although some students had extra padding, UC's merch store only carried sports bras up to 38E and shorts up to size 20, both of which a bit too snug for the tubby Asari. Pastel blue fat poured out over her light purple shorts and bra, her bean bag belly bearing dark blue stretch marks around its belly button and her cellulite speckled thighs already turning purple from friction.

Liara caught a glimpse of herself in the mirror, cheeks turning purple from embarrassment at seeing just how big she'd gotten. She'd been fit and athletic, a skilled runner and dancer six months ago but now the woman looking at her in the mirror was as alien as a human. No more was she a delicate Asari maiden, slender, graceful and girlish, but a big blue balloon of bulbous blubber. Liara realized she was twice the size of anyone else at the gym, that she'd inflated herself into a parody of an Asari far too fat to be in this temple of fitness. She turned around to go, only to find her inflated stomach bouncing right into a hard set of abdominal muscles.

"Well well, I don't think I've seen you around here before...," a cool voice observed.

Liara looked up into the eyes of...
1231212.title: Yeah, she'd better hit the gym before she n...

12312121.content:
Miranda Lawson, the hottest girl on campus.

Liara's cheeks went immediately purple taking in the absolutely gorgeous human.

Eyes blue as ice chips set in a perfectly heart shaped face, her beautiful smile smug and self assured. Jet black hair was pulled back into a glamorous ponytail that hung down to mid back, sweaty from a hard workout. Her workout gear was even tighter than Liara's undersized garb, but jet black and probably custom made. More like lingerie than regular workout clothes. They left nothing to the imagination, showing off a tall, leggy frame that had had every ounce of unnecessary fat burned off.

Long legs gleamed, defined muscles twitching after a six mile run. Chiseled abdominals quivered after four hundred weighted reverse slope sit ups. She turned to pace around the obese alien student, showing off a pair of buns inflated to 40 inches from thrice daily squat sessions and hanging out of a tiny thong.

"N-no, I don't think I've ever used the gym before," Liara stammered, nearly drooling at the sight of these gorgeous muscles and curves.

"Really? So its your first time?" Miranda said, "I'd heard there was an Asari here but I never knew your species could be so..."

The black haired human leaned in close, perfect and all natural 36Ds bulging against her skimpy top, "Sexy."

"Did you say...," Liara tried to say.

"So you looking to drop a few pounds?" Miranda went on, as if she hadn't said a word.

"Maybe more than a few, really I've just been wanting to get back into shape," Liara tried to go on.

"Yeah, I bet you get out of breath real easy," Miranda said, tapping the bulging roll of fat hanging over Liara's pants, "hauling all of this around. You're like poking a big ball of whipped cream. I bet laying on you is like laying on a big, warm, jiggly, cuddly water bed."

"I...have gotten a little soft," Liara admitted.

"I bet you huff and puff at the slightest thing," the ultra fit Miranda smiled, pinching the roll and biting her own lip, "I'd love to see it up close."

Liara's face went beet purple, her entire jello like body quivering with lust. She'd left home a virgin and stayed one, a hundred and fifty pound weight gain in six months not getting many suitors into her bed despite the Asari's somewhat unfortunate reputation as temptresses. Her strict mother hadn't ever gotten around to teaching her daughter the in and outs of dating and such

"So how about I give you a hand working out?" Miranda asked coyly, "Just to make sure you don't get...over exerted."

"I suppose I could use a coach," the obese Liara quivered.

"Good, glad to see you're willing to take help. Stick with me and I"ll get you into perfect shape," Miranda smiled, showing perfectly white teeth.

Liara smiled nervously as Miranda dragged her towards a rowing machine, brain trying to comprehend why the most popular girl in school was taking such a shine to her. Lawson was beyond rich, the daughter of one of the richest men in human space, she always dressed in customized clothes of the latest fashion and got a new, ivory white hover car every semester. And Lawson was beyond popular, always being hosting the best parties at the mansion her father had bought her and with a hookup list longer than anyone on campus, each paramour abandoned the moment they annoyed her in the slightest way. Lawson was beyond smart, boasting the highest GPA of any double business and medical research major ever.

And she was so hot. Her long pony tail swished against perfect buns, their muscular bounce making the Asari's mouth hang open. Every breath made perfectly toned muscles across her back flex, while every step made her outlandish breasts sway from side to side. She'd led the university's cheer team since her sophmore year, pushing daringly acrobatic and eye searingly sexy routines that maxed out every ball game, and thanks to her three year back to back center fold status the team's yearly calendar was earning record money every year. The photo shoot of the perfect brunette sitting naked atop the bronze statue of the school's bear mascot, modesty protected only by her long hair, had gone a long way at getting Liara to pick this school.

The contrast between the ultra fit senior and the morbidly obese freshman was glaring, even before one got into Liara's blue skin and hair tendrils.

Liara was a quiet, socially awkward nerdette with few friends and thoroughly academic interests. She spent her days eating on her way to class and after finishing home work, her nights and weekends eating and playing video games. Although Matriarch Benezia was a powerful member of the Asari government, she kept her daughter on a tight leash.

What ever could Miranda Lawson want with her?

Tired of being perfect: Miranda was born, bred and is now being educated to be the perfect human woman: be smart, be hardworking, be fit, date only sexy humans. And she's tired of it all. Shes' especially tired of not indulging in her fat fetish. She wants to piss off her controlling dad by dating an alien as far as human perfect as possible...and maybe relax the last six months of senior year...just a little bit.

Human Supremacy: Miranda wants to prove how superior humans are to Asari by turning this already obese alien into an immobile balloon of azure fat.
12312121.title: Miranda Lawson, head cheerleader and campus ult...

123121211.content:
It would be easy to assume Miranda Lawson was not an emotional woman.

Indeed, her nickname on the cheer squad was “Icequeen” for the cold way she cruelly cut any girl who failed to meet her exacting standards of appearance and ability. She never shed a tear whenever she broke up with one of her ever lengthening list of boy/girlfriends for the slightest reason. Miranda ruthlessly crushed anyone who could possibly be a rival to her academically or relationship wise and got little pleasure from it.

But really the raven haired beauty felt a lot. Even though her father, or more accurately nannies and tutors had raised her to be cold, ruthless and emotionless, Miranda was really a quite sensitive girl who cared a lot about what other people thought about her. For twenty one years the brunette had pulled off a perfect balancing act of athletics, academics and looks and after all that, well...

As she hopped up lithely from her four hundredth reverse slope weighted sit up, what Miranda was feeling was tired. Not physically, a mere maintenance workout wasn't going to make her more than sweat a bit.But spiritually.

She was twenty one years old and couldn't remember a single moment lived for herself. The cheer captain was a test tube baby in every sense of the word, her genome had been carefully constructed from a dozen different female Nobel prize scientists, Olympic gold medalist runners and gymnasts and fantastically hot supermodels to the tune of eight billion dollars. Knowledge of her price tag had been used as a goad on the young woman her whole life, pressing her to always be the best and earn her cost. And now, with only a semester left of college what had that gotten her? A bunch of medals and awards and black belts and modeling contracts in the summer and a hundredish very sexy partners? People called her smart and people called her beautiful and people called her talented but it was all...so exhausting. And if she stopped working on all of it then they wouldn't approve of her and where would Miranda be then? College was the one time where people had fun, something she'd never done lest it harm her grades or looks, and now it was almost over and a just as packed vice presidency at her father's company was looming before her.

Miranda was tired of being perfect. Of having to be the best at everything all the time and never relaxing. Not looking perfect of course, she did take pride in her appearance and the turning heads and drooping jaws, but really if she'd actually drank at all those keggers and slept in on the weekends sometimes and occasionally had a piece of chocolate cake would it have killed her?

So when the cheer goddess hopped up and saw three hundred pounds of ample Asari pouring out of skimpy workout gear, her perfect heart skipped a beat and she fell head over heels in love at first sight..and also over a weight bench but she put her cheer training to good use and gracefully sprang back up, without anyone seeing. The near injury didn't phase her, because in front of Miranda was what she'd always wanted: someone relaxed. Here was someone who clearly never stopped relaxing to the point she was sweating just walking into the gym and who didn't care what people thought about her to the point she was shamelessly showing more ass fat than the entire cheer team had on their entire bodies. Someone who lived life to the lazy, decadent fullest and damn the consequences...and it didn't hurt that she was sexy as fuck.

Miranda quickly checked her hair in the mirror, adjusted her sports bra to show more cleavage and strutted over to the blue ball of a woman, trying to hide the quiver in her inner thighs as years of sexual conquests drained from her head. She was nervous and anxious as a virgin, her self confidence crumbling in the face of drooling desire because mad as it seemed, Miranda Lawson had a fat fetish. The tall, pale woman was still thinking of what to say when the blubbery alien turned around and rammed her drooping, melted butter belly right into Lawson's hard abs almost bringing the cheer captain to immediate orgasm.

"Haven't seen you around here before," the cheer captain managed, taking in the glory of the Asari's puffy cheeks.

Miranda spent the rest of the conversation in a daze, guiding the Asari through an easy set of weights and stretches, enraptured by every wobble, jiggle and quiver. This had to be the fattest girl on campus, sure plenty of non-athletes got a little chubby freshman year but Miranda's social circle was nothing but super fit high achievers. Her experience with actually obese girls was essentially nil, letting her long buried desires run unopposed.

"I can't believe how hard this is," the Asari huffed, balloon belly turning into deep rolls as she went through a set up, bringing her soft lips tantalizingly close to Miranda's, "I was never an athlete but, ugh, I did enough sports a sit up shouldn't be this hard...I've really gotten fat...I need to lose this."

"Lose it? No, you should focus on getting stronger. That's the real way to get healthy," Miranda told her hurriedly, not wanting an ounce of this blue blubber to burn off this bloated beauty.

She just wanted this nameless vision of lazy excess to get bigger and bigger and if that meant building up a little muscle on her, then so be it! Miranda was almost ashamed of herself for getting so attached but she was hearing wedding bells everytime the blue blobs back blubber bounced onto the floor. She pictured going down the aisle, getting a house, getting pregnant at the same time and growing old together...and just growing together. If this Asari, clearly young for her breed, was so fat now what would she be like in a few years?

The genetically perfect woman having a fat fetish hadn't been part of the plan, her father was a massive lipophobe after all. But the same woman who had given Miranda her blue eyes and 162 IQ had also passed along a love for sloth, gluttony, weight gain and obesity to her partial daughter. A childhood without the warm, soft, loving embrace of a mother had only heightened the budding chubby chaser's need for a soft cuddle, making the firm, gym toned embrace of her many lovers unsatisfactory. Seeing the Asari struggle with simple exercises was driving her completely and totally wild.

They moved on from sit ups to light weights, an hour spent getting both of them increasingly hot and bothered. By the time the five pounders were put up sweat was pouring off of both coeds, Liara's from exhaustion and Miranda's from pure sexual need.

"No more, please, I think, I think I'm going to faint," Liara whined, collapsing onto her weight bench and panting, sweat pouring off of her in torrents, "I didn't realize how hard exercise was. Oh goddess, I'm so tired. I need to go lay down in my dorm room and never get up again."

Miranda felt her taut stomach flip flop. The far too short hour was over and her obese crush was going to leave! She'd never seen her before, would she see her again? It was a big campus what if she never saw her again? If only there was someway to stay in touch with...

"So, if I'm going to be coaching you every day we should properly introduce ourselves," the ultra fit cheer leader came up with, "I'm Miranda Lawson."

"Oh, I know. I recognized you," the swollen Asari admitted.

Wait, she knew her. How could she know her? Oh wait, the popularity and the modeling and the school promotional calenders and the cheerleading.

"Oh, I get around," Miranda waved off, wondering if it was it too early to propose to the new love of her life, "but please..."

"Liara T'Soni," the obese girl said, barely able to take her eyes off of Miranda's glorious half naked physique and reaching out a hand to be helped up, "Clearly you know more about getting in shape than me..."

Oh yes, T'soni. The daughter of some big Asari matriarch. The only Asari student on UC's campus. That Liara...who'd been merely a little chubby when featured in the school paper. Her future wife and the mother of her child.

Miranda's strong, manicured hand grabbed the soft, puffy fingers of the blue alien and hauled her to her feet. The perfect cheer leader's muscles were like shapely steel cables but still she marvelled at Liara's heaviness. What must it be like to be so slow, so heavy, so soft and so blatantly imperfect? To not spend hours a day staying the most beautiful woman ever? To get obese and weak and flawed...something Miranda would never feel. Because it would be crazy if she started gaining weight...

Miranda's thoughts were cut off by accidentally pulling the sweaty, sloppy Liara into herself. Piles of lumpy blue fat hit ripples of steely pale muscle, the two women pressing tighter than lovers. Their accidental embrace stretched on, ending only when Liara's pampered tummy let out an angry rumble.

"Oh, that reminds me. Exercise is only one part of this, you need a proper diet too," Miranda said, desperate to stay in further contact, "Let's me get you a meal at my place after a spa soak."

Liara purpled at the thought of going to the Lawson mansion, sight of so many swanky soirees, at last but she was also well, a practical girl. She didn't want to impose on this far more popular beauty who'd sweetly helped her wobbly, uncoordinated bulk through her first workout. And she could really go for the dining hall's bread sticks and brownies...

"Well, I have an unlimited dining plan...," Liara started.

"A dining plan? How charmingly bohemian," Miranda giggled, "how about we..."

Fancy Overeating: Liara is treated to the high class treats of Miranda house, who enjoys them herself for once.

How the other 99.99999% lives: Miranda learns what an unlimited dining plan can get you.
123121211.title: Tired of being perfect

choices: "Sure...but let's split that cheat day while we talk."
"I can...if you help me get fit..."
1231212111.content:
Liara still didnt’ know why this gorgeous woman was with her. A woman who had every eye in the gym on her, who’s every movement was a confident, graceful strut, who could have anyone and anything she wanted, had picked her. The biggest, fattest, blubberiest girl on campus who was an alien to boot.

Many humans had an almost fetishistic interest in Asari, but for everyone Liara had met that didn’t extend to Asari over a hundred and fifty pounds. Why would Miranda want to be with her?

She got more intimidated after getting their coats, she was led out to a new Ferrari hover-car worth half of her dorm. Liara’s mother made excellent money from her government position, but nothing like this. She plopped into the real upholstered leather with a grunt, muscle groups she’d forgotten had existed screaming into wakefulness, and Miranda had easily slid into the drivers seat. She’d reached across and buckled the tubby alien in, takign a bit too long, before flying off.

“We’re going kind of fast…,” Liara said, noticing the big houses on university row go past, “um, isn’t that your house?”

“Oh that? That’s just for parties, barely a gazebo, we’re going to my actual house,” Miranda had giggled, breaking the speed limit by a hundred kph and going past New Chicago to land at a sprawling, isolated mansion, “its a treat few ever get. I hope you savor it, because I know I will.”

Liara’s legs had locked up in cramps when they landed and Miranda had to pull her out of the sports car like a cork from a bottle. She looked up at the six story mansion, larger than her dorm and shivered. Partly from the cold, for New Illinois was just as cold as the original and Winter Break was just ending, and partly from being impressed.

“Its just a little private apartment,” Miranda yawned, throwing an exotic fur coat over her hard curves, “sorry its not impressive.”

A butler opened the main doors for them, a butler with a tuxedo spray painted over its armored plate. It was a combat mech, cutting edge and armed to the teeth. It put an edge of fear into the cream puff Liara, who’d run from every confrontation since elementary school, but Miranda sashayed up to it authoritatively.

“Jeeves, I’ll need two spa treatments, two custom gowns with shoes and two meals,” Miranda ordered it, looking over Liara, “One standard post workout and one cheat day.”

The robot hummed in a cockney accent, “A cheat day madam? You’ve never ordered that before…”

“Make it a double cheat day,” Miranda insisted, “then lead our guest to her bathing chambers.”

An hour later, Liara had been showered, mud bathed, showered, steamed, massaged, facialed, soaked and massaged again. Apart from some issues with the tub clearly not being designed for a girl of her size and her ever building hunger, she’d never felt better. But she was a little...disturbed.

All the servants were mechs, apart from Miranda there didn’t seem to be another person in the place. It was ultra luxurious, she was pretty sure the sinks were pure platinum, but it seemed sadly lonely. Liara felt out of place when the butler mech led her toweled body to a changing room, past oil portraits of a seductively posed Miranda showing off firm legs and taut abs, feeling like she was intruding.

“Is that, an asari vestal robe?” Liara gasped when she saw what was hanging on the hook, a green silken tent of a garment, “how did she get one here…”

“Mistress Lawson ordered it rush produced for you specifically,” the butler mech hummed, “I will let you change and then lead you to dinner.”

Liara had gotten used to struggling into increasingly tight clothes but this green dress fit like a glove. A very snug glove but one that didn’t pinch uncomfortably and had plenty of stretch to it despite being tight. The archaeologist in training looked herself over, seeing how the pencil skirt showed off her pudgy cankles and dimpled knees. How its belly window showed off the purple stretch marks around her belly button and how her E cup cleavage could really use a bra. She turned, seeing how it pressed tight against her butt, showing that she wasn’t wearing any underwear.

“It fits perfectly!” she exclaimed, “granted I’ve gotten a lot fatter since I wore one last but still.”

She clumsily put her feet into her shoes, having to guess their position due to her gut blocking things, and then walked out of the changing room unaware that she’d put her shoes on wrong.

“You look like a blue rose,” Jeeves hummed, “let me lead you to the dining room.”

The walk was just long enough for Liara to feel winded again, her thighs starting to rasp, when she caught the scent of food. T’soni had become quite the glutton of cheap dining hall fair and was a little unfamiliar at this luxurious human food. Her eyes widened to see a long table of rare wood, one side nearly groaning with a chicken pot pie, a full rack of ribs layered in sauce, a huge bowl of lobster macaroni and cheese, a platter of greasy brisket, a tower of fried truffles, a salad with so much fried chicken, blue cheese crumbles, bacon and sweet oil dressing as to qualify as all food groups, an entire cheese tray and enough icing thick carrot cake to cause the cheer team to purge for a month. The other side had a lean cut of filet, a plate of asparagus, some mashed potatoes, a salad and a protein shake.

But hungry as the gluttonous girl was, she was distracted by the goddess who strode into the gigantic room.

Miranda in skimpy workout gear was unbelievably gorgeous, but Miranda dressed to the nines nearly knocked Liara unconscious. Long black tresses had been piled up into an intimidating tower, with two locks framing her perfect heart face, lightly dusted with make up to make her big lips gleam and her huge blue eyes pop. A designer black dress barely clung to her body, its thigh slit almost merging with cleavage that came all the way to her hairless navel. Delicate abs and pert cleavage surged towards freedom, held up only by a faint tingle of biotic power, and every step of her stilletto heels flashed her perfect runner's legs and feminine hips.

"Miri you look like a goddess," Liara gasped.

"Funny, I was going to tell you the same thing," the perfect woman smiled, "but really though, this is just an old rag I through on after a much needed workout. You though, you're so voluptuous. So...full and curvy. You must tell me how you do it!"

"Well mostly I just eat a lot," Liara said, looking down at her belly fat and remembering when it had just been a little puff, "I was always a little chubby and spent every summer at fat camp. But once I was free to choose my own meals, well I guess I went a little overboard. Its a good thing I'm going to lose it."

Miranda's blue eyes widened, "Lose it? No!"

"Isn't that the point of all that exercise?" Liara asked her in some shock, "I've always wanted to be an archaeologist in the field but this morning they all but told me I was too out of shape for it."

The impossible woman blinked, trying to remember her poise, "but but...you're so gorgeous..."

Now it was Liara's turn to blink in amazement, "Me? I weigh three hundred pounds..."

"So? You're just so," Miranda's pert buns slumped into a chair, "so relaxed looking. So care free...so soft and comfy...and you just want to be skinny..."

The human looked like she'd been gut shot, her face falling. Liara felt awkward, seeing tears gather in the Icequeen's eyes. The most popular girl in school was about to cry in front of her!

"Um well, I don't really want to lose that much weight," Liara admitted, "really if I wasn't so out of shape I'd be fine with it..."

"Really?" Miranda sniffed, "you're not just saying that..."

"No, well. I mean if I could trade places with you...," Liara began.

"Don't, its miserable. Up at three a.m. every morning for pre-workout workouts, then nothing but practice and class and home work and awards ceremonies and then if you're lucky a quick roll with someone who starts coming the minute you take your clothes off," the cheer leader huffed, "with every eye on you at all time, judging you and your father constantly on your neck to be good enough.. It's miserable."

"I know what that's like, my whole life my mother was always bitching at me about my weight and wanting to be an archaeologist instead of an official like her," Liara shared, folding her meaty arms under her heavy boobs.

"You didn't listen to her?" Miranda asked.

"Well, sometimes but I just did what felt fun to me and wound up like this," Liara said gesturing at the folds of hanging fat that were her body.

The head cheer leader looked her obese guest up and down, taking in the hundred and fifty pounds of fat that came with "fun".

"Can you tell me what fun is?" Miranda asked.
1231212111.title: Fancy Overeating

choices: Thought you'd want to stay here...
12312121111.content:
"So are these two blood cells, are they going to ...have sex?" Miranda asked as the old cartoon flashed on her four meter screen, "because they're blood cells and those can't..."

"Miri, its just a cartoon. Don't think too hard about it," Liara giggled, "the point is to relax."

Miranda blushed, both at the tiny rebuke and at the sensation of Liara's fat rolls vibrating over her body. The two were crammed into a love seat in the mansion's immense living room, which had a holovision screen larger than most apartment walls currently playing a preserved cartoon from Japan. What remained of the double cheat day meal sat atop a table in front of them, slowly disappearing into the two's stomachs.

"How can I relax if I'm sitting here wondering if the red blood cell and white blood cell are going to get together or not?" the perfect girl demanded to more of the Asari's giggles.

"Teaching you to relax is going to take a while," T'soni smiled, "could you get me another rib?"

Blue element zero field wrapped around a large, succulent short rib which levitated off of the still laden table in front of the two and popped into Miranda's open mouth. The cheer captain's eyes closed in joy and the bone popped out, leaving the mouthful of meat behind to carefully stack itself onto a spare plate.

"I'm afraid not, that was the last one," Miranda smiled, BBQ sauce staining her pink lips, "...until the second order gets here at least. Until then explain to me how this anime thing works."

Both girls were still in their fancy formal wear, complete with elbow length gloves and depending on Miranda's exacting biotic powers to feed them. Liara giggled again to see the cheerleader's coy smile, shaking like a jello mould in an earth quake. That made Miranda blush again, feeling the soft pillows of fat draped over her body shake. The two were in a tiny, very old love seat that didn't have nearly enough room. The bean bag chair of an alien flowed over her half of the seat and onto the cheer leader's, sixty one inch hips pushing Miranda tight against the arm rest. A pillowy love handle was jammed into the taper of the cheerleader's firm waist and T'soni's bloated belly roll hung over the human's firm thigh.

She felt so warm, so comfortable, so at ease...

The episode ended, the game console playing it asking them if they wanted to continue watching.

"We can turn it off if you're not enjoying it," Liara told her, hoping the brunette would tell her to hit play.

Miranda looked at her expensive watch. It was almost midnight already, she had to get up for pre-practice exercises at three, regular practice at 6 and then the four theoretical physics classes she'd signed up for her last semester...

"Let's just finish off the season," Miranda smiled, "I'm undecided yet."

Two hours later and the credits for the last episode were playing. The only food left on the table from the now triple cheat day order were a fresh pyramid of truffles, rising one by one to the two girl's mouths.

"So, how did you like it?" Liara yawned sleepily, mouth opening obediently for a truffle.

"Well, it was silly and weird and didn't give me any sort of reward or acknowledgement...but it was very nice to watch it with you," the cheerleader smiled at the nerd, opening her own mouth.

"I think *yawn* you get the point," Liara said, waving off the next hovering truffle, "no more please, I'm going to burst."

Liara's stomach was stretched to the max. Usually she was a grazer, constantly having a candy bar or a sweet at hand, never really getting full. Such a large meal had laid the freshman out, her stomach was swelled up mighily, such a mound of fat and food her double belly was back to one dome and was stretching the magnificent dress to its limit. She'd chowed down on about two thirds of the food though, having really let loose despite her decision to get in shape.

"More for me then," the cheerleader shrugged, letting truffle after truffle slide into her mouth until her cheeks puffed up with fried mushroom, "It's *chew* so good...*gulp* a little greasy...I'm not breaking out am I?"

"As if a pimple would dare touch your skin," Liara yawned, "ugh If this couch wasn't so uncomfortable I'd fall asleep here."

"It's from Versailles, I don't think it was designed with aliens of size in mind," Miranda said, "I need to get some better furniture if I"m going to have you over here frequently..."

It was a tentative question, a plead that Liara come back frequently. And strange as it was to stuff herself alongside the most beautiful woman she'd ever seen in a 600 year old chair, Liara had enjoyed herself...she'd enjoyed herself quite a bit.

"As long as you get a comfier couch. Ancient or not its hurting my back," the alien said, "and I'll need to bring a bra. I'm too big a girl to go around unsupported all night."

The Asari dress showed off Liara's bountiful charms, but also showed off how the very dense, heavy E cups pulled at her back. Her shoulders were bent inwards and her neck leaned forwards, her expression one of pain. Miranda's blue eyes widened in alarm.

"Let me rub your neck," she said, standing up with perfect grace only to realize that there was nothing covering her.

The billionaire cheerleader's dress had lacked buttons, seams or zippers, being just a drape of black silk held on by Miranda's biotic powers, letting a long slit of pale skin show from ankle to neck. But her concentration had lapsed between the food and the fluffy companion, when she stood up the cheer captain's dress stayed pinned by a blue fat roll and she was totally naked in front of her date.

"So...this is me," Miranda said to her drooling companion, "uh, that wasn't intentional but...ta-da? What do you think?"

Liara was a smart girl but her capacity for thought and response was gone. Miranda's glamorous curves hadn't been left to the imagination in her skimpy workout gear or fancy dress but naked, with every sculpted curve on display, the firm muscle gleaming with sweat from being blanked with warm Asari, she was stunning. “Relax?” Miranda said, “but I’ll, I mean I guess...but if I don’t work out now I have class till three, I’m trying to get a fourth major done before graduation…”

“I can...and I will,” Miranda decided, bounding over to her phone and sending out the alert to her assistant captain Kelly Chambers, “and I’ll...I’ll drop those physics classes and take something easy…”

The energetic brunette pulled up the school’s website and began dropping advanced mathematical science theories for Traditional Baking and a new low impact gym class called “Asari Spiritual Stretching”. With every deleted physics course her soul soared and she was grinning ear to ear by the time she got signed up for the two easy courses.

“God I can’t believe I did that, I’m going to have so much more free time,” Miranda grinned.

“Great...now can you get me some antiacid so I can go back to sleep?” the Asari yawned.

“Oh, of course,” Miranda smiled, “I don’t need much sleep, let me go get it for you…”

Even though she'd agreed with Liara that she should be doing things for herself, the fashionista had still decided to dress in full on "fuck me" mode: four inch black pumps, white tights vacuumed onto her perfect legs, a dangerously short black skirt fitted tight around her hips, a white blouse with the top buttons undone to show snowy cleavage, a black jacket and thumbnail sized diamond ear rings. Several underclassmen had tripped or walked into walls passing her while she'd clicked into the basement lab, putting a little shot of self esteem into the anxious ice queen.

Miranda was rarely late to a class, especially without any of her regularly scheduled activities in the morning, but she'd made an exception. She'd taken a little cuddle nap with Liara and done a strong set of weights with her before breakfast. Both were an indulgence, Miranda loved the thrill of pumping iron yet had always limited it, as she knew too much would make her bulky and unfeminine. Yet doing what she wanted made her happy...which had led to a heavy breakfast of fruit and waffles and hot chocolate. She'd had so much fun chatting with Liara that she hadn't noticed the breakfast was refilling her food baby right back up to maximum size. She hadn't wanted to wear a skirt today due to cold winds, but none of her ultra tight pants would have fit and the perfect girl was feeling quite bloated and nervous someone would notice. "Get it together Miri," she told herself, "a cheat day now and again is okay. A skipped cardio work out is okay. Doing that every day is going to fatten you right up. Just go to this fun class and take some notes, then go for a run..."

The lab door opened to reveal a class already paired off around baking stations, save for one coed leaning on a table. Miranda grimaced to see a rail skinny girl with leather punk attire, a pony tail and several tattoos.

Miranda's eyes narrowed, the ice queen coming back in full force, "I was out bra shopping. I know you've never done that, but it takes a while."

There was no girl on campus that Miranda hated more than Jack, an English major and already published poet. They'd had a very brief love affair freshman year that had ended after Miranda asking what Jack's band size was for a planned gift and Jack saying Miranda's ass was big. Neither had meant anything negative about it, but scholarship student Jack was sensitive over her flat chest and the appearance conscious Miranda was always worried about the breadth of her 38 inch hips. Instead of an apology there'd been insults, a break up and an ever more acrimonious hatred.

They both opened their mouth when the professor swept up, a fast speaking Salarian, "Oh yes, good good. Even number of students. Banter shows familiarity. You two will work together. Yes. Have to get started. Traditional cooking skills degrading due to easy availability of processed food. Time for introductory muffins, now!"

Miranda grimaced. Mordin Solus was known as the hardest professor on campus, one with so many rapidly earned degrees he bounced around various departments, leaving weeping students in his wake. His techno-biologic class was the only one Miranda had ever had to work at to earn an A in and she realized that this baking class would not be an easy time.

Before she knew it she and Jack were busy mixing and stirring...and arguing.

"It says 400 ml of butter, are you trying to kill us?" Miranda asked as Jack added in half a stick with her own very strong biotic powers.

"Tomato, to-mato," the poet shrugged, adding in more "you get that batter whipped up yet?"

"I'm taking my time, I don't want any of it to splatter on my clothes," the rich girl claimed, stirring the sludge very slowly with her powers.

When the timers went off and the food was pulled from the ovens, it wasn't a surprise that the pair's muffins were limp and ugly looking.

"Nice mixing fatass," Jack hissed.

"Nice ingredient measuring dumbass," Miranda whispered back.

Professor Mordin moved down the line of students, handing out forms. Miranda's eyes widened when she looked at it, seeing that it was an entire packet of review slips for each of the dozen teams.

"Project is done, time for grading. Must sample each team's results: taste, texture, temperature. Begin now," the Salarian ordered.

"A dozen muffins?" Miranda asked, eyes bulging at the caloric math, enough food for an entire day.

"Oh no," Mordin said, relief making Miranda sigh, "Whole muffin is unreasonable. Unless you want bonus points."

Miranda looked at her tray of useless food, other students already laying down slips marked with zero in all categories.

"Well, I can take a few carbs, unlike you porky buns," Jack sneared, picking up a tin and loading it up with other teams muffins.

Miranda looked at the steaming baked goods, calculating that they'd be an entire weak of saturated fat and sugar, plus a whole day of calories. Through mighty clenching, her strong abdominal muscles were keeping her food baby mostly flat but she wasn't sure her skirt would stay on if she ate that many muffins. She was about to refuse when she realized that if she didn't eat these that Jack would get a better grade than her for the project!

'Please, when I gain it all goes to my breasts. Shame we can't say the same about you," Miranda smiled coldly, picking her own dozen treats and chowing down.

Jack ate all the faster to see the cheer leader unexpectedly munching carbs, while Miranda cut through the treats like a buzzsaw. She'd rarely had any sort of muffin before and most of the class's food was excellent. Each warm bite made her feel sleepy and comfortable...until about six muffins in and her trembling abs couldn't hold her stomach flat anymore. Buttons stretched and seams strained, a tidal wave of swell that she arrested with a mighty clench of her abs. Despite flexing mightily she couldn't pull her waistline in, merely hold it steady.

Class was dismissed and she strutted out, moving easy and coyly, as if Miranda Lawson was commonly seen with a swollen stomach ten inches bigger around than normal. "Lawson," Ashley Williams sneered, "I'd have thought you'd needed rolled in after that video today."

Ashley was yet another ex-lover, from a relationship that had lasted an entire weekend until Williams had asked if Miranda was ever going to do a real sport and Miranda had mentioned the ROTC student's shameful familial military history in response. The hatred had escalated from there, made worse as Williams was one of the best footbal players on campus and Miranda had to frequently cheer for her. Again the professor came in, this one far different than Professor Mordin. She was an Asari and there her similarities to Liara ended. Where Miranda's new maybe GF was soft, short and lazy this alien was hard, tall and exuded fit energy. "Good moring girls," the Asari, clearly much older than Liara, said clearly, "I am Professor Samarra. And you will be learning how to embrace eternity with me. Let us begin with a stretch..."

Miranda was superbly fit, she could run a four minute mile back to back, held black belts in six martial arts and could hold her breath three full minutes while swimming. But she soon found herself huffing and puffing , her motions sluggish and off key as she followed along. Samarra was merciless, moving and dancing slowly and smoothly for the full hour and a half of class and for the first time in years Miranda felt herself falling behind. A little might be the result of eating ten thousand calories since the night before but she found herself making mistake after mistake, while her muscles were locking up with painful cramps.

Only Ashley making an equal number of mistakes prevented Miranda from quitting, the usually ace athelete was stumbling around like a couch potato. Both brunettes nearly collapsed by the end of the exercise, sweat pouring off of them. To their shame, the rest of the class were daisy fresh. None of them were notable athletes, a few were actually chubby even but the ROTC cadet and occasional professional model could barely pick themselves off their mats.

"Class is dismissed, except for you two," Samara said, falling into a cross legged position, "stay and speak with me."

The others left, leaving Miranda and Ashley to make their way over to the stern, blue woman, stiffly sitting across from her.

"Today was the Arilat Kreash," Samara said, "and it reveals to me internal secrets of its dancers. Both of you are weighed down with karmic loads, you will not be able to pass my class until you clear them."

Both very sweaty seniors stared at her.

"I'm sorry, but is this a religious thing?" Ashley asked, "because I'm not interested in converting..."

"Yeah, I'm not into mystical bullshit," Miranda puffed, blowing sweaty hair out of her face.

Samara didn't look angry at the rejection, "It is not religious, merely the shape of eternity. Both of you have such strong defensive walls raised to avoid hurt and hide your true selves. You deny what you want in hopes of getting recognition. Ashley, you wanted to be an english major but your cadet scholarship wouldn't cover that so you hide yourself as a jock. Miranda, all you want is for someone to accept you for you but you're afraid to be thought less than perfect."

"That is...complete shit," Miranda started, only for the Asari to place finger tips to her forehead.

"Yeah...I...an english major," Ashley said sadly, Samara's other hand going to her head.

"I can lower these walls for you," Samara said, "and let you experience a day without caring about judgement. Would you like that?"

Internally Miranda begged for it, the thing she'd wanted her whole anxious life.

Externally she sneered, "Please like that would even work. This is all just mumbo jumob and I can't believe the dean is allowing it."

"If it won't work, why refuse it?" Samara asked evenly.

"Its not really my thing," Ashley said, pulling away, a little roll of fat bunching over her spandex.

"Go ahead and try, even if it was real its not like I have any defensive behaviors," Miranda foolishly boasted.

"As you will," Samara said, surging a little bit of biotic power from her finger tips across Miranda's mind.

Memories of a childhood spent being tutored and coached, never a moment or possession for herself save for her beloved teddy bear and of an adolescent so desperate for affection and love and so afraid she'd never be good enough to earn it she'd developed an incredibly icy exterior shot through the cheerleader's brain. All the snooty upper class mannerisms and fiendish devotion to her own body to please everyone else fled past, leaving Miranda sitting alone. Her abs had fully relaxed, letting her little food baby show and she was soaked with sweat...but she didn't care at all.

"I...I...," Miranda blinked, the world looking new.

"You are now free. You will not let worries about being perfect or fears about being vulnerable control you for the next day," Samara said, "what are you going to do?"

"I...I...," the cheer captain stammered.
