Five minutes before the first official cheer practice of the year was supposed to begin and Assistant Captain Kelly Chambers was moving past freaking out and straight into freaking “the fuck” out.

The short, slight redhead sophmore paced back and forth on the gym, black cheer skirt swishing against her thighs. Her right hand held a holophone she constantly updated, filled with hundreds of increasingly panicked messages sent to Captain Lawson. Her left held a doughnut that she really shouldn’t be eating but that stress was driving her to chow down on.

“Come on, come on, text back,” Kelly fussed, hoping that her if not beloved then at least feared Cheer Captain would respond, “please text back! The uniforms aren’t here and we don’t have any drills to do…what’s going on with you? Is this some sort of test?”

No general in human or even Turian history had ever ran their armies with as firm a hand as Miranda Lawson. New Chicago University’s cheer team was only ‘required” to practice twice a week, but under Miranda’s iron hand they’d practiced seven days a week in the off season and fourteen times a week in the on season. Girls had drilled jumps, throws and tumbles to the point that they did them in their sleep, their muscles growing stronger per pound than any athlete in the school. And to further Lawson’s desire for perfection, draconian weight limits had been imposed, diets mandated and every cheerleader learned to dread the bite of calipers. Anyone found over the weight limit for a week straight was cut without remorse, Lawson’s icy force of personality having long overawed their non-entity of a coach. Yet for every girl cut, three more hit try outs for to be one of Lawson’s team was to be one of the most desirable girls on campus...especially as Lawson was more than willing to flat out buy girls who pleased her boob jobs.

Kelly was one of those, she'd come onto the team with A cups and now after a year of sucking up to the icy, sarcastic Miranda and fulfilling her every whim boasted full, fake Cs in her tight cheer assistant captain's uniform. While some might see refilling Miranda's water bottle, printing out her cheer routines and handing out uniforms as too much work, getting to be around the gorgeous Miranda was enough to set the bisexual sophomore's heart a flutter. Lawson was so sculpted and curvy and leggy...and the captain's uniform was even skimpier than every one else's...Kelly remained a virgin still, because no one else could compare to the girl she'd pinned her heart on. And the weeks without hearing from Miranda had driven Kelly round the bend with worry.

That none of the team had heard so much as a word, digitally or verbally, from their Captain in three weeks was alarming. Especially to Kelly, who worshiped the ground the lithe, busty ice queen deigned to walk on and devoured the tiny crumbs of near praise tossed to her. If she hadn’t been seen around campus, and online in a near viral eating contest with angsty poetry major Jacqueline Nair, Kelly would have thought Miranda had been kidnapped. Rumors circulated: that Miranda was on academic probation for fucking the Dean, that she’d gotten pregnant from an orgy with every sports team at once, that she’d lost her money and was living with an alien freshman, even (most laughably at all) that she’d gotten fat.

“Like that would ever happen to Miranda. Ugh, she’s gonna be pissed when she sees me,” Kelly sighed, looking down past her fake C cups to the little puff of belly fat she’d picked up in the training hiatus.

Kelly was short and skinny...ish...but hadn’t always been that way. Her family were fatties and at one point she’d had an extra hundred pounds on her body than she did now. It had taken a lot of work in High School to get and stay skinny and Lawson’s training had made her steely and fit, with a flat stomach, tight butt and figure appropriate fake C cups. Lawson had picked Kelly to be the May girl in the cheer team’s fundraising calendar and wearing just a miniscule cheer skirt on the beach had been the proudest moment of Kelly’s life so far.

So proud that she’d rewarded herself far too much during Winter Break with her very heavy set mother’s excellent cookies, turning back up at school ready for a crash diet to try and get rid of the little tummy fluff she’d picked up. Instead lack of contact from Miranda, no practices and the rest of the team chattering in her ear about what was happening had driven Kelly into stress eating. Five weeks of too many carbs and not enough exercise had taken the polish off Kelly’s muscles and made her midriff squishy, as shown far too much by her skimpy cheer top. She knew her odds of being on the team next week were low. Every returning cheerleader were looking a little softer, without Miranda’s boot on their necks they’d over indulged. The twenty or so girls were still slender and gorgeous but all looked a little softer than before break.

“Ugh, why can’t she just pick up,” Kelly sighed, adjusting her short black skirt against her nascent muffin top.

When the holo-phone actually rang with a picture of the svelte Captain, 95% naked from the photo that had convinced Kelly to pick NCU as her college, she was so surprised she almost dropped it onto the gym floor.

"Kelly, I need you to meet me at the gym side door," Miranda ordered, "uhm...please. I'll need your help carrying breakfast."

"Bweakfwash?" Kelly said, swallowing quickly.

"Yes, for the new team diet. Come now, I want them in while they're fresh," Miranda ordered.

Kelly swallowed and hurried for the door, hating the little jiggle at her belly. She sucked her stomach in as far as she could and opened the door, admitting a chill and a very tall stack of delicious smelling donuts. The treats were plunked into Kelly's arms, heavy enough the out of shape girl almost dropped them.

"Ah, there we go. Thank you Kelly, don't know what I'd do without you," Miranda said, uncharacteristically kind, "go set them down on the bleachers and get the girls over. I'll get the rest."

"The rest?" Kelly squeaked, shocked that the greasy carbs weren't bursting into flame from being near the perfect Miranda.

Kelly staggered over to the bleachers, setting the stack down to the confusion of the other girls who'd gathered up around the unfamiliar carbs. Miranda soon joined her, much longer legs letting her put the stack of fresh donuts down almost as quick as Kelly. The Captain hopped agilely onto the bleachers, a move that few among the athletic girls could have copied.

"So girls, I apologize for the radio silence first off," Miranda said, hands on her hips.

Kelly looked her idol over and felt...odd. Miranda was in a very short cheer skirt that's black fringes left nothing to the imagination, her gorgeous legs visible from ankle almost to her panties. And those long, shapely legs looked...thick. Thick and soft.

"I know I've pushed you over the last three years. Pushed you harder than you needed to be and not for your benefit, for mine. I'm sorry for that. I wasn't thinking like I should have been. I was using you and that was wrong with me," Miranda announced, "and by way of apology, well...weight limits are now off. If you can do the routine, you're on the team."

Twenty restrained waists relaxed, starter bellies popping out.

"So girls," Miranda said, undoing her zipper to reveal an untoned, almost chubby waistline.

Kelly's mouth fell open. Forget her little tummy, Captain Lawson had a full on muffin top! A belt of soft fat bulged over Miranda's skin tight skirt waist, pale jiggle instead of hard muscle. Further up, her ribs were gone and she instead had little side rolls. Her breasts were puffing out of her bra, the veiny white spheres about to rip free with every breath. How she'd managed to cram herself into the skin tight outfit was a mystery, Kelly would put even money on it catastrophically failing sometime in the next hour.

"To show you I'm genuine, our first practice is going to be a breakfast," Miranda told them, opening up a box and taking out a chocolate eclair,"and then a discussion on routines this year. We're going to be going for a less...acrobatic approach. But don't think for a moment this will be easy, we'll be doing seven practices a week still: three of them will be team breakfast's and weight lifting sessions. I'll be expecting you all to eat appropriately. See me if you need money for a nutritionist or extra groceries.'

The Captain further stunned her team by thrusting the entire eclair into her mouth, chewing and swallowing in seconds. Kelly felt sweat break across her forehead, what had Miranda done to herself? She'd been so perfect and fit, now she was so squishy and soft and decadent...

"Oh and girls. From now on my...enhancement rewards will be off the table," Miranda told them, glancing down at her own mountainous cleavage, "I assure you that you won't need it. So let's eat!"

Miranda grabbed another doughnut and sat, a little too quickly to a loud rip that echoed out over the gym. The front of her cheer skirt had, under pressure from hip and tummy, ripped in half, revealing Miranda's soft, squishy waist in full over her thong panties. Kelly half expected the other cheerleaders to break into giggles at seeing their tyrannical captain eat her way out of her clothes in front of them but the stunned crowd of women all just watched.

"Oh and we'll be taking orders for new uniforms. Trust me girls, be generous with your size," Miranda smiled, patting her stomach, "if you're not watching you can get big quickly."

Kelly should have been hearing laughter, but instead she found herself on the bleachers munching a doughnut and chatting happily. It shouldn't be happening, they should be taking their revenge on Miranda's cruel past behavior but the chubby cheer captain was acting so nice and listening so well that all Kelly could do was eat and go along with it...

And this plan is going to work perfectly and I'm going to fix my baking grade once and for all."

Every single class period she and Jack were teamed together and without fail they...failed. Totally unable to work together, they'd produced a string of inedible crud over the last five weeks and had to gorge grade all the other student's work just to get Ds. It wasn't that she minded the extra carbs: without all the extra calories from trying to get her grade above failure, Miranda would probably still be a mere DD cup. And the now customary cheers of the crowd as she and Jack had their daily competition, urging them to eat, eat, eat...she loved that attention. The two were tied, 7-7 and the contests between "Munching Miranda" and "Gorging Noir" earned thousands of social media views every time. Some comments were mentioning that they were looking "chubby" but Miranda was finding it a positive experience, one she wouldn't end even though it was likely to alert her father to her fall from perfection. She was ready for that...mostly...

But damned if she was going to get a D grade in any class.

Miranda replayed her latest argument through her head and opened the door to an immediate insult.

"What took you so long Lawson, your mobility scooter break down?" the harsh English major sneered from her table, "or did you just stop for your insulin injection?"

The head cheer made herself not look down her nose at Jack. She pointedly didn't mention the muffin top pouring out between Jack's leather vest and far too tight leather pants. Or the tears in the side from her flabby thighs. Or her puffy upper arms. Or her second chin. Miri wasn't the only one to beef up from all those baked goods after all.

"Jacqueline, I have a proposal to you," Miranda smiled easily, "We don't get along, there's bad blood from my side and I apologize for everything I've done. I treated our relationship poorly and I hurt you, I was in a bad place and took it out on you. But I have a proposal for us to get a better grade in here going forwards. Away for us to work together."

"Why should I care? I'm not the one who's nothing more than her weight," Jack laughed, "and yours is getting higher by the day. You crush the other bimbos on the pyramid yet?"

Miranda closed her eyes and hoped for strength, "An eating contest, a big one, winner take all. The victor leads our team in this class, the loser follows their directions."

"Pffft, those are pretty lame terms Lawson. You that eager to pig out?" Jack laughed.

"I'm open to additional suggestions, if you have them?" Miranda asked, aware of all the eyes on them.

The formerly rail thin poet stood up, tattooed hands on the table and eyes glowing with biotic power, "You win, I dedicate a paean to your ass. A flattering one. My best work and I read it in public."

Lawson blinked. Jack might be a foul mouthed reprobate obsessed over her past life as a foster kid, someone who wasted money on too many tattoos and possessing a general bad attitude towards her social superiors...but she was a wonderful poet. A future laureate by anyone's guess who's words could make grown men break down in public tears at her amazing verse. Everything she wrote was published and book deals or a poetry PhD were being whispered. If she wrote a poem about Miranda's ass, it would probably be the best poem written about someone's ass ever written.

"And if you win?" Miranda asked cautiously, having started this as a way to get a better grade.

"I rub Nair onto your head and shave it," Jack grinned, "also in public."

Miranda loved her hair. Jet black and wavy, the glorious mane was so long its tips brushed her rounded buns. Losing it would be like losing...well it would be like getting chubby.

"Of course," Miranda smiled, "let's get started."

Jack blinked and the rest of the class cheered, baked goods springing out of nowhere. The poet suddenly felt a spike of fear, had Lawson planned this?

"Hey, where's the professor?" Jack asked.

"Oh, professor Mordin got called to an emergency meeting with the dean. Someone made a sizeable donation to his department," Miranda yawned as steaming muffins, cookies and glasses of cream were set on the table, "and he suggested that I put the word out to class that they were to make something simple. Everyone seemed most appreciative of my little contest idea though..."

Lawson felt her stomach rumble with hunger as a chorus of cheers and claps went out. She'd gorged extra heavy the last week to stretch out her stomach, having a girlfriend with co-feeder tendencies helped, and then hadn't touched a morsel that morning to be extra ravenous. She undid her belt, letting what was between starter belly and poochy pot roll all the way out, and rolled up her sleeves, taking off her expensive rings.

"So, Jacquelin," Miranda smiled at the chubby, brown haired poet, "are you ready to eat or are you going to puss out and start writing that paean now? I'll be happy to show you if you need a reminder, my ass has only gotten sexier since freshman year."

"If by sexier you mean fatter, I'm looking forwards to seeing you bald," Jack said, undoing the button on her pants.

The poet's flat stomach was also vanished, replaced by a rather jiggly carb belly.

"First one to empty their side is the automatic winner. First one to leave their seat, throw up or give up loses," Miranda smiled, looking at the trays of delicious baked treats before her, "so...let's begin!"

12312121111111111111.content:
The contest started with cookies.

Miranda felt her tummy give a gurgle as the smell of the fresh cookies hit her nose. She'd forgone breakfast for the contest, something that would have left her hungry by 9 pm even when she'd just eaten some yogurt and melon. Now that she was verging to plump the platter of cookies made her drool.

The gorgeous rich girl gave a grin at Jack, who was stuffing cookies into her mouth, crumbs flying. She let the flabby poet eat, knowing the rate was unsustainable. Miranda picked up a single cookie, dunked it in cream and chewed. Then repeated, all at a good sustainable rate, even though Jack cleared her plate while Miranda had a third of her plate left.

"You're gonna look good as a chrome dome," Jack laughed after a mighty belch, brushing back her comparatively thin, dull brown hair.

"Be sure to mention how bouncy my cheeks are," Miranda smiled back sweetly,patting her swollen derriere, "you're the only poet eloquent enough to do me justice."

"As if lardass," Jack shrugged, unnerved by Miranda's confidence and belching again.

The other biotic was a third of the way through the pecan muffin course by the time Miranda began. The poet was shot gunning the treats, ripping them out of their paper with a splash of crumbs and shoving them wholly into her mouth, barely chewing and swallowing with her mouth open. Her flabby stomach was swelling out, a freshly popped pregnancy of carbs.

Miranda continued eating at the same rate: peel, dunk, chew swallow. Her free hand had begun massaging her waist, slight paunch starting to push a little tighter against her dress.

Jack glared at her, angry that the cheerleader wasn't even apparently trying...but that Miranda was half way done while a third of Jack's muffins remained. Jack tugged at her pants and started shoving the muffins in two at a time, cheeks bulging. The pecan muffins were excellent...but dry and on her third and last double dose Jack gagged. She began coughing and hacking, not choking but near enough while Miranda just kept eating. Her face was red by the time she finally chugged down her glass of cream and Miranda had only a quarter of her plate left.

"You must leave in my stretchmarks," Miranda said, calmly peeling a muffin, "I was a bit ashamed of them at first but I've become rather proud of them. I want to see the language you use."

Jack angrily tossed the muffin tray away from her side, leaning over to grab the bread plate and letting out a painful wince as her stomach, swollen with food and air, pressed into her pants with the rip of a seam. The poet tried eating more slowly, the very salty butter on the roll making her dry mouth chew slower. Her cream glass was empty though and when she looked up after her second of eight rolls, Miranda was starting on her first.

"And I want a whole line about the contrast of its firmness and softness," Miranda went on, dunking the roll, "really lay on how much exercise I must be doing. Doing lunges with an extra thirty five pounds is harder than I thought."

"Gonna get your...ugh...eyebrows too," Jack said, chewing down her third roll, "why are they so dry..."

Miranda was only a single roll behind Jack when the other biotic finished. Although pleasant on the outside, the cheerleader was starting to suffer. Thanks to her daily gorging her stomach was merely feeling sated...but that meant from here on out things would get tougher. And while she'd prepared very well for the contest, researching and practicing eating contest techniques, being a slave to fashion was paying against her. Her dress didn't have any room for her swelling waist, especially as the last weeks preparatory eating had all gone to her stomach. On the last of her roll, Miranda put both hands to her stomach and found the lowest button of the dress starting to separate from its thread. She fumbled with the bottom buttons as she swallowed, sighing as they opened out (apart from the lowest that broke and being grateful she'd slid on a thong that morning.

But if Miranda was starting to suffer, Jack was in total agony. Sweat pouring off her brow, Jack glared at the tea cake in front of her which seemed to sway in her vision. Her stomach gave a groan of pain, Jack's early burst had swallowed down a lot of air along with her food and it was churning in her guts now, feeling like she'd swallowed a glass of burning ash on the inside. The punk poet's leather pants were a painful prison even unbuttoned, she'd had to roll onto her back and fight hard to shove her increasingly puffy body into them, her flabby gut and beefy buns were starting to cross over from skinny fat to genuinely chubby. Add on a few pounds of carbs and a glass of cream and they were stabbing into her soft, sensitive pudge. She gasped, her mouth feeling sand dry and only the sound of Miranda picking up a knife and fork made Jack look up from the tea cake.

"I'll allow you to gaze upon it as much as you wish while writing," Miranda said, slicing the cake into eight portions with neat motions, "photography wise only of course. I'm off the market right now and it wouldn't feel right to pose nude in the flesh for you. Especially given our history. I still rather value the little weekend we had and am sorry I reacted so badly to you."

The fucking cheerleader's gut was swelled out so big it had started to rest across her thighs but she slowly began chowing down on the slices without wasting a crumb. Jack roared and dug into the cake like a toddler, shoving handfuls of it into her mouth in a frenzy. Half way through she started hiccuping, the spasms becoming so violent she had to cover her mouth. Each hiccup hurt as badly as a kick to her swollen, tender tummy and by the time the fit had passed, Miranda was down to her last slice. Her buttons might be undone up to her bra, a faint stretch mark visible under her belly button, and beads of sweat were forming across its pregnant looking surface but she was eating at the same sustainable rate.

"Gonna call you...urp...Homer...urf...Simpson...," Jack moaned, referencing an ancient and little known cartoon as she shoved the last of the cake in her mouth.

"I would have thought you'd be an Elmer Fudd Girl," Miranda smiled.

The cheerleader's stomach felt like it was being stabbed from the inside. Her waist, her gorgeous tiny, toned waist, was this big fat gut just laying on her thighs for everybody to see. Academically she knew she all the situps she did every day were contributing to her victory, letting her support such a feast in relative safety and comfort, but she felt so embarrassed. She was Miss Perfect, the hottest girl on campus who could fling her self in the air and spin head over heels and now she was a supine sow of a fat girl. Yes she liked eating like a pig every day, yes she loved Liara nibbling her increasingly ticklish fat, yes she loved outgrowing her clothes and not running and sitting on her butt watching cartoons...but she felt so vulnerable. Everyone was going to think she was ugly and if they all mocked her, could she deal with that...even if she was sopping wet from being so full. Good lord but she could go at the slightest touch.

She drained the last of her cream to wet her lips, blinking tears only to realize every one was cheering her:

"I think I'm in love!" a girl lacross player laughed.
"Lawson can really eat!" a sorority sister said.
"She makes chubby look good!" a football player cheered
"Holy crap but I'm off my diet!" a track girl no longer fighting the freshman fifteen announced

As Jack was swaying in her seat, looking like she'd been kicked in the head, Miranda paused to smile and blow a kiss at her adoring public. The poet was staring at her pie, muttering, and glared at Miranda, opening her mouth to speak but having to swallow upchuck. Miranda kept grinning and by immense force of will and effort crossed one thick leg over the other and started on the pie.

It was cherry, Miranda's current favorite and sickeningly sweet. She knew she needed to avoid sugar if she wanted to keep her pearly grin but the stuff was so good. The cheerleader ate like a starving wolf and not a pampered fat girl who'd just gorged on thousands of empty calories, her fork and knife flashing. Before she knew it she was ninety percent done done, looking up to see Jack forcing her first slice down and pausing to gag.

"You don't have to do it in public if you don't want to," Miranda told her through mouthfuls, "...but I would like the poem. I plan on framing it."

"Fuck...you....fatass," the stuffed, pained biotic muttered.

"Apologies, Jack...well. Maybe if my girlfriend agrees," the plump girl promised, stretching out her long, shapely, thick legs for her adoring public to see and putting her ankles on the table to swallow her last bite.

The University might be well funded, but it had cheeped out on the chairs. Miranda's old, frail metal stool wasn't up to a chubby cheerleader with so much food in her belly gyrating on it. Screws snapped and Miranda's swollen buns plunged towards the floor and an automatic disqualification...but a surprise surge of biotic power caught her. Sweat pouring from her brow, Miranda levitated herself back up, seat pressed to her butt. She'd always been a fairly strong biotic but her old levitation limit had always been about a hundred and fifty pounds, something she'd have exceeded before the feast

On the other side of the table, Jack was panting, one hand lit with a biotic field.

"Fuck, I'm not beating you...by luck," Jack moaned, "lardass...now finish."

Miranda finished off the last forkful and swallowed, Jack sitting her to her feet. The cheerleader found herself leaning forwards, unable to stand up straight.

"I appreciate that, thank you," Miranda nodded at her rival, "let's trade off leadership every day. Sound fair?"

"Sure...I might not be here next class though...," the poet moaned, collapsing face first into her pie.

123121211111111111112.content:
Liara T’Soni had two problems.

The first was getting this presentation on decrypting Prothean data fragments done before it was due in two days.

The second was that her girlfriend was just too Goddess damn luscious.

Sat comfy in a recliner in Lawson's palatial living room, the weak winter afternoon sun gleaming outside, T’soni realized she’d been looking away from her holoscreen for so long that it had turned off, her eyes locked onto the supine form of Miranda Lawson who was stranded on one of her new, ultra modern, ultra comfy couches exactly where Liara had found her three hours earlier. Five feet and ten inches of freshly plus sized cheer leader was somehow managing to look elegant despite being still stuffed to the brim with baked goods.

Where most after the feast she’d scarfed down might at best wear a pear of granny panties and a T-shirt, Miranda had made herself change into a pair of skintight stockings, a miniscule G-string and a sexy nighty, both jet black. Her now plump legs were stretching the stockings half transparent, the shapely soft limbs making Liara want to drool. The bottom half of her carb stuffed, swollen gut hung out from the the nighty’s silky skirt, gleaming with the cocoa butter lotion Liara had rubbed onto it five minutes ago, and pressed the front of her tiny panties down.

“Ugghhhh….it hurts….,” Miranda moaned, holding her ancient teddy bear tight to her heavy, pale bosom, “give me a belly rub…”

Liara wanted to rub the cheerleader’s stomach since she’d first seen the video of her girlfriend gorging, eating like a calm, steady machine with a gut like a beach ball. When Miranda had first started letting herself go, Liara had been afraid she wouldn’t be attracted to a non-buff Lawson...but the softer Miranda got, the more turned on the Asari got around her. They’d had sex twice yesterday, the little tummy Miri had swelled up with in her eating practice making her wild...and this gut being hauled around was still the size of that stomach even hours later. If she'd seen Miranda during her feasting contest, Liara might not have been able to restrain herself and taken her right there and then.

“I just gave you a belly rub,” Liara said, hefting herself up and waddling over to the brunette and squirting some lotion onto the dome anyway.

She’d be proud of herself for not giving a fat girl grunt on rising and for her belly rolls to only press against her thighs half way to the knee, if not for how sexy this woman was.

“Ooooo...thank you,” Miranda sighed, feeling the freshman’s soft fingers gently rub her swollen belly, “I feel like I’m gonna pop still…”

“That’s because you aren’t doing anything but laying there,” Liara said, barely keeping her hands off the biotic human’s tits or pussy, finding her stomach a warm layer of squish over hard food, “you should distract yourself.”

“Ohhhh...I have an idea,” Miranda smiled, “if you’re not busy…”

“I am sadly, not all of us are billionaire seniors. I’ve got to get this presentation done...tempting as you are,” Liara sighed, taking the gorgeous soft curves, “laying there all soft and lazy like a fat girl…”

“Hey, I’m not lazy…,” Miranda said, briefly trying to sit up and quitting, “and I’m not a fat girl…”

“Miri, you’re gorgeous but you just solved an old feud by eating ten thousand calories in forty five minutes,” The Asari giggled, “and you are getting kind of lazy.”

“I work out twice a day...I mean not today because of the contest...or yesterday because we had sex...or the day before because discussion at practice went so long," the brunette realized with dawning horror, "I haven't worked out all week have I? I used to work out three times a day! I'm gonna get fat..."

Liara laughed, "Get fat? You're overweight Miri, thirty five pounds in as many days."

"Probably more than that," Miranda sighed, looking at her belly and then at the half empty, third glass of cream mixed with digestive enzymes she'd drank to sooth her self, "but...I want to eat whatever I want. I want to be full and soft and big...but I don't to get out of shape. I like to be strong and athletic and acrobatic. What if I can't do a cartwheel anymore or keep up with my cheer routines? My muscles have made it so I haven't felt all of this but if I keep slacking off they'll atrophy and I'll get all weak."

"Well, I'd love to give you a work out now but I need to not get an F first," Liara said, waddling back to her computer and giving Miri a glimpse of her immense blue backside.

Liara really was wearing just panties and a T shirt, bulbous curves hanging out of them. The Asari was down below the big three double zero...by a single pound, all her exercising was making Liara more energetic and happier, even if her clothes were still the same size.

"Fine...what am I supposed to do then?" the senior whined, "I'm bored. Usually when I'm bored I either work, workout, have sex or go find someone to have sex with. I've never been a chubby girl with an upset tummy Liara, I'm in unfamiliar ground here, help me."

"Well, I usually play video games. My console is still connected to the holoscreen," Liara said, "but I really have to get this done okay? I'm going to take this into the kitchen because well...you're too damn hot to do this around."

"Video games?" Miri said with disgust, "those are for nerds..."

"Miranda, we had sex during an anime marathon," Liara smiled, "you are a nerd and there's no going back for you unless you stop over eating. Which I'd hate because of how hot you look chubby. Now excuse me, I've got to finish this presentation before I wind up with my face between your thighs."

The cheer leader huffed, watching her girlfriend's couch cushion buns wobble until they left the left her field of vision. Miranda scowled, not being used either to feeling like crap or to being refused sex. She wanted to be doing something but she also didn't want to do anything but lay here on this warm couch and hug her teddy.

"Is this what being lazy is like Mr. Grizzly?" Miranda asked the old toy, the only non-education toy she'd ever been allowed and her only real friend until Liara...which sounded sad now that she thought about it, "I think I hate being lazy then. Its a wonder anyone can get fat with how boring laying here is."

She finished off her glass of soothing cream and using her biotics rang a small bell, instantly summoning her butler Jeeves, the modified YMIR mech instantly appearing almost silently.

"Yes Mistress Lawson?" the heavy robot asked primly.

"I would like another glass of cream, please," Miranda said, daintily wiping her milk mustache off with a napkin.

"Of course...My programming requires me to note you are 9,000 calories over your recommended daily limit," the Mech said.

Miranda looked down at her still bloated belly, her cream consumption keeping it from going down fully despite several trips to the powder room. She thought about how tight her stockings, new size tens, were feeling and how her brand new 38 E cup bra felt like it was strangling her. About how she hadn't worked out or even walked more than a few thousand steps the last few days...and about how much she wished Liara wasn't so busy.

"Override Code Lawbringer, remove all caloric reminders," Miranda said, "then please get me another glass of cream. But first get me the controller by the holoscreen please..."

With another glass on the coffee table and the controller in her hand, Miranda settled in to try and play her first video game. She scrolled through Liara's downloads, rejecting all of the many erotic LitRPGs the recently de-virgined Liara had used and then all of the nerdy RPGs.

"My girlfriend is a nerd, Mr. Grizzly. A big fat nerd with a big flabby gut and big bean bag ass cheeks and giant pillow thighs that should be around my face right now," Miranda told the teddy bear, "hmmm, economy builder strategy games...maybe not tonight...what's this, a "shooter"? What is that?"

The game was called "SPECTER: Rachni War", a multiplayer game about the defeat of the ancient insectoid alien invasion of the galaxy. She spotted a dozen historical inaccuracies, namely humans and Turians being in the Citadel alliance centuries ahead of schedule.

"Hmm, I always enjoyed combat simulations," Miranda thought.

Her father had insisted she be trained in several martial arts, as well as shooting and simulated combat, in case someone tried to kidnap his billionaire heiress daughter. It had been the closest thing to fun she'd had until she'd lost her virginity.

"This should be just like that, easy peasy," she told the old bear, "oh look character customization!"

The menu Miranda opened up had several created characters in it, one of them a female human biotic at max level. She opened it up to find an avatar of a tall, leggy woman with pale skin, black hair and quite outrageous breasts clad in a paid DLC cheerleading outfit.

"My little Liara has a type," Miranda giggled, "...damn I was skinny. Let's start at a lower level though."

She started a match with a level one character, the match beginning...

Video Games Suck: Miranda dislikes the game, vowing to keep exercising heavily to stay fit, active and agile despite getting heavier.

Video Games Rock: Miranda loves the game and is great at it, beginning to play heavily and drops that afternoon work out. Who needs a daily jog when you can join the college's Esport team with its plentiful mountain dew and pizza...

1231212111111111111122.content:
"Ugh, I think that's enough for tonight," Liara yawned, wide enough for her fourth chin to crease out as her ears popped, "I'd guess I'm about eighty percent done with the presentation...and about three hundred percent over my calorie limit for today."

When you had a raging fat fetish and a presentation due, leaving the room your freshly plus sized girlfriend was moaning in her barely fitting lingerie was a productive idea.

When you were trying to lose weight because you tipped the scales at three hundred pounds of blueberry marshmallow fluff and had to take high blood pressure meds at the Asari version of 19, going into the over appointed and fully automated kitchen of a woman determined to eat herself out of a supermodel figure by graduation was a terrible idea.

Liara patted her heavily swollen belly, firm for the first time in her life she was so stuffed. She'd started off snacking on some sliced vegetables when the kitchen robots had asked what she wanted but typing always made the fat Asari hungrier as she went along. Veggies turned into a salad turned into a sandwich turned into a giant pot of red beans and rice into a milk shake into a cheese cake.

"No wonder you're obese," Liara yawned at herself, pushing up off the chair, "if you don't watch it you'll get fat...er."

Liara didn't want to get skinny again, not that she'd ever really been skinny. But she did want to be fit enough to go on archaeological expeditions without having a heart attack, see her feet and maybe even run. She was proud of herself for growing some muscle under her abundant pudge but the Asari knew she needed to get some self control. Her ideal would to be around where Miranda was now, a super thick hour glass with huge boobs, wide hips a paunch and enough muscle to carry it all easily, instead of where she was now a shapeless blob with out much of a curve to herself.

But that could all start tomorrow, right now she needed bed, it was midnight after all. She waddled through long hallways past the now outdated portraits of Miranda, surprised to hear sounds of active video game play coming from the living room at this hour. Liara had expected her to like the game system, under her high maintenance and ice queen personality was a cuddly, bubbly nerdette, but she hadn't expected her to be playing seven hours later....

"Miri....Miri...I need a belly rub," the Asari moaned, putting hands under her very swollen paunch which felt hot to the touch.

"Haha, what do you mean you don't think I'm a girl? I'm the sexiest woman ever born!" Miranda boasted, cackling as an explosion went off and the game roared "Kill Streak X10!"

On the couch, Miranda was sitting up right, with an expensive looking headset and microphone over her head and her feet up on the coffee table clad in fuzzy bunny slippers. The cheerleader's gut was swelled back up to max level, possibly even larger and resting in her lap, with her teddy bear perched atop it. A large milk mustache and a mostly empty glass of cream explaining that and the frequent trips a servant robot had made to and from the kitchen while Liara had worked. On screen a svelte Asari Justicar smashed apart a Krogan Juggernaut, dodged expertly from the shot of a Turian sniper and then used a biotic vortex to suck in three human Commandos.

"If you saw my tits you'd fucking faint you little perverts" the cheer leader snapped into her head set, her character rolling under a shotgun blast from a Salarian engineer and biotically slamming him into a wall, "they're bigger than my head and bounce like jello in an earth quake. No I'm not fat! I'm at a perfectly healthy weight for my height."

Liara stared. She'd always hated the Justicar class, it not only reminded her of her stern mother but was one of the trickiest classes to play. She'd never gotten it out of level two. But Miranda's character gleamed with high level gear and did another burst of biotic powers to completely end a Rachni Queen after it had killed her whole team with a stream of vomit.

"Come on, stay out of the acid! God am I playing with children?" Miranda said as the game announced it was over, crowning her as the player of the game, "I can do the splits you little dweeb!"

The score scroll showed the Cheerleader hadn't been killed a single time and that she'd scored over a hundred kills. An announcement showed that her player rank levelled up to Silver 4, five higher than Liara remembered it being. Miranda took another drink of cream, blue eyes widening as something was said over the chat.

"Oh that is it you pimply virgin! You want a war, I will give you a war!" the cheer leader snapped, screenshotting the game and lurching to her feet...and then lurching to her feet again after her belly weighed her down too much to easily rise, a fat girl grunt escaping her lips, "Lili! There you are, where's my computer. I'm finding the address of this little asshole, buying out whoever his parents work for and firing them!"

"Isn't that a little drastic...have you been playing this whole time?" Liara asked her, trying and failing to take her eyes off of Miranda's belly.

The glamorous cheerleader's figure had softened up plenty over the last month, going from ultra lean into a soft hour glass. If she'd put her mind to it she could probably drop the weight in a couple months, but that she'd eaten herself back into this state the second time in one day pointed to Miranda never being skinny again. Right now though her cream filled, sloshing gut looked like over due twins were about to pop out of her at any time.

"Oh, I guess it is rather late," the cheer leader shrugged, breasts about to pop from her bra and nighty riding fully over her belly, "but still, that little shit said he bet I was too fat to do the splits! How dare he question my skills."

"Well, can you still do the splits?" Liara asked, eyes going down to Lawson's luscious legs, touching firmly at the thigh and putting a run into her new stocking.

"I...am far too fully right now but once this belly goes down I absolutely can!" Miranda huffed, taking in her gut fully for the first time, "Oh...oh no I've done it again."

"You're not the only one," Liara giggled, walking in and letting her own swollen gut press into Miranda's, their bellies blue and white spheres gurgling with far too much food, "I guess we're both a couple of fat nerds. You seem to really be enjoying yourself there."

"I'm not a nerd...," Miranda tried to deny, "it was just a distraction while I was too fully to have sex with my hot girlfriend."

"Uhuh," Liara smiled, patting the cream filled sphere that had been six pack abs at the new year, "you'd never go up four player ranks in an afternoon. Come on, I'm too tired and too fully for anything but cuddling. Let's go my completely non-nerdy girlfriend, let's put your retainer in and go to bed. But don't forget your teddy bear."

"Mr. Grizzly!" Miranda squeaked, dashing over to the ancient stuffed animal with all the speed her sloshing belly allowed, levitating it back up to her arms rather than risk bending over and not being able to stand back up.

The next morning Miranda was sluggish to rise, all of her immense gluttony and long hours of play making her cranky, tired and sore, a state she wasn't much used to after a life of perfect health and nutrition. She telekinetically shot the alarm clock into the wall with a crash, pulling a pillow over her head and groaning while Liara sat up and stretched.

"I think that's a sign to get up," Liara said sleepily, "are you just going to lay there?"

"Fowewer I fwink...ugh, my eyes hurf," the glorious brunette said through her retainer.

To say that the campus administration was having mixed feelings of their star student athlete was an understatement. "Back pain?" the comparatively svelte doctor asked.

"Yes," Miri whispered, standing slowly back up and rubbing her back

"Hmmm, let's see the exact reason" Chakwas said, walking over and gently running her fingers up Miranda's soft, squishy back, jabbing them into the joints of her vertebrae.

"Well, you've got a badly pinched sciatic nerve and a slightly slipped disc on your third lumbar vertebrae," Chakwas said, "the reason is easy to determine: your breasts are too large for your frame. I'd recommend a reduction."

"i'm sorry did you say a reduction?" the pained brunette glared, hand going protectively to her immense bosom, "Why would I want a reduction, I love having breasts like this..."

"Because your breasts are so big they're throwing your back out," Chakwas observed dryly, "at least get yourself a properly fitted bra. That lacy negligee is for girls with small breasts, larger women need more support. Here's the number of a good bra shop, get them quick or those'll be on the floor by the time your thirty."

She handed Miranda a card...and a passed physical form.

"Wait...I...I pass?" Miranda said amazed after that disparaging experience.

"Sort of, your back is making me put you on medical exemption for two weeks until you're treated but you're otherwise healthy as a horse," Chakwas sighed, "the only danger to you from cheerleading is blackening your eye with a stray boob. You are otherwise cleared to cheer but let me give you some personal advice: you've got to stop thinking like a thin girl if you're going to get fat."

"Thinking like a...I don't know what you mean," Miranda denied.

"Don't try and cover it up, you've got a feedee fetish and probably an exhibitionist and humilation one too. Ice Queen models don't gain sixty pounds in nine weeks unless they want to," Chakwas told her calmly, "oh don't look like you're the only girl who has a fetish. My college roomate gained seventy pounds freshman year because of me and my husbands tits are as big as yours. Then he suggested we turn the hot fudge funnel around for my birthday and now look at me, on the one way train to piggy-ville! I've tried to quit so many times but being stuffed and heavy feels so good. You know what I'm talking about."

The cheerleader blushed, feeling more ashamed than when she'd been topless in front of fifty thousand people but also hopeful that someone else shared her kink, "I...okay. I admit all of this is intentional. And that feeling full is really, really nice. But, an explanation on the not thinking like a thin girl..."

"Don't treat yourself like this is a temporary thing and you'll be a size two again," Chakwas lectured, "you're going to be fat for the long haul, which means eating plenty of greens instead of crisps, keeping up your exercising and dressing for your weight. Speaking of, what's your goal weight?"

"A goal? I don't really have a goal...I guess, I was just planning to keep gaining until I got...I don't know, until I was satisfied," Miranda said.

"No goal...oh honey," Chakwas tut-tutted, "You're going to get huge aren't you? Just, remember: you're not a skinny fit girl anymore. You're going to have fat girl moments: going up stairs, getting stuck in things, busting buttons, tone the routines down a little bit perhaps and let the thinner girls get tossed into the air. Keep up exercising but don't exert yourself, walk but don't run before you're on a mobility scooter."

"A...me, on a mobility scooter?" Miranda asked, feeling very real and very vulnerable.

"Miranda, you've gained sixty pounds in three months," Chakwas laughed kindly, patting Miranda's full paunch, "if you kept that up then this time next year you'll be needing one for long distances."

A mobility scooter, could she really get so fat she needed a machine to get around...

"But that's for after you graduate," Chakwas told her, "I doubt that you'll get too much above three hundred before graduation, although you never know. Now, be sure to rest plenty and start wearing a back brace for your own good. And support those boobs!"

The fat fetishest doctor left with a giggle, letting Miranda slowly and carefully get dressed in a relieved daze. She'd been saved by a hairsbreadth ...but couldn't practice for two weeks, so now what was she supposed to do with all that free time? She looked down at the card in her hand: Matriarch Aethyta's Bra Shop, No Pair Too Big or Too Small.

1231212111111111111122112111111.content:
Liara T'Soni, covered in sweat and breathing hard, watched the numbers climb up.

She was used to being the biggest girl in the room. As a kid she'd been chubby, in her adolescence this had changed to a real weight problem: every school year she'd pile on the pounds through over eating and laziness and begrudgingly lose most of it at fat camps over the summer to begin the process again. Her explosive first semester growth was just Liara's natural weight without her mother controlling her, sneaking snacks could only take you so far. Liara's normal was being at least forty or fifty pounds heavier than other Asari, of being soft and cuddly in a species of graceful amazons.

Her mother's harsh words whenever she'd popped out of another pants size or been found in bed with that delightful human plant byproduct "chocolate" had always stuck with her: "Fat" "Lazy", "Shameful".

"Come on, 2.48. 2.49...," Liara wheezed, breath coming in heaves, thighs burning, breasts wobbling and heavy gut flapping, "2.50!"

She slammed the stop button down on the treadmill, the machine coming to a halt and letting the sweaty Asari stop jogging. Liara let the slowing conveyor belt take her forwards, belly touching the control rail later than it once had. She breathed hard, but not uncontrolled, in through the nose and out through the mouth, smiling as she saw her longest run yet: 2.5 miles. She not waddled over to the mirror, seeing the Asari she'd become.

At fat camp exercise had always been miserable, leaving her feeling groggy and exhausted and sore. But now that she was doing it on her own Liara felt amazing, energized and fresh despite her sweat. She looked down on her 250 lb body, 50lbs less than at the human new year: her double belly was merging back together, her pillow ass was perking up and she'd lost one of her four chins! If she pressed hard enough onto her dumpy thighs she could actually feel the hard muscle built by all of her exercise! And the thing was, unlike past weight losses caused by fat camp, Liara knew this one would continue.

Because unlike then, she had a goal. Not to please her mother, no. Her goal was to be the skinny one...

"Hello, police? Yes there's an intruder in my house. Yes a sexy, sweaty Asari," a voice said behind her, "oh wait, it's just my hot girlfriend. False alarm, but send over chinese. I'm about to burn a lot of energy..."

Before Liara could turn she felt two soft bulges press into her shoulders and neck, followed fractionally later by another bulge at midback. Soft arms curled around her chest and the blue woman moaned as Miranda's mouth touched her hair fronds, tongue licking sweat off the sensitive tips.

"Yummm, you being all sweaty gets me wild," the benched cheer Captain purred behind her, "its not quite as good as you being drenched in chocolate sauce but that can wait until this afternoon. Let's do it here, on the floor..."

"I don't know, are you up to that?" Liara asked, easily removing Miranda's grip from her shoulders and turning around.

In the last two weeks since Miranda's physical, the Asari's new fitness habits had put her weight loss into over drive, becoming an inwardly fit if still outwardly fluffy young woman. But Miranda, well...the most exercise the cheer leader got in a day was walking from her temporary handicapped parking space to baking class, less than three hundred steps round trip. Without any exercise at all and with all day spent on either asleep, floating in a tub or on the couch playing video games, Miranda was ballooning faster than ever into a decadent, hedonistic embodiment of laziness.

"Of course I am," Miranda smiled, stiffly striking a pose with one hand on her hip and the other on her head, frowning as her back twinged, "ugh, don't I look like it?"

Miranda's thick thighs had gone *FWUMP*, meeting three fourths of the way to the knee, which they'd begun to hang over. Her childbearing hips looked too big for standard school chairs, a web of stretch marks appearing wider on their sides everytime Liara looked. In the back, her buns looked like beach balls filled 80% of the way with cottage cheese, cellulite spreading like wild fire as the best ass on campus started drooping, the muscle that had held it up shrinking by the day. The halt of her estrogen heavy diet, for the sake of her back, had let her belly make strides in catching up to her breasts: its upper 2/3rds were a large pot full of vanilla cake batter, with some strawberry swirls for the stretchmarks on its bottom slope, next to the deepening crease between belly and FUPA. That this girl had ever had a six pack was shocking to Liara, Miranda's stuffed gut didn't look like she'd ever done a single sit up in her life!

"You look ready for bed," Liara grinned, for while the Asari was in tight spandex shorts and sports bra, Miranda was wearing just a thong and t-shirt, "honestly I'm surprised your up before 7 am."

Both were undersized, the black thong's straps were swallowed up by Miri's flabby love handles, most of its panty hidden by her thighs and FUPA. The white shirt's sleeves bit tightly into her flabby arms, a christmas ham wrapped around Miri's once corded upper limbs. Her forearms were swollen and puffy, her fingers having gotten thick enough none of her rings fit. The main body of the shirt didn't go down to her belly button and was stretched tight by Miranda's breasts.

"Back wasn't letting me sleep anymore," the obese cheer leader admitted, rubbing her stiff lower back.

"Maybe you should start wearing a bra, then and not have these floppers hanging off you all day?" Liara asked, cupping the bottom of Miranda's breasts.

Liara wasn't sure how large they were, because Miranda hadn't worn anything even resembling a bra since her physical but the end of any exercise at all meant the end of Miranda's breasts defying gravity. The plain to see nipples, still small and tight relatively, were starting to point downwards and Miri's head sized boobs were hanging at least three inches lower than their peak, able to hold half of a pencil bag comfortably beneath their sensitive bulk. Her hunched, padded shoulders were curled under their increasingly pendulous bulk, their shape now fully tear drops.

"Hey, watch it!" Miri giggled, breasts bouncing and a grin breaking out across her dimpled face, "those are sensitive enough I'll go in ten seconds if you start there!"

Her face had changed the least, her smile was dazzling and her eyes piercing still, but Miranda's elegant cheekbones were soft apples usually red from the exertion of walking and she had a full double chin no matter what. She was squinting a little bit, playing a video game 12 hrs a day had dented her vision a bit, and her raven hair hadn't been styled in weeks, getting curly and hanging well beneath her meaty hips.

"Well, we've both got class," Liara said, stepping in until their bellies met, "but if we shower and fuck at the same time..."

She kissed Miranda and frowned, licking syrup off of her lips, "You had breakfast without me!"

"...I'm a big girl, you can't expect me to not eat while you're exercising," Miranda laughed, her 229 lb body bouncing, "but let's head to the showers, I want to get in a second meal before I have to go to class."

"...the class where you eat nothing but baked goods?" Liara asked her, eyebrow raised.

"You can't expect me to gorge on an empty stomach," Miranda said, jiggling her gut, which jiggled her breasts and then wincing as her back twinged again, back bending forwards.

Liara's eyes widened in alarm, putting a hand on the flabby arm of her girlfriend, "Miri are you alright?"

"Just my back," the saggy cheer captain sighed, "Ugh, I'm not sure how I can cheer like this..."

"Have you considered getting a bra?" Liara asked, "I love how lazy you're getting now lover, you make sweat pants and a tank top look good. But you're too big to go unsupported."

Miranda sighed, a sigh that made Liara's blood pressure spike, "I guess you're right, its just...I'll have to get custom fitted at a shop, I'm too big for clothing synthesizers, its so hard to get up and go anymore...its like I'm obese or something..."

Both laughed, getting into the palatial bathroom and starting the immense shower, built extra large so two fatties could get in and both be sprayed from several angles. The two pressed in close, soft, guts squishing together and kissed again, Liara standing on tip toe to keep the tall girl from having to bend. Liara ran her finger tips over the incredible softness of Miri's belly, marvelling that this was a six pack eleven weeks earlier.

"Goddess but you've gotten fat," she smiled, "you've done a really good job becoming a fat girl."

"I know, I'm going to be fatter than you soon I think," the gorgeous human confessed, "I'm...going to just keep getting bigger too..."

"Which is why you need to get yourself some fitted bras, before you trip over your tits," Liara giggled, "really, I love lazy Miranda struggling into sweat pants to go out for fast food but since we plan on getting you bigger and bigger, you might as well get some upgraded clothes again. I miss you wearing make up and fancy clothes and lingerie all the time."

The incredibly lazy cheerleader sighed, beginning to lather herself up, "That's a good point, my back won't get any better unless I either lose five cup sizes, get back in shape or wear a fitted bra. And the first two aren't going to happen?"

"You're not going to exercise with me at all?" the fit-fat Asari asked, "not even a little?"

"Well," the busty, fat cheerleader admitted, "I guess a little..."

Bra shopping: after class, Miranda decides to hit the store..

1231212111111111111122112111111.title: My boobs!

12312121111111111111221121111111.content:
Miranda’s hover-car settled into the handicapped parking space on autopilot, due to its driver’s hands being full of a double cream mocha latte and a bear claw made in baking class.

Touch down sent a mighty jiggle through the ballooning cheer leader, her ultra soft body giving a little bounce that caused the inner seam of her near transparent leggings to rip from groin to knee. Miranda noticed it but didn’t stop eating, she’d put a lot of work into her bear claws this morning, her baking skills skyrocketing alongside her weight. While the daily eating contest between her and Jack was still a crowd pleaser, the billionaire’s culinary creations were becoming incredibly saught after, the rest of the class eating the entire thing to review them instead of just taking a slice.

To her displeasure.

“I’m glad I made a second baker’s dozen,” Miri thought to herself, swallowing the last of sugary calorie bombs and giving a demure little burp.

The seatbelt trailed across her exposed gut when she undid it, the cold metal giving her a delightful little squeal as it touched her spherical gut. Getting out of the ivory white ferrari required the use of her hands and made her emit a fat girl grunt of effort. She sucked sugar off of her fingers, feeling like a lazy fat piglet and thrilled at the lazy gluttonous decadence of it all. Her belly was so swollen with carbs and cream laden coffee she looked ready to burst, her perfect legs were thick enough to burst out of her pants and her weight was weighing heavier on her by the day as her muscles decayed beneath her thickening fat.

“I really am perfect,” she said to herself, bending back into the car to grab her late and nearly screaming in agony as her immense G cup tear drops stopped resting against her chest and pulled hard on her back.

Glutton she might be, but Miri abandoned the creamy coffee in favor of not crippling herself. The semi-retired cheerleader had to admit that her unsupported floppers were one minor issue towards basic things like flexibility and mobility. Her swollen tear drops were too big and her muscles too weak for her frame to adequately support them and while their rate of growth had slowed, they were still getting bigger. And now that Miri’s strong back and shoulder muscles were atrophying, the gravity defying bosoms were starting to plunge.

Miranda wanted to be her own version of perfect and while thick thighs and a big gut were part of that, she’d prefer her boobs stop losing an inch of perk per week.

Hence the fat brunette’s presence at Matriarch Aethtya’s bra shop, a snug little store tucked into a quiet corner of New Chicago. Miranda didn’t usually go into such small shops but her stupendous bosom was much larger than the sizes carried by the expensive designer stores she’d frequented. As she waddled up to the door, Miri was at least glad that there weren’t any stairs.

The glass door was very heavy, making the once fantastically strong girl marvel at how out of shape she was, and opened into a large pleasant room full of mannequins and displays that elicited a soft whistle from Miri.

Much like her girlfriend Miranda loved boobs. Huge ones, big ones, small ones, tiny ones. Saggy and squishy, high and firm. It didn’t matter, it was just the presence of the most feminine part of visible anatomy and this little temple of titties that got her going. So the display of huge titted mannequins, ones that made her own bodacious bosom seem small and demure revved Miranda’s personal engines hard.

“Oh no, no no,” a pack of cigarettes a day voice hissed from the back of the shop, “oh no, you are not doing that!”

“Excuse me?” Miranda said, looking away from the libido rousing display and having to pick her jaw up off the ground.

The long lived Asari had a life cycle of three phases. First came the maiden stage, the youthful centuries spent slim, gracetul and wild. Then came the matron stage, where hips widened and breasts increased, the blue women’s bodies demanding children. Then, at around six hundred years of age came the Matriarch stage where things could get….big.

“You are not going to waste those boobs like this!” the enormous chested Asari nearly yelled, hurrying from the back of the room, a mobile earthquake of boobs.

Her tits made Miranda’s G cups look tiny. Perfectly round mega-boobs that made the stooped Miri’s shoulders slump even more. The cheerleader couldn’t tear her gaze away from the sea of blueberry boob blubber on display, 153 IQ temporarily rendered inert by so much cleavage. What was she even looking at, J cups? K cups? Good God above were those ...L cup breasts?

“I’m...not,” Miri stammered gesturing at her thin cheer shirt that was stretched tight over what were usually the biggest boobs in the room, “wasting...them…”

“You’re walking around stoop shouldered without a bra! Girl you’re losing perk by the minute,” the husky voice Asari snapped, grabbing the tall human by the shoulder, “Come with me now.”

Behind her giant boobs, Aethtya’s body was thickly built. Her glamorous dress clearly showed wide, muscular shoulders, while a thick, meaty waist with matronly hips and big, beefy thighs. No one would have called her thin, minus the breasts the Asari had to be over two hundred pounds, but there was a lot of muscle underneath her ample padding. Miranda felt a twinge of shame, realizing how badly she’d let herself go with the excuse to gorge and laze about but soon found herself standing shirtless in a back room.

“Is this really necessary? I just came for some bras…,” she said, sheepishly blushing despite many a naked photo shoot and skimpy cheer routine.

“Of course this is necessary! You’re wasting a magnificent body,” the Matriarch said, running a measuring tape around Lawson’s curves, “your breasts have aged twelve years since you were exposed in front of the football stadium!”

Miri blushed a deeper shade of red, reaching for her old self confidence and finding it wasn’t there. Its absence shocked and aroused her, as much as this self confident, strong-thick Asari berating her.

“You, uh, saw that?” she asked timidly.

“Everyone on this colony saw that,” the Asari huffed, “I knew you’d be in here after that if you had any wits about you. But have you even worn a bra since then?”

“Well, no, I haven’t had anything that fits,” Miranda admitted, crossing her legs, “I’ve had a growth spurt lately…”

“Let me guess, you found a little gaining fetish and went kaboom?” Aethtya sighed, “You’ve gotten considerably fatter since just the game, do you realize that? You’ve got a 35inch belly beneath your boobs, how many carbs are you eating a day to grow this?”

“I haven’t quite been keeping track,” Miranda said, feeling herself get wet.

“And you’re soft as melted ice cream too,” Aethyta said, pinching a love handle, “I’m guessing you haven’t budged from the couch, have you?”

“I’ve been on bed rest for two weeks, Doctor’s orders,” the proud girl squirmed.

“You mean you’ve been sitting on your butt eating because your boobs are too big for your back, right?” Aethtya sighed, “Well, you got here just in time. This plateau of yours is about to end.”

“What sort of plateau are you talking about?’ the horny cheerleader asked, hoping the Matriarch was going to berate her some more.

“I’m a breast expert girl and your boobs are getting ready for another growth spurt,” the Asari said, “three cup sizes, maybe four and if you don’t properly support them you’ll be tripping over them soon.”

“F-four cup sizes?” Miri stuttered,trying to imagine being that gigantic, “I’d be...huge, an I cup at least…”

“And dragging on the floor if you don’t start supporting yourself,” Aethtya told her, pulling out a bra big enough for a scout troop to camp in, “here try this on.”

Miri raised an eyebrow at the giant garment but reluctantly put it on, finding it fit magnificently once the numerous straps were hooked together. The at best lingering pain in her back suddenly lifted, her boobs lifted up almost to their old positions. She looked at her reflection, looking more like her old self than she had in weeks.

“This is...fantastic,” Miri nearly moaned, “I’ll take twenty of them. Do they come in black?”

"Of course they come in black," the Asari laughed, a sound that was strangely familiar to Miranda.

The overweight young woman finally looked at Aethtya's soft face...a face that looked almost exactly like Liara's. If her girlfriend's weight was distributed to her chest and she was 700 years older, it would have been like looking at the girl Miranda had woken up next to. Asari were rare on New Illinois, the only other one she knew of was Liara.

"By any chance, do you have a relative at my school?" the cheerleader asked.

Before the harsh Asari could answer, the bell to her shop rang as someone came in.

The Not So Flat Biotic: Jack's here...and she's a big girl anymore.

Other Mom?: Liara comes in for an impromptu reunion.
12312121111111111111221121111111.title: Bra Shopping

choices: Miranda comes back with a calorie-laden snack.
The punk and the engineer arrive to enact their plan.
